
-----title
石家庄 (出生地)
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='dfc99f045fcb4db5a08e495184537724_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("dfc99f045fcb4db5a08e495184537724");'><span id='dfc99f045fcb4db5a08e495184537724_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=670&endYear=670')">670年</a>，出生</div><div id='dfc99f045fcb4db5a08e495184537724' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=670&endYear=670')">670年</a>　本年生于河北恒州，姑系于此。<br /></div>

-----title

ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=684&endYear=684')">684年</a>　本年有客访瓌，候于客次苏颋方拥彗庭芜间，观《咏昆仑奴子》诗，姑系于此。（残句）<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=684&endYear=684')">684年</a>　有人献兔，悬于廊庑，瓌召苏颋令咏之，作《咏死兔》，姑系于此。<div id='poem_33776' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_33776' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_33776")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_33776_comment'></div><div id='poem_sentence_5_33853_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_33853'></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_33853_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_title_1365370' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365370?labeling=true' target='_blank'>夷齐四皓优劣论</a><span class='authorDate'>（689年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_1365370")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1365370_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365370'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365370'>论曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365370_comment'></div>君子疾没世而名不称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365370_comment'></div>耻当年而节莫睹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365370_comment'></div>故发义以立志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365370_comment'></div>从道以成功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365370_comment'></div>激清一时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365370_comment'></div>流誉千古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365370_comment'></div>然立志者必义也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365370_comment'></div>成功者必道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365370_comment'></div>资于义而志可明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365370_comment'></div>徵于道而功可见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365370_comment'></div>志以立节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365370_comment'></div>功以成名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365370_comment'></div>名之成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365370_comment'></div>昭其道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365370_comment'></div>节之立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365370_comment'></div>昭其义也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365370_comment'></div>能洁其身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365370_comment'></div>后代有准。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365370_comment'></div>非夷齐欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365370_comment'></div>能利其国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365370_comment'></div>当时翳赖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365370_comment'></div>非四皓欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1365370_comment'></div>揆而度之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1365370_comment'></div>忧而柔之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1365370_comment'></div>循其事而理于是乎在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1365370_comment'></div>考其功而论于是乎著。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1365370_comment'></div>盖周德既广。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1365370_comment'></div>则夷齐让国而归焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1365370_comment'></div>汉业既兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1365370_comment'></div>则四皓受命而出焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1365370_comment'></div>天之弃商矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1365370_comment'></div>谏武王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1365370_comment'></div>正臣礼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1365370_comment'></div>人之戴汉矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1365370_comment'></div>护太子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1365370_comment'></div>忠主道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1365370_comment'></div>忠之所存者大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1365370_comment'></div>则正之所行者高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1365370_comment'></div>高而能行者节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1365370_comment'></div>所谓立也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1365370_comment'></div>大而能行者名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1365370_comment'></div>所谓成也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1365370_comment'></div>若夫志士仁人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1365370_comment'></div>将合而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1365370_comment'></div>进足以成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1365370_comment'></div>退足以立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1365370_comment'></div>用足以兼济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1365370_comment'></div>否足以独善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1365370_comment'></div>不辱其身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1365370_comment'></div>则安食其粟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1365370_comment'></div>不降其志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1365370_comment'></div>则言采其薇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1365370_comment'></div>墨胎氏之子不屈也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1365370_comment'></div>嬴之德衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1365370_comment'></div>则岩穴全生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1365370_comment'></div>刘之德盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1365370_comment'></div>则衣冠就列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1365370_comment'></div>夏黄公之徒知时也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1365370_comment'></div>举其成事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1365370_comment'></div>各同乎其成矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1365370_comment'></div>究其立事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1365370_comment'></div>各异乎其立矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1365370_comment'></div>深惟终始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1365370_comment'></div>敢无优劣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1365370_comment'></div>统而论之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1365370_comment'></div>其美也一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1365370_comment'></div>别而叙之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1365370_comment'></div>其迹也二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1365370_comment'></div>弃身以遂志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1365370_comment'></div>夷齐之烈矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1365370_comment'></div>爱国以屈身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1365370_comment'></div>商皓之行矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1365370_comment'></div>曰若稽古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1365370_comment'></div>以质乎今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1365370_comment'></div>四皓见贤于子房。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1365370_comment'></div>夷齐称仁于宣父。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1365370_comment'></div>与其称仁于宣父。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1365370_comment'></div>不犹愈于见贤于子房哉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_78_1365370_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='da7c439c5a674f9bad69da09ae21a18f_label'><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=707&endYear=707')">707年8月</a>　本年八月以前，迁给事中，中宗李显将加神龙尊号，苏颋代群官草表，请求中宗公除断丧。作品：《将加神龙尊号群官请公除表》<div id='poem_1365338' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365338' class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365338'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365338'>臣某等言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365338_comment'></div>臣闻君亲之义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365338_comment'></div>臣子同极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365338_comment'></div>陛下至孝纯深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365338_comment'></div>将固三年之典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365338_comment'></div>臣等尽忠恳到。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365338_comment'></div>伫回三舍之晖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365338_comment'></div>是则陛下违先后之遗命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365338_comment'></div>臣等忤圣人之严旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365338_comment'></div>违命几于过戚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365338_comment'></div>不可以称孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365338_comment'></div>忤旨嫌于必诤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365338_comment'></div>不可以称忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365338_comment'></div>所以莫顾犯鳞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365338_comment'></div>共甘碎首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365338_comment'></div>臣等中谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365338_comment'></div>臣又闻之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365338_comment'></div>王者代天理物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365338_comment'></div>为天所子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365338_comment'></div>循至公以临大宝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365338_comment'></div>非独善以崇小节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365338_comment'></div>由是汉之国章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365338_comment'></div>始从权之变礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1365338_comment'></div>晋之廷议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1365338_comment'></div>故屈已以因除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1365338_comment'></div>拥万乘之尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1365338_comment'></div>有万机之政者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1365338_comment'></div>示不得同于凡也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1365338_comment'></div>前王著于不刊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1365338_comment'></div>其来久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1365338_comment'></div>四圣则常追远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1365338_comment'></div>俯而就之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1365338_comment'></div>陛下罔极之思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1365338_comment'></div>通丧是执。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1365338_comment'></div>所不忍言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1365338_comment'></div>莫之省奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1365338_comment'></div>遂令霜露多变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1365338_comment'></div>日月其除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1365338_comment'></div>皆臣之至愚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1365338_comment'></div>诚未感圣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1365338_comment'></div>天意若曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1365338_comment'></div>助陛下以非常之功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1365338_comment'></div>人谋协从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1365338_comment'></div>尊陛下以非常之号者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1365338_comment'></div>欲陛下司龙纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1365338_comment'></div>国有茂典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1365338_comment'></div>不可废者明矣。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1365338_comment'></div>况哀戚有制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1365338_comment'></div>故非同日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365223_comment'></div>钦若从乂。师保之寄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365223_comment'></div>人具尔瞻。必在耆德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365223_comment'></div>共康庶政。特进前行尚书右仆射同中书门下三品上柱国宋国公致仕唐休璟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365223_comment'></div>自天锡梦。维岳降精。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1365388_comment'></div>卑听深视。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1365388_comment'></div>荅神祇之协谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1365388_comment'></div>讨经籍之遗美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1365388_comment'></div>于戏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1365388_comment'></div>轩辕氏升元扈就肴虚者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1365388_comment'></div>莫如佛之宝也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1365388_comment'></div>推大圣之蕴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1365388_comment'></div>超众妙之机。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1365388_comment'></div>则道方于权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1365388_comment'></div>智成乎真。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1365388_comment'></div>实修心观心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1365388_comment'></div>惟凡證圣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1365388_comment'></div>即色非色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1365388_comment'></div>惟觉悟迷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1365388_comment'></div>小者得其小。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1365388_comment'></div>大者得其大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1365388_comment'></div>药草之喻是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1365388_comment'></div>有者见其有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1365388_comment'></div>无者见其无。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1365388_comment'></div>露泡之喻是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1365388_comment'></div>使般若之门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1365388_comment'></div>随方而启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1365388_comment'></div>仁寿之域。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1365388_comment'></div>举代咸登。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1365388_comment'></div>用于国家六度齐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1365388_comment'></div>行于人伦五常等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1365388_comment'></div>岂与夫太后好道而黜于儒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1365388_comment'></div>曾孙好刑而杂于霸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1365388_comment'></div>朕当究登庸之休瑞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1365388_comment'></div>询往世之宗旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1365388_comment'></div>众生未度而度之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1365388_comment'></div>百姓有罪而罪已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1365388_comment'></div>宏风而共贯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1365388_comment'></div>兴化而致理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1365388_comment'></div>以助天之子人乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1365388_comment'></div>因制天下州尽置大唐龙兴寺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1365388_comment'></div>陕州者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1365388_comment'></div>以宏福寺为之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1365388_comment'></div>寺则唐武德中所创。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1365388_comment'></div>昔王业始基。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1365388_comment'></div>宜于百亿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1365388_comment'></div>故俟福之宏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1365388_comment'></div>暨帝图中缺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1365388_comment'></div>跃于九四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1365388_comment'></div>故见龙之兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1365388_comment'></div>此又前圣之兆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1365388_comment'></div>后圣之徵也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1365388_comment'></div>徒观其阿山豁险。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1365388_comment'></div>当砥柱之湍濑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1365388_comment'></div>城雉纡馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1365388_comment'></div>瞰崤陵之风雨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1365388_comment'></div>盖朝宗之次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1365388_comment'></div>行在之宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1365388_comment'></div>三辅齐剧邻其左。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1365388_comment'></div>二京分政出其中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1365388_comment'></div>斯何壮哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1365388_comment'></div>郡国之雄也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1365388_comment'></div>先是香填之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1365388_comment'></div>金布之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1365388_comment'></div>神祚之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1365388_comment'></div>福护之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1365388_comment'></div>千栌叠映。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1365388_comment'></div>万楹丛举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1365388_comment'></div>含真珠之赤光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1365388_comment'></div>带琉璃之绀色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1365388_comment'></div>般般远瞩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1365388_comment'></div>奕奕增新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1365388_comment'></div>红电生于树杪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1365388_comment'></div>星汉拂于楼閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1365388_comment'></div>谓须弥耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1365388_comment'></div>现空而隐半。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1365388_comment'></div>谓兜率耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1365388_comment'></div>住世以临下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1365388_comment'></div>如有待者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1365388_comment'></div>塔庙之灵乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1365388_comment'></div>上自清洛而西顾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1365388_comment'></div>经翠岩而北指。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1365388_comment'></div>七圣不迷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1365388_comment'></div>百神咸扶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1365388_comment'></div>旌回守塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1365388_comment'></div>辇过闲田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1365388_comment'></div>吟邵伯之甘棠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1365388_comment'></div>追汉仙之结草。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1365388_comment'></div>勿剪勿伐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1365388_comment'></div>将有声而在风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1365388_comment'></div>曰希曰夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1365388_comment'></div>岂无迹而观妙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1365388_comment'></div>孰若此寺崇大法之本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1365388_comment'></div>协中兴之符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1365388_comment'></div>致于闲安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1365388_comment'></div>得所饶益。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1365388_comment'></div>爰发中旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1365388_comment'></div>出五采绣及金银以宠之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1365388_comment'></div>后庭则杂于四时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1365388_comment'></div>其布惟五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1365388_comment'></div>内藏则错于三品。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1365388_comment'></div>其攻用六。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1365388_comment'></div>饰红玻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1365388_comment'></div>条紫磨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1365388_comment'></div>璀绣色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1365388_comment'></div>涵镜光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1365388_comment'></div>分身应矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1365388_comment'></div>金相睹矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1365388_comment'></div>雨诸天花。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1365388_comment'></div>随庆云而历乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1365388_comment'></div>作诸天乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1365388_comment'></div>混清吹以参差。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1365388_comment'></div>善哉弥勒降梯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1365388_comment'></div>育王让座。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1365388_comment'></div>弗之比也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1365388_comment'></div>当月宇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1365388_comment'></div>披露门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1365388_comment'></div>注明毫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1365388_comment'></div>晞净目者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_168_1365388_comment'></div>驾肩而凑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_169_1365388_comment'></div>接足而礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_170_1365388_comment'></div>犹稻麻之与竹苇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_171_1365388_comment'></div>墨黑之与针锋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_172_1365388_comment'></div>称三自归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_173_1365388_comment'></div>获四无畏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_174_1365388_comment'></div>大德君瑶君愕二禅师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_175_1365388_comment'></div>上座慈郁维𨙻道休二法师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_176_1365388_comment'></div>神入于定力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_177_1365388_comment'></div>思用于尘劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_178_1365388_comment'></div>汨其虑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_179_1365388_comment'></div>寺主灵观上人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_180_1365388_comment'></div>乐说多闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_181_1365388_comment'></div>辩才强学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_182_1365388_comment'></div>焉可沦以爱染。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_183_1365388_comment'></div>挠其情也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_184_1365388_comment'></div>亦有庐阜之寄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_185_1365388_comment'></div>傥冥于影迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_186_1365388_comment'></div>剡山之期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_187_1365388_comment'></div>或褫于襟带。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_188_1365388_comment'></div>每至断三苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_189_1365388_comment'></div>绝三流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_190_1365388_comment'></div>止六衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_191_1365388_comment'></div>禁六贼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_192_1365388_comment'></div>修善明之愿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_193_1365388_comment'></div>则罔不偕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_194_1365388_comment'></div>唱须达之祈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_195_1365388_comment'></div>则罔不摄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_196_1365388_comment'></div>受龙王之泉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_197_1365388_comment'></div>则罔不舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_198_1365388_comment'></div>自非淬慈剑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_199_1365388_comment'></div>破魔邪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_200_1365388_comment'></div>麾胜幡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_201_1365388_comment'></div>举僧正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_202_1365388_comment'></div>孰能臻于此矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_203_1365388_comment'></div>前刺史东平毕使君名构字其忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_204_1365388_comment'></div>謇士也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_205_1365388_comment'></div>清心劲节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_206_1365388_comment'></div>祗服文艺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_207_1365388_comment'></div>故其临事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_208_1365388_comment'></div>天下谓之直臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_209_1365388_comment'></div>今刺史河南元使君名澹字行冲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_210_1365388_comment'></div>精粹士也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_211_1365388_comment'></div>正辞雅道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_212_1365388_comment'></div>研机礼乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_213_1365388_comment'></div>故其著书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_214_1365388_comment'></div>天下谓之良史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_215_1365388_comment'></div>朝请大夫行陕令清河崔君名昱字盛绪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_216_1365388_comment'></div>长仁合义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_217_1365388_comment'></div>睦而奉姊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_218_1365388_comment'></div>郭奕之俦也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_219_1365388_comment'></div>友以为兄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_220_1365388_comment'></div>鲁恭之匹也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_221_1365388_comment'></div>故其虚心应物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_222_1365388_comment'></div>理家移政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_223_1365388_comment'></div>则太守树风以养之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_224_1365388_comment'></div>宰君承流而广之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_225_1365388_comment'></div>始乎精悉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_226_1365388_comment'></div>终乎惠爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_227_1365388_comment'></div>务茕嫠而归厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_228_1365388_comment'></div>惴奸慝而寡悔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_229_1365388_comment'></div>寂则旁通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_230_1365388_comment'></div>诚则圆对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_231_1365388_comment'></div>斯并倜傥卓荦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_232_1365388_comment'></div>殊尤绝伦者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_233_1365388_comment'></div>盍务之哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_234_1365388_comment'></div>郡有张士龙王忠诚侯元嗣郭琬袁休王方等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_235_1365388_comment'></div>修业谛听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_236_1365388_comment'></div>感缘信受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_237_1365388_comment'></div>应乎千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_238_1365388_comment'></div>闻于十室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_239_1365388_comment'></div>皆以为周锡王命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_240_1365388_comment'></div>而藏大鼎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_241_1365388_comment'></div>汉振天声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_242_1365388_comment'></div>而树隆碣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_243_1365388_comment'></div>况探密记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_244_1365388_comment'></div>指元符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_245_1365388_comment'></div>转圣轮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_246_1365388_comment'></div>道皇极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_247_1365388_comment'></div>使雕篆之辞缺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_248_1365388_comment'></div>则庄严之事眇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_249_1365388_comment'></div>云何以观人世殿我邦乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_250_1365388_comment'></div>遂载诸厥钟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_251_1365388_comment'></div>宣此偈曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_252_1365388_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_253_1365388'>贤劫圣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_253_1365388_comment'></div>惟法王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_254_1365388_comment'></div>吾君子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_255_1365388_comment'></div>与巨唐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_256_1365388_comment'></div>应符契。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_257_1365388_comment'></div>而后翔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_258_1365388_comment'></div>龙图永。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_259_1365388_comment'></div>象教昌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_260_1365388_comment'></div>清燬宅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_261_1365388_comment'></div>接通庄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_262_1365388_comment'></div>列璇题。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_263_1365388_comment'></div>崇宝坊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_264_1365388_comment'></div>翠华转。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_265_1365388_comment'></div>河之傍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_266_1365388_comment'></div>青莲降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_267_1365388_comment'></div>陕之乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_268_1365388_comment'></div>河之水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_269_1365388_comment'></div>幕荣光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_270_1365388_comment'></div>陕之路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_271_1365388_comment'></div>蔽甘棠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_272_1365388_comment'></div>东洛邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_273_1365388_comment'></div>西咸阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_274_1365388_comment'></div>望巡幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_275_1365388_comment'></div>驩且康。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_276_1365388_comment'></div>归调御。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_277_1365388_comment'></div>福穰穰。</div><div id='poem_sentence_278_1365388_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=709&endYear=709')">709年</a>　本年或去年，代拟封致仕唐休璟宋国公制。作品：《封致仕唐休璟宋国公制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《郁谱》不系此文。）</span><div id='poem_1365285' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365285' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365285?labeling=true' target='_blank'>封致仕唐休璟宋国公制</a><span class='authorDate'>（709年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_1365285")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1365285_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365285'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365285'>门下。养老乞言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365285_comment'></div>是谓侑礼。建侯专国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365285_comment'></div>因而有命。特进行前尚书仆射同中书门下三品上柱国酒泉郡开国公致仕唐休璟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365285_comment'></div>才实王佐。行为物范。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365285_comment'></div>自综理朝纲。谟猷揆政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365285_comment'></div>文武必济。义存册。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365285_comment'></div>公忠不回。诚亮始终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365285_comment'></div>逮子房休事。广德遗荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365285_comment'></div>虽乐在黄金。而庆逢苍玉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365285_comment'></div>重其行赏。孰若优贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365285_comment'></div>宜传带砺。益增土宇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365285_comment'></div>可进封宋国公。食邑三千户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365285_comment'></div>馀如故。主者施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365285_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1365285_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a id='poem_sentence_0_1365331_comment'></div>易不云乎。义崇于利建。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365331_comment'></div>书不云乎。道尚于敦睦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365331_comment'></div>故知树藩屏者。以奉先王之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365331_comment'></div>强宗室者。乃归诸父之允。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365331_comment'></div>咨尔金紫光禄大夫行秘书监检校太尉殿中监知陇右三使仗内诸闲厩上柱国嗣虢王邕。尔门膺鲁拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365331_comment'></div>地冠虞封。本以忠孝仁义之规。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365331_comment'></div>成乎宣慈惠和之业。思穷占雨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365331_comment'></div>沛经不测其精。词高赋月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365331_comment'></div>陈诗莫踰其丽。匪惟政修中夏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365331_comment'></div>称于虢叔。固以姻连外戚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365331_comment'></div>宠则吾姨。遂能在位不骄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365331_comment'></div>鸣谦自牧。造次何者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365331_comment'></div>宁忘服儒。从容谓之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365331_comment'></div>最乐为善。加以望隆才位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365331_comment'></div>声轶典司。动则有恒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365331_comment'></div>静而无挠。载刊三豕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365331_comment'></div>厨委于杀青。爰捧六龙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365331_comment'></div>厩填于伏皂。故可以荣绝乎四履。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365331_comment'></div>位徼乎九就。夫陈留者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365331_comment'></div>徙梁之邑。在浚之郊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365331_comment'></div>井邑遂割于鸿沟。舳舻远通于巨壑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365331_comment'></div>虽帝尧遗俗。国中承重厚之风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1365331_comment'></div>而王武旧邦。天下擅膏腴之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1365331_comment'></div>亲既贤矣。我图尔居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1365331_comment'></div>是用命尔为汴王。于戏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1365331_comment'></div>尔其敏厥行。祗厥典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1365331_comment'></div>思不怠。畏不法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1365331_comment'></div>取则前鉴。罔贻后羞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1365331_comment'></div>行作我唐藩。以惠于汴土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1365331_comment'></div>慎之哉。其保朕之休命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1365331_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_31_1365331_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=710&endYear=710')">710年5月28日</a>　本年五月二十八日，在中书为中宗代拟册册嗣泽王制文。作品：《册嗣泽王文》<div id='poem_1365330' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365330' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365330?labeling=true' target='_blank'>册嗣泽王文</a><span class='authorDate'>（710年5月28日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_1365330")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1365330_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365330'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365330'>维景龙四年岁次庚戌五月辛亥朔二十八日戊寅。应天神龙皇帝若曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365330_comment'></div>夫亲先之义。始自国家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365330_comment'></div>嫡后之封。终传土宇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365330_comment'></div>咨尔故泽王男义瑾。授桐贻绪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365330_comment'></div>训□垂芳。性夙宜于礼乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365330_comment'></div>行尽成其忠孝。是知周之曲阜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365330_comment'></div>元子建侯。汉之平台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365330_comment'></div>共王袭父。推其继美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365330_comment'></div>俾尔宜乎。是用命尔为嗣泽王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365330_comment'></div>于戏。率由轨训。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365330_comment'></div>祗服彝典。故可以不骄不矜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365330_comment'></div>乃惠乃顺。北暨于上党。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365330_comment'></div>南临于太行。伟其井邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365330_comment'></div>光我藩屏。往钦哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365330_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1365330_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=710&endYear=710')">710年5月15日</a>　本年五月十五日，在中书，代拟命吕休璟等北伐制文。作品：《命吕休璟等北伐制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《郁谱》不系此文。）</span><div id='poem_1365302' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365302' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365302?labeling=true' target='_blank'>命吕休璟等北伐制</a><span class='authorDate'>（710年5月15日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_1365302")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1365302_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365302'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365302'>门下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365302_comment'></div>朕闻守在四夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365302_comment'></div>盖安人以和众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365302_comment'></div>加于百姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365302_comment'></div>岂穷兵而黩武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365302_comment'></div>然则日之所出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365302_comment'></div>弗俾于化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365302_comment'></div>故知天之所讨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365302_comment'></div>必龚其罚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365302_comment'></div>自默啜虔刘肆暴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365302_comment'></div>桀骜反常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365302_comment'></div>独为匪人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365302_comment'></div>假命骄子者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365302_comment'></div>有岁时矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365302_comment'></div>虽奉书就邸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365302_comment'></div>或遵于声朔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365302_comment'></div>而控弦犯塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365302_comment'></div>已毒于彊场。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365302_comment'></div>朕惟务怀柔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365302_comment'></div>每存含忍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365302_comment'></div>遂使庶邦愤积。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365302_comment'></div>稽其六月之师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365302_comment'></div>逋寇祸盈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1365302_comment'></div>穷此百年之运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1365302_comment'></div>金山道前军大使特进贺猎毗伽钦化可汗突骑施守忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1365302_comment'></div>二庭贵绪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1365302_comment'></div>万里威声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1365302_comment'></div>忠而善谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1365302_comment'></div>勇则能断。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1365302_comment'></div>自膺殊礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1365302_comment'></div>名宠于外藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1365302_comment'></div>思立大勋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1365302_comment'></div>志勤于中国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1365302_comment'></div>兼遣弟右监门卫将军守节长驱沙漠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1365302_comment'></div>直指金微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1365302_comment'></div>默啜举其种类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1365302_comment'></div>来相抗拒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1365302_comment'></div>近殪于锋镝之下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1365302_comment'></div>已若乱麻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1365302_comment'></div>远虑于庙堂之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1365302_comment'></div>将同破竹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1365302_comment'></div>坚昆在右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1365302_comment'></div>犄角而东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1365302_comment'></div>并累献封章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1365302_comment'></div>请屠巢穴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1365302_comment'></div>朕又闻不得已而用者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1365302_comment'></div>孰若兵机。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1365302_comment'></div>不可得而违者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1365302_comment'></div>乃符人事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1365302_comment'></div>永言取乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1365302_comment'></div>宜戒徂征。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1365302_comment'></div>右领军卫将军兼检校北庭都护碎叶镇守使安抚十姓吕休璟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1365302_comment'></div>心坚铁石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1365302_comment'></div>气横风雷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1365302_comment'></div>始则和戎之利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1365302_comment'></div>先得晋卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1365302_comment'></div>终而逐虏之功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1365302_comment'></div>方邀汉将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1365302_comment'></div>可为金山道行军大总管。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1365302_comment'></div>北庭副都护郭虔瓘安处哲等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1365302_comment'></div>怀才抱器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1365302_comment'></div>蓄锐俟时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1365302_comment'></div>惯习军容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1365302_comment'></div>备知<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_63_1365302", 1365302, "Clauses/63/Comments/0")'>边要</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1365302_comment'></div>并可为副大总管。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1365302_comment'></div>领瀚海北庭碎叶等汉兵及骁勇健儿五万骑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1365302_comment'></div>金山道前军大使特进贺猎毗伽钦化可汗突骑施守忠领诸番部落兵健儿二十五万骑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1365302_comment'></div>相知计会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1365302_comment'></div>逐便赴金山道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1365302_comment'></div>朔方道行军大总管右武卫大将军摄右台大夫同中书门下三品上柱国韩国公张仁亶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1365302_comment'></div>文武将相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1365302_comment'></div>莫之与京。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1365302_comment'></div>心腹大臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1365302_comment'></div>是所繄赖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1365302_comment'></div>当分阃之任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1365302_comment'></div>受升坛之律。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1365302_comment'></div>常愿身先士卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1365302_comment'></div>不以贼遗君父。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1365302_comment'></div>与副大总管右监门卫大将军鲁受信等领蕃汉兵募健儿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1365302_comment'></div>或用绝群飞骑城傍等十五万骑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1365302_comment'></div>赤水军大使凉州都督司马逸客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1365302_comment'></div>外宽内明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1365302_comment'></div>正辞直道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1365302_comment'></div>标慷慨之节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1365302_comment'></div>曾不顾身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1365302_comment'></div>蕴经营之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1365302_comment'></div>期于尽敌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1365302_comment'></div>与右武卫将军陈邱右金吾卫翊府中郎将李元通副使右骁骑卫鹿陵府折冲能昌仁左卫神山府折冲陈义忠等领当军及当界蕃汉兵募健儿七万骑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1365302_comment'></div>丰安军大使灵州都督甄粲副使张赵璧常元寂等领蕃汉兵马六万骑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1365302_comment'></div>防御群牧大使临洮军使甄亶领当军莫门积石等军马募及秦兰渭城等州大家子弟总二万骑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1365302_comment'></div>建康军使甘州刺史李守徵玉门军使肃州刺史汤嘉惠墨离军使瓜州都督李思明伊吾军使伊州刺史李慎交等各领当军兵马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1365302_comment'></div>与突骑施守忠吕休璟等计会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1365302_comment'></div>共为表里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1365302_comment'></div>莫不运其长策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1365302_comment'></div>悉心而效六奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1365302_comment'></div>接以短兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1365302_comment'></div>指掌而论七纵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1365302_comment'></div>使天阵齐举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1365302_comment'></div>云置备设。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1365302_comment'></div>贾勇于饮醪之夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1365302_comment'></div>以一当万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1365302_comment'></div>扬威于汗血之骑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1365302_comment'></div>左萦右拂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1365302_comment'></div>咸挈鼋斩蛟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1365302_comment'></div>曳牛佩豕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1365302_comment'></div>必能力簸穷海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1365302_comment'></div>声压大荒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1365302_comment'></div>刈谷蠡之庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1365302_comment'></div>拔扶渠之垒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1365302_comment'></div>不遑渭桥之拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1365302_comment'></div>已见阴山之哭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1365302_comment'></div>然则持旌节执金鼓者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1365302_comment'></div>所以问不宾诛首恶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1365302_comment'></div>而比夫不诫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1365302_comment'></div>复迷则凶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1365302_comment'></div>俾存开网之仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1365302_comment'></div>预轸焚舟之叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1365302_comment'></div>休璟所领兵马甲仗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1365302_comment'></div>一事已上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1365302_comment'></div>仍依别敕处分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1365302_comment'></div>主者施行。</div><div id='poem_sentence_120_1365302_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=710&endYear=710')">710年6月22日</a>　本年六月二十二日，在中书，为韦驸马为先圣所绣阿弥陀像撰赞。作品：《为韦驸马奉为先圣绣阿弥陀像赞并序》<div id='poem_1365373' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365373' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365373?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为韦驸马奉为先圣绣阿弥陀像赞</a><span class='authorDate'>（710年6月22日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_1365373")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1365373_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1365373'>大唐唐隆元年六月二十二日。右金吾将军驸马都尉臣韦鐬等。奉为先圣三七日绣阿弥陀像一铺。臣闻北极尊者。有在天而舍万邦。西方圣者。有在天而应三界。上比义则无不通。下抒情则无不感。小臣鐬。受恩之极。昔也尚主。悲凤声之莫留。中于事君。痛乌号之靡逮。徵慕则殒越何补。回向则精诚所凭。爰缕陈于法象。仍绣扬于缋事。伏愿莲花之池。庄严盛其乐土。谷林之野。顺豫清其梵宫。如是重宣。敢称赞曰。</div><div id='poem_preface_1365373_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365373'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365373'>大圣天子去遗舄。大师世尊迎让席。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365373_comment'></div>布金摛绣图神迹。厌代乘云此光宅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365373_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1365373_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a id='poem_1365340' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365340' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365340?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代家君让左仆射表</a><span id='poem_sentence_0_1365340'>臣某言。伏奉制书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365340_comment'></div>以臣为尚书左仆射。馀如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365340_comment'></div>祗陈惶悸。罔知攸处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365340_comment'></div>臣中谢。臣始孩而孤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365340_comment'></div>不承义方之训。及壮思勉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365340_comment'></div>又乏殊异之才。幸以高曾绪业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365340_comment'></div>妄膺俊造。州郡徒劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365340_comment'></div>岂议闻达。陛下昔居邸第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365340_comment'></div>臣得谬连牧马。曳裾之末。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365340_comment'></div>忽焉三载。遗簪之旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365340_comment'></div>亲奉六飞。攀鳞而践台阁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365340_comment'></div>抚翼而登霄汉。皆圣主造物之恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365340_comment'></div>成小臣饰躬之渐。虽出入升降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365340_comment'></div>数十年閒。纡青拖紫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365340_comment'></div>复何功业。大行皇帝不以非才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365340_comment'></div>擢登近侍。貂蝉始拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365340_comment'></div>居守三秦。舆驾来旋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365340_comment'></div>俯移数月。以臣愚直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365340_comment'></div>不任政事。犹假位选曹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365340_comment'></div>留台洛邑。去岁秋暮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365340_comment'></div>复叨端揆。臣往以谋猷缺如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365340_comment'></div>寻而年病相追。每经陈乞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365340_comment'></div>未赐哀矜。属升遐之际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1365340_comment'></div>变起仓卒。受遗顾托。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1365340_comment'></div>形于制旨。臣虽独拒邪谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1365340_comment'></div>莫能死全忠烈。则臣之为咎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1365340_comment'></div>已无所逃。岂谓卑听乃诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1365340_comment'></div>曲蒙昭奖。非臣微命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1365340_comment'></div>能荅鸿钧。自光华在辰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1365340_comment'></div>睿圣登极。四罪皆服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1365340_comment'></div>百工咸事。尚书万机之会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1365340_comment'></div>仆射庶寮之长。正宜明德茂才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1365340_comment'></div>弥纶经济。岂使妨贤败政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1365340_comment'></div>自左而右。陛下以维新之业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1365340_comment'></div>始邀于卜梦。而念旧之私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1365340_comment'></div>尚任于疲老。臣知不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1365340_comment'></div>议者伊何。安敢上累明时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1365340_comment'></div>下尘良吏。伏乞悯臣有涯之忝越。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1365340_comment'></div>然后选众而举。得人为盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1365340_comment'></div>非惟微物览分。固亦朝廷益光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1365340_comment'></div>无任惭荷屏营之至。谨奉表陈让以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1365340_comment'></div>臣所让人。别状封进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1365340_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_42_1365340_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=710&endYear=710')">710年7月</a>　本年七月在中书，为岐王李范代拟让太常卿表。作品：《为岐王让太常卿表》<div id='poem_1365343' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365343' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365343?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为岐王让太常卿表</a><span class='authorDate'>（710年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_1365343")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1365343_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365343'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365343'>臣某言。伏奉制书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365343_comment'></div>以臣为太常卿兼检校左羽林将军。虔奉恩命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365343_comment'></div>罔寘心颜。臣某中谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365343_comment'></div>臣托荫宸极。分晖景纬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365343_comment'></div>从学多滞。不足对于三雍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365343_comment'></div>为文益疏。不足齐于七步。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365343_comment'></div>日者自天有命。裂地而封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365343_comment'></div>盛亨岐之井邑。比从梁之骖驾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365343_comment'></div>旋省惭惶。益增忝越。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365343_comment'></div>不悟前荣始拜。后宠仍加。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365343_comment'></div>且彝伦攸叙。百官所以象物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365343_comment'></div>方策不坠。二柄所以济时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365343_comment'></div>苟非其才。将汨于政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365343_comment'></div>况上卿之任。中尉之重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365343_comment'></div>自非胶庠告老。桓荣列于东面。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365343_comment'></div>藩邸求旧。宋昌总于北军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365343_comment'></div>臣何妄庸。兼此叨窃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365343_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下夙祗图录。光宅区宇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365343_comment'></div>凡厥在位。喜圣朝之得人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365343_comment'></div>独此旷官。尘睿鉴之知子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365343_comment'></div>将何以典司礼乐。综理韬钤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365343_comment'></div>伏乞太阳回光。庆云洒泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365343_comment'></div>俯察蒙鄙。旁求贤俊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1365343_comment'></div>则冀受授无失。谋谟有伦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1365343_comment'></div>无任下情愧悚之至。谨诣朝堂奉表陈乞以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1365343_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1365343_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=710&endYear=710')">710年10月13日</a>　本年十月十三日在中书，代拟中宗孝和皇帝谥议册文。作品：《唐中宗孝和皇帝谥议册文》<div id='poem_1365403' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365403' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365403?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唐中宗孝和皇帝谥议册文</a><span class='authorDate'>（710年10月13日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_1365403")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1365403_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365403'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365403'>维景云元年岁次庚戌十月戊寅朔十三日庚寅。摄太尉银青光禄大夫守户部尚书上柱国宣城郡开国公臣姚珽等上议曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365403_comment'></div>臣闻圣人极天下之赜以象其物。宜成天下之文以察其时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365403_comment'></div>变加于百姓之谓德。刑于四方之谓风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365403_comment'></div>德也者。动于神明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365403_comment'></div>风也者。由于教化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365403_comment'></div>原始见则。名合道先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365403_comment'></div>知终存义。迹因行表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365403_comment'></div>其来尚矣。伏惟大行应天神龙皇帝缵武之命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365403_comment'></div>允文之基。肇承于宥密。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365403_comment'></div>以至乎缉熙。若乃含青云之符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365403_comment'></div>耀赤光之瑞。履顺而一夷险。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365403_comment'></div>安贞而再潜跃。由是恭于三朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365403_comment'></div>服兹四罪。徯予之始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365403_comment'></div>祀夏而无改旧物。若帝之初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365403_comment'></div>迁周而有膺新命。虔匹夫蒸蒸之思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365403_comment'></div>爱于文武。豫大帝庚庚之占。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365403_comment'></div>友于王季。既而三年谅阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365403_comment'></div>九族敦叙。免丧问道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365403_comment'></div>穆乎天子之容。退朝藏密。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365403_comment'></div>怡若家人之礼。功收其成不以微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365403_comment'></div>刑济其宽不以大。谠词所不忤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365403_comment'></div>谗说所不入。约躬而厚物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365403_comment'></div>尽下以推人。翱翔乎儒雅之林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1365403_comment'></div>经启于文章之囿。不伤麛卵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1365403_comment'></div>不夭卉木。体仁也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1365403_comment'></div>行于蛮貊。暨于陪台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1365403_comment'></div>施惠也。酌中衢之樽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1365403_comment'></div>不竭也。陈太庙之器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1365403_comment'></div>不盈也。故能百宝用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1365403_comment'></div>四灵臻。嘉禾神芝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1365403_comment'></div>日献于府。柔远格。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1365403_comment'></div>怀荒至。名驹钜象。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1365403_comment'></div>岁填于牧。方采原陵之露华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1365403_comment'></div>感而通梦。遂扬昊坛之烟燎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1365403_comment'></div>严以配尊。然后心游绝冥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1365403_comment'></div>神寄恺乐。在云台之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1365403_comment'></div>希夷于真谛之门。追汾水之阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1365403_comment'></div>缥缈乎列仙之馆。岂图变生氛沴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1365403_comment'></div>凶遘霄极。歘凭玉以大渐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1365403_comment'></div>顾遗弓而上迁。所以函夏攀援。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1365403_comment'></div>人神哀戚。龙攒既启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1365403_comment'></div>鸟耘逾慕。礼彻三献。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1365403_comment'></div>北有因山之名。法崇二言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1365403_comment'></div>南有至郊之议。谨按谥法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1365403_comment'></div>慈惠爱亲。博施备物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1365403_comment'></div>皆曰孝。安人缉众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1365403_comment'></div>推贤让能。皆曰和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1365403_comment'></div>夫孝以爱亲。和以安人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1365403_comment'></div>是则宪先王之典谟。垂后裔之光烈者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1365403_comment'></div>盖天之所称矣。请上尊谥曰孝和皇帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1365403_comment'></div>庙曰中宗。谨议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1365403_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_51_1365403_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=710&endYear=710')">710年11月2日</a>　本年十一月二日前在中书，代拟和恩皇后哀册文。作品：《和恩皇后哀册文》<div id='poem_1365401' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365401' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365401?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和恩皇后哀册文</a><span class='authorDate'>（710年11月2日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_1365401")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1365401_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365401'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365401'>维景云元年岁次庚戌十月戊寅朔二十日丁酉。和恩皇后魂归于仙灵宫之寝殿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365401_comment'></div>粤十一月戊申朔二日己酉。招祔于定陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365401_comment'></div>礼也。皇帝翼翼而承洪绪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365401_comment'></div>亲亲而居宝位。痛终鲜于棣华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365401_comment'></div>哀不从于竹泪。祔自姬册。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365401_comment'></div>招因汉图。神既来兮云之际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365401_comment'></div>神将往兮山之隅。象物中严。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365401_comment'></div>容车外设。閒奇香兮霭如在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365401_comment'></div>委微烬兮空若灭。当四海之遏音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365401_comment'></div>延六宫而告诀。有司忝直清之寄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365401_comment'></div>奉旨宣方大之烈。其词曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365401_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_1365401'>乾道元亨。川维永贞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365401_comment'></div>德由覆合。功伫载成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365401_comment'></div>帝典攸正。人伦则厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365401_comment'></div>以光虞嫔。思媚京妇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365401_comment'></div>贵冑昌演。华宗庆膺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365401_comment'></div>书藏乃命。符得而兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365401_comment'></div>展我之媛。惟皇之出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365401_comment'></div>主家选容。师氏练吉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365401_comment'></div>觞贺紫掖。軿归朱邸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365401_comment'></div>俭而中规。荣必循礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365401_comment'></div>□□觏止婉兮娈兮。陈诗佩玉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365401_comment'></div>执事裁袿。姜后通言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1365401_comment'></div>卫臣知行。是修密静。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1365401_comment'></div>能服庄敬。芬若兰吐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1365401_comment'></div>华若李秾。光摇采翟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1365401_comment'></div>歘同飞龙。房乐悬而莫御。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1365401_comment'></div>国风咏而犹广。岂娥灵之有凭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1365401_comment'></div>而化羽之无像。呜呼哀哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1365401_comment'></div>至业隆于祀夏。尊名冠于升唐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1365401_comment'></div>披丽人之金屋。见仙鸟之瑶筐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1365401_comment'></div>才窈窕兮时已逝。事蹉跎兮夜不旸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1365401_comment'></div>潜太虚以灭景。长自依乎清光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1365401_comment'></div>万邦攀于晏驾。七月会于同轨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1365401_comment'></div>往寓集青之台。今招洒丹之水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1365401_comment'></div>上仙厌俗以求故。内则在阴而追美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1365401_comment'></div>无不之兮有来。长作合于神理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1365401_comment'></div>对桥山之坠舄。垂渭溪之造舟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1365401_comment'></div>群动观而雨泗。柔明进而烛幽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1365401_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉。听鸣鸡以徒奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1365401_comment'></div>悲服马以空发。箫鼓还兮遗朔风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1365401_comment'></div>松楸翳兮吐微月。归杏陵其永閟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1365401_comment'></div>绝柘馆而靡寻。资谓德之良史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1365401_comment'></div>图配和之徽音。呜呼哀哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1365401_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_44_1365401_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=710&endYear=710')">710年</a>　本年在中书，代拟授薛稷谏议大夫制文。作品：《授薛稷谏议大夫制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《郁谱》不系此文。）</span><div id='poem_1365132' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365132' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365132?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授薛稷谏议大夫制</a><span class='authorDate'>（710年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_1365132")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1365132_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365132'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365132'>门下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365132_comment'></div>中散大夫行尚书礼部郎中修文馆直学士河东县开国男薛稷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365132_comment'></div>弈代雄词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365132_comment'></div>身济其美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365132_comment'></div>光时雅量。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365132_comment'></div>士慕其风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365132_comment'></div>故能悬帐绝伦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365132_comment'></div>升堂睹奥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365132_comment'></div>掖垣密勿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365132_comment'></div>字列黄缣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365132_comment'></div>仙闼从容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365132_comment'></div>文飞赤管。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365132_comment'></div>箴阙之任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365132_comment'></div>惟贤是择。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365132_comment'></div>俾登才子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365132_comment'></div>式宠谏臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365132_comment'></div>可谏议大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365132_comment'></div>馀如故。<div class='inline' 》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《郁谱》不系此文。）</span><div id='poem_1365141' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365141' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365141?labeling=true' href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=711&endYear=711')">711年</a>　本年在长安，撰《唐河南龙门天竺寺碑》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《陈谱》系“景龙二年至先天二年”）</span><div id='poem_1365389' class='_poem'><div id='poem_sentence_3_1365389_comment'></div>上圣卓然大仙之旨也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365389_comment'></div>定融于惠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365389_comment'></div>惠无不明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365389_comment'></div>明證于觉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365389_comment'></div>觉无不定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365389_comment'></div>虚其照然观我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365389_comment'></div>动以权而应物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365389_comment'></div>智周斯大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365389_comment'></div>功利斯远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365389_comment'></div>继善者循乎业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365389_comment'></div>欲仁者适乎变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365389_comment'></div>业乃至于无相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365389_comment'></div>变复存于有作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365389_comment'></div>使因城之广。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365389_comment'></div>刹土之严。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365389_comment'></div>其来尚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365389_comment'></div>天竺寺者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365389_comment'></div>天竺王子避位出家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365389_comment'></div>三藏法师宝思惟之立也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1365389_comment'></div>夫所宗谓道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1365389_comment'></div>道崇可让位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1365389_comment'></div>况生于佛国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1365389_comment'></div>所慕惟法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1365389_comment'></div>法住可济时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1365389_comment'></div>况行于人代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1365389_comment'></div>其吴季子安世高之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1365389_comment'></div>鲁仲尼康僧会之徒欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1365389_comment'></div>不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1365389_comment'></div>何以谛俗归真。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1365389_comment'></div>秉彝宏教之极也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1365389_comment'></div>故誓于东震。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1365389_comment'></div>发自南离。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1365389_comment'></div>藏戒珠。<div id='poem_sentence_45_1365389_comment'></div>海可以化为之迹变入诸身若是乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1365389_comment'></div>海本如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1365389_comment'></div>则荆陷莫致瓜步。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1365389_comment'></div>浮杯遂往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1365389_comment'></div>孰喻乘桴于中道。<div
