id='poem_sentence_145_1365389_comment'></div>引清梵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1365389_comment'></div>称神咒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1365389_comment'></div>向之双泉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1365389_comment'></div>氛氲五色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1365389_comment'></div>云止烟绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1365389_comment'></div>星流火变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1365389_comment'></div>亟福应而神滋焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1365389_comment'></div>每熙春载阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1365389_comment'></div>庶物和畅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1365389_comment'></div>此都人士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1365389_comment'></div>则填城溢陌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1365389_comment'></div>自北而南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1365389_comment'></div>遗光相涉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1365389_comment'></div>群听相接。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1365389_comment'></div>震闻乎数十里外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1365389_comment'></div>无不举袂阴峰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1365389_comment'></div>扬桡沸水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1365389_comment'></div>洁诚而往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1365389_comment'></div>修礼而去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1365389_comment'></div>尔其倚红树。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1365389_comment'></div>凭丹槛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1365389_comment'></div>清泠窈窕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1365389_comment'></div>声闻下土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_168_1365389_comment'></div>披光若灭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_169_1365389_comment'></div>人得至天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_170_1365389_comment'></div>其崇信也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_171_1365389_comment'></div>如彼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_172_1365389_comment'></div>其安闲也如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_173_1365389_comment'></div>禅期乐净。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_174_1365389_comment'></div>道讵越于身心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_175_1365389_comment'></div>观岂恶嚣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_176_1365389_comment'></div>事已冥于世界。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_177_1365389_comment'></div>寺之梵众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_178_1365389_comment'></div>得无量无转不退轮永于斯也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_179_1365389_comment'></div>沙门圆实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_180_1365389_comment'></div>密行精苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_181_1365389_comment'></div>辩才酬对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_182_1365389_comment'></div>以尸臣之命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_183_1365389_comment'></div>功藏于宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_184_1365389_comment'></div>大夫之灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_185_1365389_comment'></div>德撰乎庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_186_1365389_comment'></div>矧夫清凉有地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_187_1365389_comment'></div>常所住持。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_188_1365389_comment'></div>忉利为天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_189_1365389_comment'></div>宛其相似。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_190_1365389_comment'></div>文殊以之演说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_191_1365389_comment'></div>耆城因而回向者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_192_1365389_comment'></div>复何如哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_193_1365389_comment'></div>雕而颂之可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_194_1365389_comment'></div>俾宣偈曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_195_1365389_comment'></div>洛之表兮伊之东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_196_1365389_comment'></div>山有香兮泉导蒙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_197_1365389_comment'></div>攒栌叠栱兮飞在空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_198_1365389_comment'></div>错石雕珉兮生梵宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_199_1365389_comment'></div>乘豁险兮开素波。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_200_1365389_comment'></div>望参差兮图䌽虹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_201_1365389_comment'></div>维妙力兮归大雄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_202_1365389_comment'></div>天竺之子心定惠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_203_1365389_comment'></div>转轮圣王道光济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_204_1365389_comment'></div>山之曲泉之涯兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_205_1365389_comment'></div>特胜缘与宏誓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_206_1365389_comment'></div>永安居而悟寂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_207_1365389_comment'></div>混群物而同契。</div><div id='poem_sentence_208_1365389_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=712&endYear=712')">712年2月</a>　本年居家守父丧，二月，撰司农卿刘仁景神道碑文。作品：《司农卿刘公神道碑》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《郁谱》不系此文。）</span><div id='poem_1365391' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365391' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365391?labeling=true' target='_blank'>司农卿刘公神道碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（712年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_1365391")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1365391_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365391'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365391'>君子之质。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365391_comment'></div>则有文也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365391_comment'></div>君子之备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365391_comment'></div>则有武也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365391_comment'></div>蕴其材而正直是与。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365391_comment'></div>行其道而刚柔迭用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365391_comment'></div>经德所以不回。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365391_comment'></div>称诗为之立礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365391_comment'></div>硕大之教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365391_comment'></div>闻于四海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365391_comment'></div>人爵之美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365391_comment'></div>奋于百代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365391_comment'></div>受天之祜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365391_comment'></div>不其然欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365391_comment'></div>公讳某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365391_comment'></div>字某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365391_comment'></div>彭城人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365391_comment'></div>皇矣汉祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365391_comment'></div>出自唐尧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365391_comment'></div>始则豢龙为事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365391_comment'></div>终而断蛇著符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365391_comment'></div>非卯金而勿王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365391_comment'></div>书之甲令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1365391_comment'></div>有盘石而命第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1365391_comment'></div>布在方册。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1365391_comment'></div>于昭庆灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1365391_comment'></div>诞发休绪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1365391_comment'></div>有隋之接统也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1365391_comment'></div>我曾祖讳某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1365391_comment'></div>仕至晋州刺史左卫大将军普安郡公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1365391_comment'></div>我大父讳某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1365391_comment'></div>仕至蔚州刺史袭普安郡公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1365391_comment'></div>皇运之纂图也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1365391_comment'></div>我先君讳某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1365391_comment'></div>仕至江王友上柱国袭普安公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1365391_comment'></div>追赠陈州刺史者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1365391_comment'></div>制连五之教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1365391_comment'></div>以乂其邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1365391_comment'></div>揽韬钤之英。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1365391_comment'></div>以和其众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1365391_comment'></div>从师友之训。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1365391_comment'></div>以崇其术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1365391_comment'></div>复公侯之业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1365391_comment'></div>以载其名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1365391_comment'></div>匪我先人保之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1365391_comment'></div>孰能后嗣达者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1365391_comment'></div>公即陈州府君之元子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1365391_comment'></div>纯洁浩素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1365391_comment'></div>直专静密。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1365391_comment'></div>外象威严。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1365391_comment'></div>内含光耀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1365391_comment'></div>弗诵于非圣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1365391_comment'></div>弗言于非法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1365391_comment'></div>虽迹系芜室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1365391_comment'></div>而心游坦涂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1365391_comment'></div>始有远大之誉矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1365391_comment'></div>弱冠修文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1365391_comment'></div>明经高第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1365391_comment'></div>解褐赵王文学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1365391_comment'></div>金门之宾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1365391_comment'></div>就以强学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1365391_comment'></div>玳席之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1365391_comment'></div>来而好问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1365391_comment'></div>迁荆州司户参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1365391_comment'></div>转汾州孝义益州晋元<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作源）</span>之二令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1365391_comment'></div>养能于掾吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1365391_comment'></div>大机未发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1365391_comment'></div>从政于宰君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1365391_comment'></div>中孚是用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1365391_comment'></div>三人为师之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1365391_comment'></div>更成乎魏美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1365391_comment'></div>四子讲德之乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1365391_comment'></div>益变乎夷俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1365391_comment'></div>以殊绩迁左卫长史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1365391_comment'></div>佐其戎昭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1365391_comment'></div>钦若军令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1365391_comment'></div>属永淳之岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1365391_comment'></div>元元亏稔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1365391_comment'></div>命公泛舟之役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1365391_comment'></div>穷于恒岱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1365391_comment'></div>委公开仓之利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1365391_comment'></div>济于幽燕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1365391_comment'></div>是宁邦本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1365391_comment'></div>繄赖家给。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1365391_comment'></div>还擢拜朝散大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1365391_comment'></div>迁原州都督府司马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1365391_comment'></div>仍统郡牧事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1365391_comment'></div>西至崆峒之隅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1365391_comment'></div>北经都卢之峡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1365391_comment'></div>其人好武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1365391_comment'></div>赓歌作咏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1365391_comment'></div>彼乘有駜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1365391_comment'></div>雅颂成章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1365391_comment'></div>豫博之连谋也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1365391_comment'></div>虽七国之胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1365391_comment'></div>兵锋惮于甚锐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1365391_comment'></div>而九州之雄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1365391_comment'></div>地势当其悬隔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1365391_comment'></div>拜公为齐州长史以镇之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1365391_comment'></div>难平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1365391_comment'></div>转沂鄜二州诸军事二州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1365391_comment'></div>令以条察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1365391_comment'></div>风以化迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1365391_comment'></div>愿冠者载穆其容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1365391_comment'></div>嬴锄者罔矜其色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1365391_comment'></div>连课第一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1365391_comment'></div>迁将作监。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1365391_comment'></div>寻加银青光禄大夫司仆卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1365391_comment'></div>惟匠有卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1365391_comment'></div>考百工之最。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1365391_comment'></div>惟仆有正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1365391_comment'></div>称六官之长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1365391_comment'></div>盖任能之迁矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1365391_comment'></div>大圣天后崇清庙而尊祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1365391_comment'></div>建明堂而配帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1365391_comment'></div>作城洫而量土圭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1365391_comment'></div>图山川而铸金鼎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1365391_comment'></div>缩板以载之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1365391_comment'></div>置筵以度之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1365391_comment'></div>三旬以成之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1365391_comment'></div>百物以备之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1365391_comment'></div>独任于公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1365391_comment'></div>不愆厥旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1365391_comment'></div>非博而稽其礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1365391_comment'></div>省而精其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1365391_comment'></div>则曷能臻于此乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1365391_comment'></div>戎羯之纵暴也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1365391_comment'></div>易之梯冲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1365391_comment'></div>颇亡其楼堞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1365391_comment'></div>魏之桑梓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1365391_comment'></div>尤固于藩篱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1365391_comment'></div>令公驰传检校魏州刺史以威之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1365391_comment'></div>寇平召之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1365391_comment'></div>犹领本职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1365391_comment'></div>复加将作大匠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1365391_comment'></div>长安东幸洛阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1365391_comment'></div>拜公为右卫将军司农卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1365391_comment'></div>转右金吾大将军副京师留守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1365391_comment'></div>出综金革。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1365391_comment'></div>比上台之礼者四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1365391_comment'></div>入司帑藏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1365391_comment'></div>分洪范之政者一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1365391_comment'></div>转呜呼<span class='inlineComment2'>（疑）</span>以盛其义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1365391_comment'></div>通僦以清其绪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1365391_comment'></div>由是采酂侯之典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1365391_comment'></div>因营宫室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1365391_comment'></div>奏齐人之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1365391_comment'></div>即回舆驾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1365391_comment'></div>至则兼领右羽林军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1365391_comment'></div>节悯之举兵也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1365391_comment'></div>谗臣构东朝之隙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1365391_comment'></div>上将膺北门之重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1365391_comment'></div>难无苟免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1365391_comment'></div>谋无苟合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1365391_comment'></div>君则有命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1365391_comment'></div>若将援于鼓旗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1365391_comment'></div>士咸有约。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1365391_comment'></div>不可犯其介冑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1365391_comment'></div>已而特授镇军大将军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1365391_comment'></div>封舒国公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1365391_comment'></div>食邑三千户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1365391_comment'></div>实封三百户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1365391_comment'></div>赐以金带衣物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1365391_comment'></div>重拜司农卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1365391_comment'></div>赏厥诚也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1365391_comment'></div>公以休咎由人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1365391_comment'></div>动者悔之始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1365391_comment'></div>盛衰自我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1365391_comment'></div>息者机之先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_168_1365391_comment'></div>故在物害盈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_169_1365391_comment'></div>谦而受福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_170_1365391_comment'></div>及引年辞事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_171_1365391_comment'></div>老而得礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_172_1365391_comment'></div>于是乞骸骨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_173_1365391_comment'></div>抗章疏者至于再三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_174_1365391_comment'></div>朝廷嘉而遂之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_175_1365391_comment'></div>门列行马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_176_1365391_comment'></div>室县安车。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_177_1365391_comment'></div>远寓于氾右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_178_1365391_comment'></div>近持于越宝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_179_1365391_comment'></div>闲心用晦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_180_1365391_comment'></div>物有自亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_181_1365391_comment'></div>启足归全。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_182_1365391_comment'></div>神无所祷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_183_1365391_comment'></div>享年七十有七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_184_1365391_comment'></div>以景龙三年太岁癸酉十二月十五日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_185_1365391_comment'></div>薨于长安光德里之私第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_186_1365391_comment'></div>天子辍朝以咨悼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_187_1365391_comment'></div>都人罢肆以伤恻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_188_1365391_comment'></div>齐之丧婴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_189_1365391_comment'></div>郑之亡产。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_190_1365391_comment'></div>无以过也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_191_1365391_comment'></div>乃追赠持节都督兖州诸军事兖州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_192_1365391_comment'></div>降使吊祭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_193_1365391_comment'></div>赐锦衾襚服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_194_1365391_comment'></div>官给丧事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_195_1365391_comment'></div>京官六品一人监护。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_196_1365391_comment'></div>太常考行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_197_1365391_comment'></div>谥曰贞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_198_1365391_comment'></div>夫忠者期于尽命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_199_1365391_comment'></div>孝者贵于立身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_200_1365391_comment'></div>义者厚于利物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_201_1365391_comment'></div>信者多于庇人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_202_1365391_comment'></div>犹五材行而不可阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_203_1365391_comment'></div>五味足而不可废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_204_1365391_comment'></div>则安夷险。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_205_1365391_comment'></div>保明哲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_206_1365391_comment'></div>太社于是乎锡其风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_207_1365391_comment'></div>太常于是乎旌其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_208_1365391_comment'></div>练识而言罔毁誉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_209_1365391_comment'></div>避荣而交非谄黩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_210_1365391_comment'></div>以温良恭俭之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_211_1365391_comment'></div>知进退存亡之机。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_212_1365391_comment'></div>然后指青门之路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_213_1365391_comment'></div>美贤于疏广。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_214_1365391_comment'></div>登洪波之台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_215_1365391_comment'></div>长立于周舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_216_1365391_comment'></div>于公得之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_217_1365391_comment'></div>粤某年月日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_218_1365391_comment'></div>葬于某所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_219_1365391_comment'></div>礼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_220_1365391_comment'></div>美哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_221_1365391_comment'></div>汉宫宏敞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_222_1365391_comment'></div>承明在其北。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_223_1365391_comment'></div>秦岭连属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_224_1365391_comment'></div>太白拒其南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_225_1365391_comment'></div>思上都之冠盖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_226_1365391_comment'></div>望先茔之碑表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_227_1365391_comment'></div>此又臣子之不忘也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_228_1365391_comment'></div>其孤卫尉少卿曰茂道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_229_1365391_comment'></div>群纪为俦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_230_1365391_comment'></div>荀何是则。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_231_1365391_comment'></div>二世之业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_232_1365391_comment'></div>代仍其位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_233_1365391_comment'></div>三年之制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_234_1365391_comment'></div>丧过乎哀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_235_1365391_comment'></div>以为有初有终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_236_1365391_comment'></div>畴庸之道斯远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_237_1365391_comment'></div>匪雕匪刻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_238_1365391_comment'></div>补代之图盖寡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_239_1365391_comment'></div>荒惟授旐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_240_1365391_comment'></div>菲也披文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_241_1365391_comment'></div>乃作铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_242_1365391_comment'></div>炎汉之灵兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_243_1365391_comment'></div>纂尧之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_244_1365391_comment'></div>粤若介弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_245_1365391_comment'></div>受封南国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_246_1365391_comment'></div>为侯为王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_247_1365391_comment'></div>休有其光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_248_1365391_comment'></div>四牡奕奕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_249_1365391_comment'></div>赤茀金舄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_250_1365391_comment'></div>降尔遐福兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_251_1365391_comment'></div>邦之仁人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_252_1365391_comment'></div>昭尔懿行兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_253_1365391_comment'></div>朝之荩臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_254_1365391_comment'></div>我有忠烈兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_255_1365391_comment'></div>以为之宝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_256_1365391_comment'></div>我有荣华兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_257_1365391_comment'></div>何适非道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_258_1365391_comment'></div>躬清明兮翔廖廓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_259_1365391_comment'></div>佩金紫兮富圭爵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_260_1365391_comment'></div>日冉冉兮亟回薄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_261_1365391_comment'></div>岁峥嵘兮其摇落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_262_1365391_comment'></div>吾将追于祖疏兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_263_1365391_comment'></div>噫何为而葬霍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_264_1365391_comment'></div>龙山趾兮凤城端。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_265_1365391_comment'></div>青霭深兮白露漙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_266_1365391_comment'></div>混群物以共尽兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_267_1365391_comment'></div>揭之丰碑之是刊。</div><div id='poem_sentence_268_1365391_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=712&endYear=712')">712年</a>　本年居家守父丧，撰唐璿神道碑文。作品：《右仆射太子少师唐璿神道碑》<div id='poem_1365392' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365392' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365392?labeling=true' target='_blank'>右仆射太子少师唐璿神道碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（712年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_1365392")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1365392_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365392'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365392'>钦若于天者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365392_comment'></div>谓之代工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365392_comment'></div>覆冒于人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365392_comment'></div>谓之成务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365392_comment'></div>则调元气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365392_comment'></div>法三象。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365392_comment'></div>鼓洪炉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365392_comment'></div>宜万物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365392_comment'></div>其代工成务之本也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365392_comment'></div>大僚所以服其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365392_comment'></div>明先正所以诏其功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365392_comment'></div>卜熊罴所以占其兆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365392_comment'></div>从龙虎所以合其应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365392_comment'></div>匪徒然而已哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365392_comment'></div>有唐元老宋公侯矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365392_comment'></div>公讳璿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365392_comment'></div>字休璟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365392_comment'></div>晋昌酒泉人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365392_comment'></div>昔在夏商。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365392_comment'></div>大夫陈其氏姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365392_comment'></div>洎迁汾晋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365392_comment'></div>季子听其声乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365392_comment'></div>岂轩之后唐之遗乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1365392_comment'></div>既仕楚而闻魏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1365392_comment'></div>亦家秦而灭项。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1365392_comment'></div>凉武昭王揽中州之杰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1365392_comment'></div>居右地之盟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1365392_comment'></div>七代祖晋昌宣王和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1365392_comment'></div>佐厥威霸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1365392_comment'></div>守其夷险。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1365392_comment'></div>故累为郡之首族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1365392_comment'></div>粤宣王逮我曾祖骠骑大将军开府仪同三司赠兖<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作襄）</span>州刺史讳某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1365392_comment'></div>世位大将军二千石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1365392_comment'></div>大父洛阳令朔方郡赞特赠秦州都督讳某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1365392_comment'></div>烈考咸阳令赠岐州刺史讳某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1365392_comment'></div>操斧钺班圭瑞者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1365392_comment'></div>耀洪烈于四世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1365392_comment'></div>垂馀风于百里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1365392_comment'></div>于穆不已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1365392_comment'></div>莫之与京。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1365392_comment'></div>公初髫而孤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1365392_comment'></div>入则孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1365392_comment'></div>出则悌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1365392_comment'></div>承于母兄之旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1365392_comment'></div>及冠而立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1365392_comment'></div>学以聚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1365392_comment'></div>问以辨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1365392_comment'></div>从于师党之言焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1365392_comment'></div>张嘉运先授于易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1365392_comment'></div>森然可见者万象。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1365392_comment'></div>贾公彦次授于礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1365392_comment'></div>坦然可观者百度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1365392_comment'></div>射策高第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1365392_comment'></div>初补吴王典签。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1365392_comment'></div>历绵州巴西尉同州冯翊主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1365392_comment'></div>弗之好也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1365392_comment'></div>尝欲屠郅支。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1365392_comment'></div>刺楼兰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1365392_comment'></div>执浑邪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1365392_comment'></div>逐呼韩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1365392_comment'></div>始自谋于将帅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1365392_comment'></div>终见器于公辅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1365392_comment'></div>遂为疏勒道行军从事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1365392_comment'></div>策勋至上柱国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1365392_comment'></div>授营州都督府户曹参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1365392_comment'></div>寻以朝散大夫检校朔州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1365392_comment'></div>盖养能而成绩矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1365392_comment'></div>转安西副都护检校庭州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1365392_comment'></div>长寿中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1365392_comment'></div>武威军大总管王孝杰之复四镇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1365392_comment'></div>实赖其谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1365392_comment'></div>表公为西州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1365392_comment'></div>涉龟沙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1365392_comment'></div>薄乌垒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1365392_comment'></div>矛精绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1365392_comment'></div>慰渠犁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1365392_comment'></div>此之谓也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1365392_comment'></div>公至则扶厥伤止其擅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1365392_comment'></div>因所利补其阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1365392_comment'></div>故西州之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1365392_comment'></div>刻石而建碑焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1365392_comment'></div>无何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1365392_comment'></div>迁灵州都督新昌军防御营田等使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1365392_comment'></div>入萧关。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1365392_comment'></div>杀都尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1365392_comment'></div>绝梓岭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1365392_comment'></div>讨符离。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1365392_comment'></div>此之谓也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1365392_comment'></div>公至则城彼方要其险。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1365392_comment'></div>狎诸野垦其实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1365392_comment'></div>故北地之大者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1365392_comment'></div>有备而无讨矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1365392_comment'></div>就加银青光禄大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1365392_comment'></div>入拜左豹韬将军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1365392_comment'></div>迁司卫卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1365392_comment'></div>未几。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1365392_comment'></div>摄右肃政大夫检校凉州都尉假节陇右诸军事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1365392_comment'></div>参警夜之肃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1365392_comment'></div>严不时之禁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1365392_comment'></div>事典之常者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1365392_comment'></div>惟公是迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1365392_comment'></div>受南宪之宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1365392_comment'></div>总西方之役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1365392_comment'></div>邦家之急者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1365392_comment'></div>繄公是任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1365392_comment'></div>其年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1365392_comment'></div>曲莽布支率种落数万寇于洪源也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1365392_comment'></div>公训钲镯完甲兵以御之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1365392_comment'></div>虏见积尸之凶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1365392_comment'></div>我悬斩级之赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1365392_comment'></div>遁则忘草。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1365392_comment'></div>在而蒙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1365392_comment'></div>他他籍籍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1365392_comment'></div>不可胜云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1365392_comment'></div>朝实休之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1365392_comment'></div>除右武卫右金吾二大将军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1365392_comment'></div>俾仍旧镇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1365392_comment'></div>虽贵而不留中也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1365392_comment'></div>先后稽六官之本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1365392_comment'></div>思五法之要。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1365392_comment'></div>自我聪明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1365392_comment'></div>惟天照鉴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1365392_comment'></div>乃拜公文昌夏官尚书同凤阁鸾台平章事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1365392_comment'></div>隐心而行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1365392_comment'></div>正色不挠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1365392_comment'></div>功多微管。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1365392_comment'></div>议切安刘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1365392_comment'></div>中宗之践副君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1365392_comment'></div>旁求中庶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1365392_comment'></div>特转公太子右庶子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1365392_comment'></div>加金紫光禄大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1365392_comment'></div>知政如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1365392_comment'></div>召绮里而称叔孙也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1365392_comment'></div>属驾言北垂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1365392_comment'></div>薄伐东鄙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1365392_comment'></div>复公为夏官尚书兼幽营二州都督安东都护。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1365392_comment'></div>按河北之州军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1365392_comment'></div>自弼鄘巡辽碣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1365392_comment'></div>贪夫廉而忌法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1365392_comment'></div>战士逸而待寇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1365392_comment'></div>且有伦要。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1365392_comment'></div>而无怨讟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1365392_comment'></div>神功初徵拜辅国大将军同中书门下三品。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1365392_comment'></div>迁特进尚书右仆射。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1365392_comment'></div>食实封三百户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1365392_comment'></div>已而居守秦雍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1365392_comment'></div>今之揆路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1365392_comment'></div>古曰台司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1365392_comment'></div>百寮师师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1365392_comment'></div>万事理也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1365392_comment'></div>分郡关而典之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1365392_comment'></div>镇京师以留之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1365392_comment'></div>岂富人之始封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1365392_comment'></div>亦酂侯之大任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1365392_comment'></div>位益高而勇退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1365392_comment'></div>年愈迈而思止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1365392_comment'></div>抗闻旒扆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1365392_comment'></div>密奏封章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1365392_comment'></div>久之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1365392_comment'></div>听致仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1365392_comment'></div>进封宋国公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1365392_comment'></div>朝朔望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1365392_comment'></div>天子方崇文太学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1365392_comment'></div>讲武宣扬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1365392_comment'></div>延首鸿儒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1365392_comment'></div>倾心硕老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1365392_comment'></div>复以公为太子少师监修国史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1365392_comment'></div>乞言而书法也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1365392_comment'></div>景云初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_168_1365392_comment'></div>匈奴请公主盟使臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_169_1365392_comment'></div>为约未坚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_170_1365392_comment'></div>致辞或绐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_171_1365392_comment'></div>因命公为特进检校御史大夫朔方军大总管以御之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_172_1365392_comment'></div>仗宸威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_173_1365392_comment'></div>肃戎令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_174_1365392_comment'></div>人莫闻于吠犬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_175_1365392_comment'></div>骑宁惮于射雕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_176_1365392_comment'></div>举则全师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_177_1365392_comment'></div>还而罢事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_178_1365392_comment'></div>将弃轩冕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_179_1365392_comment'></div>神明芝术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_180_1365392_comment'></div>然邦有大礼乐大政刑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_181_1365392_comment'></div>率由典谟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_182_1365392_comment'></div>罔不咨度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_183_1365392_comment'></div>享年八十有六。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_184_1365392_comment'></div>景命不造。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_185_1365392_comment'></div>延和元年七月戊子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_186_1365392_comment'></div>薨于长安怀真里第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_187_1365392_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_188_1365392_comment'></div>皇上闻哀撤悬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_189_1365392_comment'></div>出次挥涕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_190_1365392_comment'></div>追柳庄而亟命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_191_1365392_comment'></div>思郑产而安归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_192_1365392_comment'></div>制赠使持节都督荆州诸军事荆州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_193_1365392_comment'></div>赠物四百段。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_194_1365392_comment'></div>米粟四百石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_195_1365392_comment'></div>丧事官给。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_196_1365392_comment'></div>仍差官四品一人监护。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_197_1365392_comment'></div>有加等也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_198_1365392_comment'></div>太常考行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_199_1365392_comment'></div>谥曰忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_200_1365392_comment'></div>书不云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_201_1365392_comment'></div>殷之得傅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_202_1365392_comment'></div>用训朕志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_203_1365392_comment'></div>而承其道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_204_1365392_comment'></div>雅不云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_205_1365392_comment'></div>周之命程。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_206_1365392_comment'></div>是用戒我师而就其绪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_207_1365392_comment'></div>于戏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_208_1365392_comment'></div>惟公浚明前典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_209_1365392_comment'></div>允迪古训。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_210_1365392_comment'></div>总而成之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_211_1365392_comment'></div>入则献规。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_212_1365392_comment'></div>出不言政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_213_1365392_comment'></div>石建孔光之比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_214_1365392_comment'></div>决胜千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_215_1365392_comment'></div>通知四夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_216_1365392_comment'></div>子房充国之亚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_217_1365392_comment'></div>为将军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_218_1365392_comment'></div>尊重于位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_219_1365392_comment'></div>而谢宾客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_220_1365392_comment'></div>公之不敢专。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_221_1365392_comment'></div>为丞相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_222_1365392_comment'></div>开陈其端。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_223_1365392_comment'></div>以归人主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_224_1365392_comment'></div>公之不敢伐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_225_1365392_comment'></div>如是则镂彝器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_226_1365392_comment'></div>图旂常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_227_1365392_comment'></div>载史官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_228_1365392_comment'></div>列盟府矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_229_1365392_comment'></div>夫翠鹄犀象。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_230_1365392_comment'></div>非不鸷也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_231_1365392_comment'></div>有其用则不全。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_232_1365392_comment'></div>麟凤龟龙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_233_1365392_comment'></div>非不灵也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_234_1365392_comment'></div>无其时则不至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_235_1365392_comment'></div>若乃时已偕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_236_1365392_comment'></div>用不竭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_237_1365392_comment'></div>身已康。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_238_1365392_comment'></div>名不灭者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_239_1365392_comment'></div>既明而且哲也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_240_1365392_comment'></div>公上惟祖祢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_241_1365392_comment'></div>傍至功缌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_242_1365392_comment'></div>顷于槐里之閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_243_1365392_comment'></div>堇原之右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_244_1365392_comment'></div>卜其兆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_245_1365392_comment'></div>图其域。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_246_1365392_comment'></div>各以族而为之度焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_247_1365392_comment'></div>临薨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_248_1365392_comment'></div>戒诸子曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_249_1365392_comment'></div>俭则自完。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_250_1365392_comment'></div>孝不忘本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_251_1365392_comment'></div>吾之志矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_252_1365392_comment'></div>嗣子陈州刺史先慎左千牛中郎将先择等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_253_1365392_comment'></div>克奉遗命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_254_1365392_comment'></div>能循懿业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_255_1365392_comment'></div>以年月日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_256_1365392_comment'></div>葬于旧茔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_257_1365392_comment'></div>亡夫人太原王氏从祔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_258_1365392_comment'></div>礼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_259_1365392_comment'></div>昔禽息进里奚于秦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_260_1365392_comment'></div>而穆公之政厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_261_1365392_comment'></div>虞邱进叔敖于楚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_262_1365392_comment'></div>而庄王之力霸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_263_1365392_comment'></div>故有代祀而代禄焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_264_1365392_comment'></div>则我师臣计功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_265_1365392_comment'></div>允子宏风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_266_1365392_comment'></div>小彼秦楚之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_267_1365392_comment'></div>大哉韦平之烈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_268_1365392_comment'></div>谋可久者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_269_1365392_comment'></div>敢作铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_270_1365392_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_271_1365392'>稽古陶唐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_271_1365392_comment'></div>惟帝之初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_272_1365392_comment'></div>迁虞事夏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_273_1365392_comment'></div>俾侯而居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_274_1365392_comment'></div>曾盘峻峙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_275_1365392_comment'></div>令德之祉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_276_1365392_comment'></div>亦曰绵系。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_277_1365392_comment'></div>诞生君子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_278_1365392_comment'></div>君子伊何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_279_1365392_comment'></div>邦之宰臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_280_1365392_comment'></div>宰臣伊何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_281_1365392_comment'></div>秉我洪钧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_282_1365392_comment'></div>登于庙堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_283_1365392_comment'></div>王则是保。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_284_1365392_comment'></div>服于戎狄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_285_1365392_comment'></div>公常致讨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_286_1365392_comment'></div>事惟一心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_287_1365392_comment'></div>恭乃三命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_288_1365392_comment'></div>崇让<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_289_1365392", 1365392, "Clauses/289/Comments/0")'>颐老</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_289_1365392_comment'></div>归闲体正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_290_1365392_comment'></div>天也不慭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_291_1365392_comment'></div>人之云亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_292_1365392_comment'></div>大夫掌域。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_293_1365392_comment'></div>群公会丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_294_1365392_comment'></div>咸阳北坂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_295_1365392_comment'></div>渭水南渡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_296_1365392_comment'></div>其如邢山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_297_1365392_comment'></div>永此防墓。</div><div id='poem_sentence_298_1365392_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=712&endYear=712')">712年12月</a>　本年居家守父丧，十二月，撰元通大居士法云公赠司徒虢国公万回大师赞。作品：《元通大居士法云公赠司徒虢国公万回大师赞》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《郁谱》不系此文。）</span><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365372'>法本无著，而乃强名。<div id='poem_sentence_0_1365372_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1365372'>名言则断，法止不生。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1365372_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1365372'>应化得真，示空归有。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1365372_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1365372'>言似或中，法皆虚受。<div id='poem_sentence_3_1365372_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1365372'>以心观心，无净无垢。<div id='poem_sentence_4_1365372_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_1365372'></div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1365372_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=713&endYear=713')">713年</a>　本年春，服阙由前太常少卿迁工部侍郎，袭父爵许国公。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=713&endYear=713')">713年1月15日</a>　苏颋与李乂为甥舅行，虽不是亲舅，但二人关系密切，故常在一起唱和，有诗。作品：《和黄门舅十五夜作》<div id='poem_33790' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_33790' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/33790?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和黄门舅十五夜作</a><span class='authorDate'>（713年1月15日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_33790")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_33790_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_33790'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_33790'>闻君陌上来，歌管沸相催。<div id='poem_sentence_0_33790_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_33790'>孤月连明照，千灯合暗开。<div id='poem_sentence_1_33790_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_33790'>宝装游骑出，香绕看车回。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=713&endYear=713')">713年5月</a>　祭酒韦嗣立留守东京期间，作素木盘盂，分诸好事，苏颋乘传至洛阳，亦以此器分之，颋遂作此文以纪其事。作品：《素木盘盂铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《陈谱》系开元二年三月十七日前。）</span><div id='poem_1365384' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365384' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365384?labeling=true' target='_blank'>素木盘盂铭</a><span id='poem_sentence_0_1365384'>先天岁夏五月。颋蒙恩旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365384_comment'></div>传还洛京。时韦祭酒丈人任膺居守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365384_comment'></div>尝撰素木盘盂。分诸好事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365384_comment'></div>颋既至。丈人垂眷犹昔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365384_comment'></div>衔衣抚孤。得拜清颜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365384_comment'></div>诉穷款于此矣。他日复往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365384_comment'></div>又以木器分之。亦颁斯惠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365384_comment'></div>岂散则当弃。木有先容而见知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365384_comment'></div>岂朴则能坚。器有晚成而获赠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365384_comment'></div>睹以为诫。仍邀作铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365384_comment'></div>退而力鄙。惧不如命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365384_comment'></div>山有木兮。全真而生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365384_comment'></div>君子器之。审用而成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365384_comment'></div>浑则不矫。受则不盈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365384_comment'></div>辩以文直。牢因素真。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365384_comment'></div>抱朴委性。诫奢远名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365384_comment'></div>虑终谋始。能合道精。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365384_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1365384_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365118_comment'></div>金紫光禄大夫守尚书左仆射知军国大事兼修国史上柱国徐国公刘幽求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365118_comment'></div>伟量天假。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1365310_comment'></div>副朕饥渴之怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1365310_comment'></div>庶广搜扬之义。</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1365310_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=713&endYear=713')">713年11月8日</a>　本年十一月八日，玄宗李隆基即位，颇有古帝贤王之风，命张说等两省侍臣讲读，便是其表现之一。苏颋当加知制诰，故代为撰此文。作品：《命张说等两省侍臣讲读敕》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=713&endYear=713')">713年11月22日</a>　本年十一月二十二日，张说有史才，玄宗朝监修国史，此为首次。苏颋当加知制诰，故代拟制敕之文。作品：《张说等监修国史敕》<div id='poem_1365295' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365295' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365295?labeling=true' target='_blank'>张说监修国史等制</a><span class='authorDate'>（713年11月22日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365295'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365295'>敕。古之王者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365295_comment'></div>代有史臣。以日系月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365295_comment'></div>属词比事。举而则书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365295_comment'></div>用存有法。事而不法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365295_comment'></div>是谓空言。盖褎贬之重慎也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365295_comment'></div>自非经术文雅。进德修业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365295_comment'></div>出忠入孝。匡俗佐时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365295_comment'></div>惟朕宝臣。有邦良辅者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365295_comment'></div>孰可综覈班纪。发挥苍籀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365295_comment'></div>银青光禄大夫守中书令上柱国燕国公张说银青光禄大夫守兵部尚书同中书门下平章三品上柱国梁郡开国公姚元之等。并可监修国史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365295_comment'></div>馀各如故。主者施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365295_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1365295_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=713&endYear=713')">713年11月28日</a>　本年十一月二十八日，群臣上表，请加尊号为开元神武皇帝，玄宗从之。苏颋当加知制诰，故代拟制敕之文。作品：《开元神武皇帝册文》<div id='poem_1365332' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365332' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365332?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上开元神武皇帝册文</a><span class='authorDate'>（713年11月28日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_1365332")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1365332_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365332'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365332'>维先天二年岁次癸丑十一月辛酉朔二十八日戊子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365332_comment'></div>摄太尉臣某等文武官六千五百一十四人言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365332_comment'></div>臣闻厥初生人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365332_comment'></div>首出庶物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365332_comment'></div>物不自理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365332_comment'></div>惟后可以康乂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365332_comment'></div>后不自专。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365332_comment'></div>惟人所以归往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365332_comment'></div>古先哲后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365332_comment'></div>安人育物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365332_comment'></div>表功崇号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365332_comment'></div>不可避也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365332_comment'></div>皇矣上帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365332_comment'></div>临于巨唐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365332_comment'></div>降氤氲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365332_comment'></div>垂耿光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365332_comment'></div>重熙而累盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365332_comment'></div>至太皇而授圣皇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365332_comment'></div>臣等敢稽首而言曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365332_comment'></div>曩者景龙之末。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365332_comment'></div>长蛇纵祸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365332_comment'></div>陛下虑宗社之堕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365332_comment'></div>提剑而夷之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1365332_comment'></div>则因亲以尊主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1365332_comment'></div>閒者朝有贼臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1365332_comment'></div>天罚大憝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1365332_comment'></div>陛下拯邦家之难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1365332_comment'></div>援旗而剿之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1365332_comment'></div>则措枉以举直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1365332_comment'></div>戮不及嗣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1365332_comment'></div>恶惟其魁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1365332_comment'></div>思与王公卿士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1365332_comment'></div>下逮元元。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1365332_comment'></div>扬闿择而育和气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1365332_comment'></div>臣又闻轩梦华胥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1365332_comment'></div>尧期姑射。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1365332_comment'></div>未有一其道而顺太皇之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1365332_comment'></div>文王昭事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1365332_comment'></div>武王缉熙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1365332_comment'></div>未有一其时而居圣神之位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1365332_comment'></div>褰裳释重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1365332_comment'></div>至公也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1365332_comment'></div>端冕向明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1365332_comment'></div>至孝也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1365332_comment'></div>使九族敦叙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1365332_comment'></div>百工允釐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1365332_comment'></div>东西南北。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1365332_comment'></div>砥砺声教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1365332_comment'></div>彼灵有四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1365332_comment'></div>招翠黄而可乘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1365332_comment'></div>我宝有三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1365332_comment'></div>捐珠玉而不御。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1365332_comment'></div>然犹发挥礼乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1365332_comment'></div>驰骛典坟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1365332_comment'></div>论思献纳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1365332_comment'></div>进善从谏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1365332_comment'></div>罔不亨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1365332_comment'></div>元者善也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1365332_comment'></div>罔不利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1365332_comment'></div>神者圣也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1365332_comment'></div>罔不通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1365332_comment'></div>武者威也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1365332_comment'></div>罔不服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1365332_comment'></div>臣等不胜大愿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1365332_comment'></div>昧死上尊号曰开元神武皇帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1365332_comment'></div>谨上。</div><div id='poem_sentence_72_1365332_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=713&endYear=713')">713年</a>　苏颋当在加知制诰任，故代拟制敕之文。作品：《授韩休起居郎制》《授贺知章起居郎制》《授刘知柔尚书右丞制》《授裴漼兵部侍郎制》《授张景升刑部员外郎制》《授尹思贞御史大夫制》《授慕客珣侍御史制》《授嗣郑王希言右卫大将军制》《授崔圭太子左庶子制》《授杨廉陕王傅制》《唐河南龙门天竺寺碑》《授韦振通事舍人制》《授李全昌工部员外郎制》《授王琪水部员外郎制》《授房光义光禄卿制》《授魏悫太子司议郎制》《授元钦裕栎阳县令制》《授温慎微扬府司马制》《太清观钟铭》<div id='poem_sentence_1_1365138_comment'></div>探学精微。属词婉丽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365138_comment'></div>甲科对策。尝副求贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365138_comment'></div>左史记言。用观书法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365138_comment'></div>可行起居郎。散官如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365138_comment'></div></div><div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365177_comment'></div>必能条理前弊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365177_comment'></div>发挥旧章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1365177_comment'></div>式允登车之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1365177_comment'></div>可御史大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1365177_comment'></div>封勋如故。<div id='poem_sentence_0_1365182_comment'></div>志竭忠谠。才充学行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365182_comment'></div>方书之允。门传御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365182_comment'></div>直绳必践。廷奏奸人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365182_comment'></div>凛然生风。不避当道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365182_comment'></div>丑正非罪。遗贤久叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365182_comment'></div>长鲸已戮。击隼方秋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365210_comment'></div>才推近属。行禀中和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365210_comment'></div>用沈毅以为谋。体直方而成器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365210_comment'></div>频升列之位。尝践执金之秩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365210_comment'></div>历官斯久。更事逾深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365210_comment'></div>可云麾将军守右卫大将军。勋封如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365210_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1365210_comment'></div></div></div><div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365232_comment'></div>宫坊效职。声实攸归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365232_comment'></div>曾是递迁。宜从后命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365232_comment'></div>可太子左庶子。散官勋如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365232_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1365232_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1365252' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365252' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365252?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授杨廉陕王傅制</a><span class='authorDate'>（713年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_1365252")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1365252_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365252'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365252'>门下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365252_comment'></div>利建子弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365252_comment'></div>旁求师傅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365252_comment'></div>委之训导。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365252_comment'></div>必举方直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365252_comment'></div>银青光禄大夫前岐州刺史上柱国归义县开国男杨廉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365252_comment'></div>外示静默。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365252_comment'></div>言将发而寡辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365252_comment'></div>内敷条理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365252_comment'></div>德不孤而应物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365252_comment'></div>故能游艺聚学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365252_comment'></div>修官辨政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365252_comment'></div>台阁尽清华之选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365252_comment'></div>吏人怀抚贷之馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365252_comment'></div>仪刑是称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365252_comment'></div>参议斯在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365252_comment'></div>当肄业于邹衍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365252_comment'></div>俾赋诗于韦孟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365252_comment'></div>可陕王傅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365252_comment'></div>勋封如故。<div class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365389?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唐河南龙门天竺寺碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（711年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_1365389")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1365389_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365389'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365389'>形器分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365389_comment'></div>有宰匠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365389_comment'></div>名言立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365389_comment'></div>有导师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365389_comment'></div>上圣卓然大仙之旨也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365389_comment'></div>定融于惠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365389_comment'></div>惠无不明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365389_comment'></div>明證于觉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365389_comment'></div>觉无不定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365389_comment'></div>虚其照然观我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365389_comment'></div>动以权而应物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365389_comment'></div>智周斯大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365389_comment'></div>功利斯远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365389_comment'></div>继善者循乎业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365389_comment'></div>欲仁者适乎变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365389_comment'></div>业乃至于无相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365389_comment'></div>变复存于有作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365389_comment'></div>使因城之广。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365389_comment'></div>刹土之严。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365389_comment'></div>其来尚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365389_comment'></div>天竺寺者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365389_comment'></div>天竺王子避位出家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365389_comment'></div>三藏法师宝思惟之立也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1365389_comment'></div>夫所宗谓道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1365389_comment'></div>道崇可让位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1365389_comment'></div>况生于佛国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1365389_comment'></div>所慕惟法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1365389_comment'></div>法住可济时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1365389_comment'></div>况行于人代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1365389_comment'></div>其吴季子安世高之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1365389_comment'></div>鲁仲尼康僧会之徒欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1365389_comment'></div>不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1365389_comment'></div>何以谛俗归真。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1365389_comment'></div>秉彝宏教之极也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1365389_comment'></div>故誓于东震。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1365389_comment'></div>发自南离。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1365389_comment'></div>藏戒珠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1365389_comment'></div>却商宝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1365389_comment'></div>陵海涨而绝云岛矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1365389_comment'></div>属䑦倾其五两。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1365389_comment'></div>馀皇折其三翼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1365389_comment'></div>法师于呀呷渺㳽之际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1365389_comment'></div>睹观世音像一躯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1365389_comment'></div>随而载之凡七夕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1365389_comment'></div>观音则圣极于既堕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1365389_comment'></div>迦叶以神形于既没。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1365389_comment'></div>海可以化为之迹变入诸身若是乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1365389_comment'></div>海本如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1365389_comment'></div>则荆陷莫致瓜步。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1365389_comment'></div>浮杯遂往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1365389_comment'></div>孰喻乘桴于中道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1365389_comment'></div>舍筏于彼岸邪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1365389_comment'></div>至则冕旒赞叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1365389_comment'></div>京师翕习。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1365389_comment'></div>意吉之友而仍得自摩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1365389_comment'></div>眷之更生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1365389_comment'></div>与之纽解徵而张绝绪也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1365389_comment'></div>始憩西明寺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1365389_comment'></div>译金光明楞伽文殊师利咒藏广博严净陀罗尼浴像功德大宝积等经七部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1365389_comment'></div>顾而言曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1365389_comment'></div>机轮未兆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1365389_comment'></div>碍之殊域。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1365389_comment'></div>志成已信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1365389_comment'></div>乘之坦涂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1365389_comment'></div>今微言载剔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1365389_comment'></div>密藏咸启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1365389_comment'></div>吾其往矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1365389_comment'></div>况求法不二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1365389_comment'></div>解空第一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1365389_comment'></div>竟超西阖之群。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1365389_comment'></div>必择东林之众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1365389_comment'></div>常谓洛京阙塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1365389_comment'></div>山断川流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1365389_comment'></div>枕城池于正阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1365389_comment'></div>当日月于亭午。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1365389_comment'></div>脉脉中泻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1365389_comment'></div>逶迤左薄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1365389_comment'></div>黄道映以为界。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1365389_comment'></div>翠屏临而见空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1365389_comment'></div>天下地势之寄也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1365389_comment'></div>故宝塔曾盘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1365389_comment'></div>镜龛延袤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1365389_comment'></div>御梯凭下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1365389_comment'></div>敷座因高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1365389_comment'></div>具次八四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1365389_comment'></div>方成万亿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1365389_comment'></div>皆默而许之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1365389_comment'></div>感遂通者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1365389_comment'></div>法师乃乱流东济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1365389_comment'></div>止彼香山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1365389_comment'></div>又于山北见龙泉二所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1365389_comment'></div>洞澈深浅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1365389_comment'></div>则铺丹孕碧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1365389_comment'></div>噀珠连而上跳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1365389_comment'></div>回夐经复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1365389_comment'></div>则小雨微风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1365389_comment'></div>点琼析而傍散。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1365389_comment'></div>积砾摇动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1365389_comment'></div>光辉自然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1365389_comment'></div>琉璃混成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1365389_comment'></div>毛发可数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1365389_comment'></div>法师乐之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1365389_comment'></div>爰创方丈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1365389_comment'></div>邻于咫尺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1365389_comment'></div>坚持愿力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1365389_comment'></div>善诱檀心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1365389_comment'></div>皆撤无之欢豫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1365389_comment'></div>尽布金之须达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1365389_comment'></div>更于其侧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1365389_comment'></div>造浮图精舍焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1365389_comment'></div>飞观遥峙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1365389_comment'></div>仙茎崛起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1365389_comment'></div>远而趋之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1365389_comment'></div>虚空缥缈于其閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1365389_comment'></div>近而察之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1365389_comment'></div>岑壑青荧于表里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1365389_comment'></div>羌难得而名也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1365389_comment'></div>景云岁辛亥月建已日辛卯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1365389_comment'></div>制以法师所造寺赐名曰天竺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1365389_comment'></div>维皇建极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1365389_comment'></div>与天比崇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1365389_comment'></div>教设而风靡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1365389_comment'></div>化行而日用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1365389_comment'></div>法师不忘本而遂初乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1365389_comment'></div>殿中侍御史赵国李畬字玉田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1365389_comment'></div>育粹含采。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1365389_comment'></div>妙机强学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1365389_comment'></div>佑其垂成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1365389_comment'></div>宪以从事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1365389_comment'></div>法师即于山之东偏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1365389_comment'></div>建丈六石龛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1365389_comment'></div>匪泐而攻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1365389_comment'></div>载追而琢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1365389_comment'></div>四众围绕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1365389_comment'></div>万人唱和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1365389_comment'></div>疑陇埏之朝隤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1365389_comment'></div>状罗浮之暗徙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1365389_comment'></div>则圆焰石乳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1365389_comment'></div>凝阴水精。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1365389_comment'></div>香封韫玉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1365389_comment'></div>花洒交璎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1365389_comment'></div>谅殊特也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1365389_comment'></div>若乃立三会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1365389_comment'></div>开八关。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1365389_comment'></div>撞鸿钟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1365389_comment'></div>伐灵鼓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1365389_comment'></div>引清梵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1365389_comment'></div>称神咒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1365389_comment'></div>向之双泉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1365389_comment'></div>氛氲五色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1365389_comment'></div>云止烟绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1365389_comment'></div>星流火变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1365389_comment'></div>亟福应而神滋焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1365389_comment'></div>每熙春载阳。<div id='poem_sentence_160_1365389_comment'></div>无不举袂阴峰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1365389_comment'></div>扬桡沸水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1365389_comment'></div>洁诚而往。<div id='poem_sentence_170_1365389_comment'></div>其崇信也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_171_1365389_comment'></div>如彼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_172_1365389_comment'></div>其安闲也如此。<div id='poem_sentence_12_1365383_comment'></div>玉京崇绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365383_comment'></div>七映严饰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365383_comment'></div>四明洞开。<div id='poem_sentence_17_1365383_comment'></div>尝有之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365383_comment'></div>然而陶铸三品。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365383_comment'></div>大造融于得一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365383_comment'></div>范围四名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365383_comment'></div>大空合于吹万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1365383_comment'></div>其凫氏鸿钟欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1365383_comment'></div>工以思专。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1365383_comment'></div>神以响会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1365383_comment'></div>炉用乃息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1365383_comment'></div>器或云聚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1365383_comment'></div>攫蹲兽而俯捧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1365383_comment'></div>俨旋虫而上扶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1365383_comment'></div>号远则传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1365383_comment'></div>声希以节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1365383_comment'></div>广于已日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1365383_comment'></div>普集诸天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1365383_comment'></div>契九仙于福堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1365383_comment'></div>起六幽于苦海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1365383_comment'></div>重以珍珠为阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1365383_comment'></div>琉璃作地。<div class='inline'
