class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1365383_comment'></div>遥徵羽使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1365383_comment'></div>时环而载击载考。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1365383_comment'></div>律应而不舒不疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1365383_comment'></div>西升路接。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1365383_comment'></div>韵阊阖之清风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1365383_comment'></div>北斗城连。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1365383_comment'></div>含未央之夕漏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1365383_comment'></div>非与其至妙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1365383_comment'></div>孰臻于此乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1365383_comment'></div>在昔图旂常勒彝鼎者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1365383_comment'></div>所以建功树善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1365383_comment'></div>纪德昭事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1365383_comment'></div>未有万人斯和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1365383_comment'></div>倾耳归真。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1365383_comment'></div>四魔是革。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1365383_comment'></div>调心服道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1365383_comment'></div>彻于千界。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1365383_comment'></div>扬我巨唐之声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1365383_comment'></div>悬于亿劫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1365383_comment'></div>齐我巨唐之算。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1365383_comment'></div>安可不篆铭于铣者哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1365383_comment'></div>其词曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1365383_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_63_1365383'>碧落朱宫兮郁其崇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1365383_comment'></div>金振玉叩兮殷而鸿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1365383_comment'></div>九牧是献兮百神工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1365383_comment'></div>成之不日兮铿乘风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1365383_comment'></div>声无已兮福无穷。</div><div id='poem_sentence_67_1365383_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=713&endYear=713')">713年12月1日</a>　本年十二月一日，改元开元，大赦天下。苏颋当加知制诰，故代拟制敕之文。作品：《改元开元元年大赦天下制》<div id='poem_1365333' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365333' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365333?labeling=true' target='_blank'>开元元年赦书</a><span class='authorDate'>（713年12月1日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_1365333")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1365333_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365333'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365333'>黄门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365333_comment'></div>朕闻圣人无心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365333_comment'></div>同于吹万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365333_comment'></div>上皇有道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365333_comment'></div>契于明一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365333_comment'></div>居天下之尊者莫大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365333_comment'></div>体其大以照临。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365333_comment'></div>成天下之务者至公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365333_comment'></div>顺其公以康济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365333_comment'></div>故能稽昌历。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365333_comment'></div>考元符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365333_comment'></div>通于神祇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365333_comment'></div>格于上下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365333_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1365333", 1365333, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>鸿名</span>不可以深拒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365333_comment'></div>盛典不可以固违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365333_comment'></div>斯岂在予而徇于物也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365333_comment'></div>朕以菲德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365333_comment'></div>丕承圣训。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365333_comment'></div>扫除欃枪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365333_comment'></div>保卫宗社。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365333_comment'></div>内问安以承志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365333_comment'></div>外听理以推诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365333_comment'></div>始自朝廷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1365333_comment'></div>纳之以轨物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1365333_comment'></div>终加蛮貊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1365333_comment'></div>洎之以声教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1365333_comment'></div>欲令跂行喙饮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1365333_comment'></div>含齿戴发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1365333_comment'></div>去其夭札。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1365333_comment'></div>蠲其疵疠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1365333_comment'></div>每乾乾于紫座。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1365333_comment'></div>宁自贵于黄屋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1365333_comment'></div>而凡我群辟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1365333_comment'></div>顾斯兆庶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1365333_comment'></div>以为人谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1365333_comment'></div>协从天意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1365333_comment'></div>钦若王者人所归也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1365333_comment'></div>帝者天之号也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1365333_comment'></div>归之者以德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1365333_comment'></div>号之者以功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1365333_comment'></div>然号以功成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1365333_comment'></div>则功不可以不表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1365333_comment'></div>归以德厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1365333_comment'></div>则德不可以不励。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1365333_comment'></div>朕猥属与能之运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1365333_comment'></div>遂忘冲让之私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1365333_comment'></div>将逮临寅之岁首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1365333_comment'></div>甫择建子之天统。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1365333_comment'></div>是用发挥景命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1365333_comment'></div>受兹礼册。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1365333_comment'></div>夫循名者责实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1365333_comment'></div>谋始者虑终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1365333_comment'></div>勉而全之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1365333_comment'></div>非敢自满。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1365333_comment'></div>所以克已思政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1365333_comment'></div>唯怀永图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1365333_comment'></div>惧弗胜荷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1365333_comment'></div>用多惭惕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1365333_comment'></div>赦令所作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1365333_comment'></div>其来尚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1365333_comment'></div>是则奸人之幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1365333_comment'></div>尝思奔马之喻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1365333_comment'></div>朕但欲令其畏恶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1365333_comment'></div>化之为善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1365333_comment'></div>庶比屋可封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1365333_comment'></div>岂开罗为惠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1365333_comment'></div>朕之此志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1365333_comment'></div>每用形言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1365333_comment'></div>顷属冬序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1365333_comment'></div>颇愆农泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1365333_comment'></div>洎辰练日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1365333_comment'></div>有司备礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1365333_comment'></div>则上天同云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1365333_comment'></div>北风雨雪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1365333_comment'></div>意者将乘广庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1365333_comment'></div>必待湛恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1365333_comment'></div>宜行宥过之典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1365333_comment'></div>以叶随时之义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1365333_comment'></div>可大赦天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1365333_comment'></div>改先天二年为开元元年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1365333_comment'></div>自开元元年十二月一日昧爽已前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1365333_comment'></div>大辟罪已下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1365333_comment'></div>已发觉未发觉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1365333_comment'></div>已结正未结正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1365333_comment'></div>系囚见徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1365333_comment'></div>咸赦除之云云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1365333_comment'></div>礼尚于俭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1365333_comment'></div>书诫于奢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1365333_comment'></div>朕方归敦朴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1365333_comment'></div>以存劝沮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1365333_comment'></div>至于乘舆服御。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1365333_comment'></div>及土木之功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1365333_comment'></div>蠲除撙节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1365333_comment'></div>贵从省。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1365333_comment'></div>王公以下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1365333_comment'></div>宜识此心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1365333_comment'></div>欲将先自朕躬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1365333_comment'></div>冀能化行海内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1365333_comment'></div>薛伯阳以凶魁之子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1365333_comment'></div>合寘严刑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1365333_comment'></div>缘尚主之恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1365333_comment'></div>特令远贬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1365333_comment'></div>旋念从夫之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1365333_comment'></div>深矜自我之出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1365333_comment'></div>宜复旧婚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1365333_comment'></div>再承新命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1365333_comment'></div>可唐州别驾员外郎置同正员。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1365333_comment'></div>郭元振往立大功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1365333_comment'></div>保护于朕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1365333_comment'></div>顷因阅武。<div id='poem_sentence_111_1365333_comment'></div>将收后效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1365333_comment'></div>可饶州司马员外置同正员。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1365333_comment'></div>朕闻罪不相及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1365333_comment'></div>先王之制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1365333_comment'></div>叔向岂坐于凶弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1365333_comment'></div>展禽见称于哲兄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1365333_comment'></div>刘廙不以刘伟获辜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1365333_comment'></div>每进款诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1365333_comment'></div>事朕有年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1365333_comment'></div>心则无隐。<div id='poem_sentence_125_1365333_comment'></div>俾践储卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1365333_comment'></div>式彰臣节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1365333_comment'></div>可太子仆员外置同正员。<div id='poem_sentence_130_1365333_comment'></div>一房沈翳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1365333_comment'></div>未承恩者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1365333_comment'></div>令所司访择有才用者。<div id='poem_sentence_140_1365333_comment'></div>及酷吏身后有子孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1365333_comment'></div>亦令所司勘会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1365333_comment'></div>甄别处分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1365333_comment'></div>诸军将士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1365333_comment'></div>有年岁深久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1365333_comment'></div>所由要籍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1365333_comment'></div>或不得选集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1365333_comment'></div>及未叙劳效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1365333_comment'></div>咸委军将据实奏闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1365333_comment'></div>仍令所司早勘处分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1365333_comment'></div>及诸军子将总管以上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1365333_comment'></div>自今已后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1365333_comment'></div>冬正赐帛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1365333_comment'></div>一准京官例给。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1365333_comment'></div>亡命山泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1365333_comment'></div>挟藏军器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1365333_comment'></div>百日不首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1365333_comment'></div>复罪如初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1365333_comment'></div>敢以赦前事相告言者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1365333_comment'></div>以其罪罪之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1365333_comment'></div>赦书日行五百里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1365333_comment'></div>布告遐迩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1365333_comment'></div>咸使知闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1365333_comment'></div>主者施行。</div><div id='poem_sentence_164_1365333_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=713&endYear=713')">713年</a>　苏颋当在加知制诰任，故代拟制敕之文。作品：《授姚崇兼紫微令制》《禁断腊月乞寒敕》<span class='inlineComment2'>（（《诏令》系7日，备一说））</span>《授韦玢司农少卿制》《授许捕虔左羽林将军制》《授李杰河南尹制》《授郑勉紫微舍人等制》《授彭景直礼部郎中制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此题下注：“不得早于是月（指12月）”《郁谱》不系此文。）</span><div id='poem_1365121' class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1365121_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365121'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365121'>黄门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365121_comment'></div>天之紫微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365121_comment'></div>地在清禁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365121_comment'></div>宰臣为重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365121_comment'></div>庶政攸先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365121_comment'></div>不有殊才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365121_comment'></div>曷云兼寄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365121_comment'></div>金紫光禄大夫兵部尚书同紫微黄门三品监修国史上柱国梁国公姚崇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365121_comment'></div>河山粹气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365121_comment'></div>礼乐清英。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365121_comment'></div>德量在宽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365121_comment'></div>公心益厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365121_comment'></div>词必体要。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365121_comment'></div>行之自远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365121_comment'></div>学以穷微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365121_comment'></div>志于可大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365121_comment'></div>允兹忠谠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365121_comment'></div>光我谋谟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365121_comment'></div>闻善若惊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365121_comment'></div>欲仁斯至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365121_comment'></div>衣冠以为蓍蔡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365121_comment'></div>廊庙资其柱石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365121_comment'></div>朕之钦者管乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1365121_comment'></div>人之杰者萧张。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1365121_comment'></div>遂能以身许国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1365121_comment'></div>开物成务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1365121_comment'></div>邦是用乂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1365121_comment'></div>朝惟得贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1365121_comment'></div>北辰环拱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1365121_comment'></div>西垣近密。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1365121_comment'></div>俾因题剑之荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1365121_comment'></div>式演如丝之命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1365121_comment'></div>可兼紫微令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1365121_comment'></div>馀如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1365121_comment'></div>主者施行。</div><div id='poem_sentence_34_1365121_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1365324' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365324' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365324?labeling=true' target='_blank'>禁断腊月乞寒敕</a><span id='poem_sentence_1_1365324_comment'></div>因循已久。至使乘肥衣轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365324_comment'></div>竞矜胡服。阗城溢陌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365324_comment'></div>深玷华风。朕思革颓弊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365324_comment'></div>返于淳朴。书不云乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365324_comment'></div>不作无益害有益。功乃成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365324_comment'></div>不贵异物贱用物。人乃足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365324_comment'></div>况妨于政要。败紊礼经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365324_comment'></div>习而行之。将何以训。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365324_comment'></div>自今以后。即宜禁断。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365324_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1365324_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1365198' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365198' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365198?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授韦玢司农少卿制</a><span id='poem_sentence_1_1365198_comment'></div>从务表其清白。干时允其文采。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365198_comment'></div>故以台阁褎称。缙绅甄奖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365198_comment'></div>盛礼兴乐。望虽重于执圭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365198_comment'></div>八政一农。事尤殷于理粟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365198_comment'></div>况洛京转漕。淮海通波。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365198_comment'></div>宜任牟融之能。迁改郑庄之弊。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=714&endYear=714')">714年1月24日</a>　在知制诰任，故代拟制敕。作品：《姚崇都检校诸军大使制》<div id='poem_1365221' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365221' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365221?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授姚崇都检校诸军大使李义甫副使制</a><span class='authorDate'>（714年1月24日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_1365221")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1365221_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365221'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365221'>黄门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365221_comment'></div>庙堂之仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365221_comment'></div>不可去兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365221_comment'></div>帷幄之谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365221_comment'></div>在于料敌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365221_comment'></div>自非行有馀力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365221_comment'></div>坐而决胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365221_comment'></div>则何以威百蛮而破万里者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365221_comment'></div>兵部尚书兼紫微令监修国史上柱国梁国公姚崇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365221_comment'></div>朝廷宿望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365221_comment'></div>军国大才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365221_comment'></div>蕴平仲之一心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365221_comment'></div>举夷吾于六翮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365221_comment'></div>惟此人杰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365221_comment'></div>是称天赉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365221_comment'></div>银青光禄大夫行黄门侍郎昭文馆学士上柱国中山郡开国公李义甫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365221_comment'></div>用穷精微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365221_comment'></div>体自公直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365221_comment'></div>贞规踰于铁石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365221_comment'></div>词律比于笙簧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365221_comment'></div>左曹之美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365221_comment'></div>中朝所咏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365221_comment'></div>咸能上言宠荅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1365221_comment'></div>备陈胡虏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1365221_comment'></div>阅武观对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1365221_comment'></div>暗合孙吴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1365221_comment'></div>顷虽众和以德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1365221_comment'></div>军全非战。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1365221_comment'></div>或徵其侍子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1365221_comment'></div>久诣阙廷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1365221_comment'></div>或劳我偏裨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1365221_comment'></div>尚留关塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1365221_comment'></div>行役之苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1365221_comment'></div>寝兴弗忘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1365221_comment'></div>师臧谓何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1365221_comment'></div>豫备斯在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1365221_comment'></div>伫恢遥护之略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1365221_comment'></div>更属远安之算。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1365221_comment'></div>崇可都检校诸军大使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1365221_comment'></div>义甫为副。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1365221_comment'></div>主者施行。</div><div id='poem_sentence_40_1365221_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=714&endYear=714')">714年2月1日</a>　在中书任，上状贺太阳当亏未亏。作品：《贺太阳不亏状》<span id='poem_content_1365354'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365354'>臣等伏承太史奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365354_comment'></div>昨一日太阳亏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365354_comment'></div>陛下爰发行宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365354_comment'></div>不御常服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365354_comment'></div>圣虑渊默。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365354_comment'></div>天情寅戒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365354_comment'></div>顿于行在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365354_comment'></div>不可禜社以责阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365354_comment'></div>凡厥观瞻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365354_comment'></div>不殊登台而视朔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1365354_comment'></div>至时不蚀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1365354_comment'></div>乃自殊祥。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=714&endYear=714')">714年</a>　在知制诰任，故代拟制敕。作品：《令僧尼道士女冠拜父母敕》《王晙朔方道行军总管制》《遣陆象先等依前按察制》<div id='poem_1365321' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365321' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365321?labeling=true' target='_blank'>令道士女冠僧尼拜父母敕</a><span class='authorDate'>（714年2月3日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365321'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365321'>敕。夫孝者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365321_comment'></div>天之经。地之义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365321_comment'></div>人之行。故上自天子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365321_comment'></div>下至庶人。资于敬爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365321_comment'></div>以事父母。所谓冠五常之表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365321_comment'></div>称百行之先。如或不由。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365321_comment'></div>其何以训。如闻道士女冠僧尼等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365321_comment'></div>有不拜父母之礼。朕用思之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365321_comment'></div>茫然罔识。且道释之教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365321_comment'></div>盖惩恶而劝善。父子之仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365321_comment'></div>岂缘情而易制。安有同人代而离怙恃哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365321_comment'></div>哀哀父母。生我劳瘁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365321_comment'></div>故六亲有不和之戒。十号有报恩之旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365321_comment'></div>此又穷源本而启宗极也。今若为子而忘其生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365321_comment'></div>傲亲而徇于末。背礼而强名于教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365321_comment'></div>伤于教则不可行。行教而不废于礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365321_comment'></div>合于礼则无不遂。二亲之与二教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365321_comment'></div>复何异焉。自是已后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365321_comment'></div>道士女冠僧尼等。并令拜父母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365321_comment'></div>丧纪变除。亦依月数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365321_comment'></div>庶能正此颓弊。用明典则。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365321_comment'></div>罔亏爱敬之风。自叶仙真之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365321_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1365321_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1365299' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365299' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365299?labeling=true' target='_blank'>遣姚巂陆象先等依前按察制</a><span class='authorDate'>（714年闰2月7日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365299'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365299'>黄门。古者协和万邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365299_comment'></div>畴咨四岳。柔远能迩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365299_comment'></div>明目达聪。以变于人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365299_comment'></div>自朴散醇漓。割方回直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365299_comment'></div>失于德者。格之以礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365299_comment'></div>失于礼者。助之以刑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365299_comment'></div>故惧罗网而畏书。必振其纲而操其柄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365299_comment'></div>庶乎举政之要也。閒岁天下诸州岳牧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365299_comment'></div>先充本道按察。诚以今之刺举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365299_comment'></div>昔之率连。盖欲为吏之黜陟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365299_comment'></div>审人之愁苦。中念作奸犯科。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365299_comment'></div>获罪相次。弃木或尤于拙匠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365299_comment'></div>采葑不遗于下体。由是申命有司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365299_comment'></div>咸多叙用。至于按察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365299_comment'></div>暂令休罢。夫泉有鱼矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365299_comment'></div>虽见则不祥。林有兽焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365299_comment'></div>而为之不采。与其存而勿用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365299_comment'></div>孰若狎以玩之。俾便于时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365299_comment'></div>复修其政。银青光禄大夫益州大都督府长史姚巂处置兵马使上柱国兖国公陆象先等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365299_comment'></div>早蕴宏量。深甄大体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365299_comment'></div>清能励俗。仁以敦风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365299_comment'></div>必将检御权豪。昭明淑忒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365299_comment'></div>宜兴化以树善。伫责成而求当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1365299_comment'></div>可依前件。馀各如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1365299_comment'></div>一事以上。并准旧例处分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1365299_comment'></div>本道所隶之州。有偏远不稳便者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1365299_comment'></div>仍令所司。量宜分割。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1365299_comment'></div>永为定额讫奏闻。主者施行。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=714&endYear=714')">714年闰2月</a>　在中书任，散骑常侍褚无量归觐，撰序相送。作品：《饯常侍舒公归觐序》<div id='poem_1365367' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365367' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365367?labeling=true' target='_blank'>饯常侍舒公归觐序</a><span class='authorDate'>（714年闰2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_1365367")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1365367_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365367'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365367'>右散骑常侍兼国子祭酒崇文馆学士舒公。邦之硕儒也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365367_comment'></div>富于学。深其智。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365367_comment'></div>秉辟雍之礼。讲金华之义者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365367_comment'></div>尝有日焉。辩大而言若讷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365367_comment'></div>位高而志益下。造膝则人无异辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365367_comment'></div>匪躬则我有馀力。仪正可象。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365367_comment'></div>声希必应。此所以孔光密而张辅宠也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365367_comment'></div>故进避荣而荣自取。退崇让而让得之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365367_comment'></div>既而命列幡旂。焜煌照于西第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365367_comment'></div>徒成俎豆。眷恋驰乎东国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365367_comment'></div>每洒涕而祈主。将候颜以拜亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365367_comment'></div>天子怀公达之旧。惜康成之往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365367_comment'></div>乃眷中留。久而下制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365367_comment'></div>是月惟闰。乘春载阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365367_comment'></div>服老莱之衣。飘组丈二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365367_comment'></div>拥终童之传。送车数百。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365367_comment'></div>晨省伟其传呼。昼游嘉其饮饯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365367_comment'></div>来而喜惧。经跃鲤之新泉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365367_comment'></div>至则光辉。对回龟之旧浦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365367_comment'></div>夫志于道者。二三子之莫逮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365367_comment'></div>善于孝者。千万人之所说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365367_comment'></div>未有丹诚注于阙下。白首登于堂上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365367_comment'></div>门生仰而结辙。邦牧趋而负弩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1365367_comment'></div>岂非训虞受封。就宋传业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1365367_comment'></div>俾鲁师之教者。其冯母之荣乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1365367_comment'></div>于是丝庭华省之家。虎观鸿都之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1365367_comment'></div>属鸧鹒鸣矣。杨柳依依。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1365367_comment'></div>情摇江上之枫。思结河边之草。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1365367_comment'></div>吴州日见。楚山云绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1365367_comment'></div>莫不捧袂黯然。弹毫以赠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1365367_comment'></div>庶几离言之至。知儒行之尊欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1365367_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_31_1365367_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=714&endYear=714')">714年</a>　春在知制诰任，故代拟制敕。作品：《授郭虔瓘右骁卫大将军等制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《郁谱》未系年。）</span>《授韦嗣立太子宾客制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《郁谱》未系年。）</span><div id='poem_1365212' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365212' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365212?labeling=true' "poem_title_1365212")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1365212_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365212'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365212'>黄门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365212_comment'></div>有功必赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365212_comment'></div>□□□劝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365212_comment'></div>所以教人立志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365212_comment'></div>为邦作程者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365212_comment'></div>云麾将军检校右骁卫将军兼北庭都护瀚海军经略使金山道副大总管招慰营田等使上柱国太原县开国公郭虔瓘宣威将军守右骁卫翊府中郎将检校伊州刺史兼伊吾军使借紫金鱼袋上柱国介休县开国公郭知运等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365212_comment'></div>负将帅之才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365212_comment'></div>展熊罴之效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365212_comment'></div>义烈忠壮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365212_comment'></div>以询其诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365212_comment'></div>智谋勇敢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365212_comment'></div>不愆其策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365212_comment'></div>顷者边庭之际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365212_comment'></div>孤城独守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365212_comment'></div>戎羯困乏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365212_comment'></div>岁时围逼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365212_comment'></div>矢石交下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365212_comment'></div>金汤自坚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365212_comment'></div>护甘汉之所历。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365212_comment'></div>怀范羌而莫至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365212_comment'></div>独能宣我王命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365212_comment'></div>殚其士力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365212_comment'></div>不顾左殷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1365212_comment'></div>仍于右断。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1365212_comment'></div>厥功至矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1365212_comment'></div>朕甚嘉之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1365212_comment'></div>宜登绝席之任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1365212_comment'></div>方盛题坐之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1365212_comment'></div>虔瓘可冠军大将军右骁卫大将军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1365212_comment'></div>知运可云麾将军右骁卫将军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1365212_comment'></div>馀各如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1365212_comment'></div>仍各赐衣一副并金带。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1365212_comment'></div>主者施行。</div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1365212_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1365225' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365225' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365225?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授韦嗣立太子宾客制</a><span class='authorDate'>（714年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_1365225")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1365225_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365225'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365225'>门下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365225_comment'></div>望园宾客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365225_comment'></div>非贤莫可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365225_comment'></div>中朝硕茂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365225_comment'></div>选众攸归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365225_comment'></div>银青光禄大夫国子祭酒上柱国逍遥公韦嗣立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365225_comment'></div>温恭密静。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365225_comment'></div>孝悌忠实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365225_comment'></div>鉴测毫端。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365225_comment'></div>词诠象外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365225_comment'></div>昆弟承一经之业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365225_comment'></div>登相者代不乏人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365225_comment'></div>闺门有万石之风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365225_comment'></div>立言者士是则效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365225_comment'></div>畴咨满于故事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365225_comment'></div>润色敷于令典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365225_comment'></div>属以疾辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365225_comment'></div>用体张良之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365225_comment'></div>资以德举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365225_comment'></div>宜从绮季之游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365225_comment'></div>可太子宾客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365225_comment'></div>散官勋封如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365225_comment'></div>主者施行。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1365225_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=714&endYear=714')">714年</a>　在中书任，有诗挽高安长公主。作品：《故高安大长公主挽词》<div id='poem_33805' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_33805' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/33805?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故高安大长公主挽词</a><span class='authorDate'>（714年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_33805")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_33805_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_33805'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_33805'>彤管承师训，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_33805", 33805, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>青圭</span>备礼容。<div id='poem_sentence_0_33805_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_33805'>孟孙家代宠，元女国朝封。<div id='poem_sentence_1_33805_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_33805'>柔轨题贞顺，闲规赋肃雍。<div id='poem_sentence_2_33805_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_33805'>宁知落照尽，霜吹入悲松。<div id='poem_sentence_3_33805_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_33805'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_33805_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=714&endYear=714')">714年</a>　在中书任，撰高安长公主碑文。作品：《高安长公主神道碑》<div id='poem_1365393' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365393' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365393?labeling=true' target='_blank'>高安长公主神道碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（714年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_1365393")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1365393_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365393'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365393'>惟开元二年龙集摄提格夏五月哉生明。高安长公主薨于长安永平里第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365393_comment'></div>享年六十有六。呜呼哀哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365393_comment'></div>景申。上发哀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365393_comment'></div>于晖政门设次。举声辍朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365393_comment'></div>加等遣大鸿胪彭城侯刘知柔持节赍书赴吊。京兆尹摄大鸿胪邓国公张炜司农少卿李彦有司帅属护丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365393_comment'></div>文武五品已上会哭。书不云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365393_comment'></div>敦族至于九。以昭于百姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365393_comment'></div>礼不云。叙亲居其一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365393_comment'></div>以统于万人。此所以追有虞而化天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365393_comment'></div>感配陈而恸宸极。复以为素旂诔行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365393_comment'></div>彤管区风。司常䍐留。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365393_comment'></div>执史多紊。乃制银青光禄大夫行紫微侍郎兼知制诰上柱国许国公苏颋为铭刻石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365393_comment'></div>臣颋不敏。飏言拜命云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365393_comment'></div>长公主讳某字某。陇西狄道人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365393_comment'></div>高祖神尧皇帝之曾孙。太宗文武圣皇帝之孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365393_comment'></div>高宗天皇大帝之第二女。中宗孝和皇帝之姊也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365393_comment'></div>太上皇之姊。开元神武皇帝之姑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365393_comment'></div>昔轩后修德。高阳任而豫之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365393_comment'></div>虞臣迈德。伯阳冲而用之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365393_comment'></div>故先王会昌而王者兴。前圣受命而圣人作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365393_comment'></div>自风偃三代。刑清百年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365393_comment'></div>扬耿光于祖宗。绍期运于神武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365393_comment'></div>上以比崇于黄轩至其道。次以宗极于元老施其教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1365393_comment'></div>庆渐绵瓞。恩周行苇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1365393_comment'></div>重熙而累盛。皇哉而唐哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1365393_comment'></div>公主承姊月之华。分女星之耀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1365393_comment'></div>闲和美度。婉娩令德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1365393_comment'></div>有循其礼。无择于言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1365393_comment'></div>鉴图取则。闻诗服义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1365393_comment'></div>故可以赋丝缗而开汤沐者也。于是曳红绶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1365393_comment'></div>赐青圭。香满玉垆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1365393_comment'></div>䌽摇金缕。允所谓帝乙归妹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1365393_comment'></div>以祉元吉。鲁侯主婚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1365393_comment'></div>是称同姓。始封宣城公主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1365393_comment'></div>下嫁乎王氏。驸马都尉故颍州刺史赠右监门将军太原王府君讳勖字遂古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1365393_comment'></div>右监门将军平舒公之孙。歙州司马之子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1365393_comment'></div>自周储洛滨之契。秦将频阳之业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1365393_comment'></div>门昌帝绪。家累天姻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1365393_comment'></div>徵平叔之才貌。得孟孙之阀阅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1365393_comment'></div>亦既觏止。展也令仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1365393_comment'></div>成其肃雍。率由俊彩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1365393_comment'></div>至盥漱栉纵。笄总衣绅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1365393_comment'></div>箴管刀砺。线纩縏帙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1365393_comment'></div>若此者敬而持之。动必于是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1365393_comment'></div>则其馀可重也。天授中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1365393_comment'></div>圣后从权革命。驸马非罪婴酷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1365393_comment'></div>公主复归于后庭。凡九十甲子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1365393_comment'></div>口不入辛味。耳不聆曼音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1365393_comment'></div>体逾尚柔。言靡敌怨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1365393_comment'></div>运观心之智。察摩顶之神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1365393_comment'></div>岂寂以幽通。将虚而信受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1365393_comment'></div>有菩萨现前者数四。后每奇之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1365393_comment'></div>中宗禹物不改。汉仪初复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1365393_comment'></div>乃命宗正卿李珍册拜宣城长公主。食实封一千户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1365393_comment'></div>并置府僚。比侯王之封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1365393_comment'></div>齐令丞之秩。太皇御极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1365393_comment'></div>又增五百户。改封于高安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1365393_comment'></div>且重永康之册。允符长广之拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1365393_comment'></div>今上握图。又通前加至二千户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1365393_comment'></div>尚于德。先于亲也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1365393_comment'></div>公主顷岁奉尝睹高宗画像。虽光灵在天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1365393_comment'></div>而见似目瞿。感咽于地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1365393_comment'></div>遂成心疾。至使名医萃止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1365393_comment'></div>御药相望。孝焉而终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1365393_comment'></div>仁则何辅。呜呼哀哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1365393_comment'></div>富贵乃骄奢之资。不期而至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1365393_comment'></div>吉凶乃盛衰之象。不召而成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1365393_comment'></div>故泰忘约。吝生动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1365393_comment'></div>宠怙权。邪丑正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1365393_comment'></div>知得而不知丧。知存而不知亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1365393_comment'></div>尝历观之熟矣。由是黄金象牙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1365393_comment'></div>明珠翠羽之饰积于外。雕文刻镂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1365393_comment'></div>衣纨履丝之巧充于内。然后坚车良马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1365393_comment'></div>浆酒藿肉。吹笙竽学歌舞于其閒者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1365393_comment'></div>殊不知以相强而结祸。因自恣而招危。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1365393_comment'></div>鲁元所以好过度。窦太所以纵踰礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1365393_comment'></div>鄂邑所以怼抵罪。湖阳所以匿犯法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1365393_comment'></div>馆陶所以求不获。昭平所以免河上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1365393_comment'></div>埒开邙阜。允子孰闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1365393_comment'></div>田在汉京。权臣所夺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1365393_comment'></div>吁。可长叹息者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1365393_comment'></div>我长公主则不然。避荣守静。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1365393_comment'></div>退藏于密。端操正色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1365393_comment'></div>进寡其辞。为皇女焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1365393_comment'></div>为皇姊焉。为皇姑焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1365393_comment'></div>非不贵也。能戒盈忌满。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1365393_comment'></div>智崇礼卑。俭德之恭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1365393_comment'></div>让德之益。主无攸遂不专也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1365393_comment'></div>勤无告劳不匮也。宜于秋犊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1365393_comment'></div>以助宗人。率彼春蚕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1365393_comment'></div>以从王后。则未尝忽诸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1365393_comment'></div>犹深悟色空。大依禅惠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1365393_comment'></div>观我生之进退。究人事之终始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1365393_comment'></div>盖泡梦之为喻也。乃散以檀𨙻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1365393_comment'></div>离于染著。景云岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1365393_comment'></div>请罢赋邑。蠲属官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1365393_comment'></div>遂沈冥。从省旷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1365393_comment'></div>书上而制违之。呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1365393_comment'></div>身殁意馀。道之微者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1365393_comment'></div>古有女仪嫔则焉。或孟母之勤学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1365393_comment'></div>敬姜之知礼。仲妻之辞相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1365393_comment'></div>惠妇之光夫。然出于素族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1365393_comment'></div>书之缇史。未有居高益下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1365393_comment'></div>托体至尊。如长主之俦矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1365393_comment'></div>故能九师让能。三子闻教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1365393_comment'></div>自我之出。与时偕行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1365393_comment'></div>知微知彰。不谄不黩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1365393_comment'></div>长曰炜。银青光禄大夫太仆少卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1365393_comment'></div>仲曰晖。朝请大夫卫尉少卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1365393_comment'></div>季曰暕。尚舍奉御。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1365393_comment'></div>并欲报罔极。栾貌心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1365393_comment'></div>哀以送之。龟从筮吉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1365393_comment'></div>粤某年八月朔十七日。葬于咸阳之北原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1365393_comment'></div>礼也。落月过半。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1365393_comment'></div>秋阳浸微。清节凝兮朔风断。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1365393_comment'></div>丹旐列兮秋云飞。望槐里而西驰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1365393_comment'></div>去萩园而北顾。视牵牛兮像设。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1365393_comment'></div>过饮龙兮径度。闉阇䆗窱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1365393_comment'></div>远嬴女之楼台。松柏阴烟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1365393_comment'></div>近汉皇之陵墓。其词曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1365393_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_120_1365393'>赫赫上帝。临于巨唐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1365393_comment'></div>卜年万倍。诞睿兴王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1365393_comment'></div>何彼秾矣。休其有光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1365393_comment'></div>亦既从夫。车服不系。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1365393_comment'></div>亦云主妇。蘋蘩以祭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1365393_comment'></div>在贵能约。终温且惠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1365393_comment'></div>乐只君子。曾不永年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1365393_comment'></div>未亡之人。归于九天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1365393_comment'></div>心以理遣。身以义全。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1365393_comment'></div>光于累圣。受于明命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1365393_comment'></div>伯姊延晖。皇姑袭庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1365393_comment'></div>监以损益。辞其满盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1365393_comment'></div>我有空言。宗于释门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1365393_comment'></div>不生不灭。兹道存存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1365393_comment'></div>兑之降灵。西反其魂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1365393_comment'></div>咏清浅兮天之际。忆潇湘兮日巳逝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1365393_comment'></div>登寒山兮见超忽。生秋草兮坐芜没。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1365393_comment'></div>金为字兮琬为碑。永<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_137_1365393", 1365393, "Clauses/275/Comments/0")'>贞芳</span>兮实在斯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1365393_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_138_1365393_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=714&endYear=714')">714年</a>　在知制诰任，故代拟制文。作品：《景龙观送裴士曹》<span class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365126_comment'></div>散骑之列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365126_comment'></div>丰貂入侍。<div class='inline'
