class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365126_comment'></div>文合骚雅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365126_comment'></div>学殚经籍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365126_comment'></div>百城分按。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365126_comment'></div>南宪是绳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365126_comment'></div>万里出师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365126_comment'></div>西戎即序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365126_comment'></div>顷以剖符从政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365126_comment'></div>解印归休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365126_comment'></div>章既拜而遂行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365126_comment'></div>礼及传而则往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365126_comment'></div>虽风规莫拟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365126_comment'></div>而志力犹茂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365126_comment'></div>乞言伊属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365126_comment'></div>宁忘赐杖之荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365126_comment'></div>替否旁求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365126_comment'></div>宜副安车之命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365126_comment'></div>可行左散骑常侍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1365126_comment'></div>散官勋如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1365126_comment'></div>主者施行。</div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1365126_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1365329' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365329' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365329?labeling=true' target='_blank'>居大明宫德音</a><span class='authorDate'>（714年6月8日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_1365329")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1365329_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365329'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365329'>黄门。朕闻养人者谓之司牧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365329_comment'></div>非逸于人上。事天者谓之帝皇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365329_comment'></div>盖御乎天下。故作为栋宇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365329_comment'></div>以避燥湿。居于台榭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365329_comment'></div>以顺高明。斯乃奉时令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365329_comment'></div>布政教也。朕以不德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365329_comment'></div>祗膺睿图。宝十家之产。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365329_comment'></div>爱兆人之力。未尝兴工于土木。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365329_comment'></div>役思于池籞。冀之休乂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365329_comment'></div>以致雍熙。自律应长嬴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365329_comment'></div>时方大暑。溽云屡起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365329_comment'></div>温风且至。伏以太上皇宴居珍卫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365329_comment'></div>涤虑清闲。迹不往于甘泉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365329_comment'></div>心每期于汾水。朕侍于左右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365329_comment'></div>以奉晨夕。助元默之化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365329_comment'></div>则亏于听理。当炎蒸之序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365329_comment'></div>又渎以嚣烦。惕焉载怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365329_comment'></div>敢忘顺色。然大明创兆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365329_comment'></div>先圣所营。即旧不加。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365329_comment'></div>因时而往。千门万户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365329_comment'></div>外虽谓于别宫。一日三朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365329_comment'></div>中自连于复道。下所以宁问安之恳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365329_comment'></div>上所以资习静之娱。实获我心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1365329_comment'></div>俾康政理。古有服重裘者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1365329_comment'></div>则念人之寒。居夏屋者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1365329_comment'></div>则念人之热。况比岁阻饥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1365329_comment'></div>甫田不稔。或愚人陷罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1365329_comment'></div>圜土称冤。凡厥庶寮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1365329_comment'></div>将何以恤。两京及诸州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1365329_comment'></div>宜令长官亲理冤狱。除犯名教及官典犯赃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1365329_comment'></div>并缘妖伪以外。馀罪徒以下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1365329_comment'></div>咸宜放免。其有茂才异等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1365329_comment'></div>拔萃超群。缘无绍介。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1365329_comment'></div>久不闻达者。咸令自举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1365329_comment'></div>朕当亲问。其应宣抚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1365329_comment'></div>咸使名闻。举人试第四等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1365329_comment'></div>宜准旧例。别加优奖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1365329_comment'></div>见任人各量与改转前资。常选人至冬依选例与处分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1365329_comment'></div>其未出身者兼授散官。先天以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1365329_comment'></div>军将押衙官等在阵战亡者。令本军勘实奏闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1365329_comment'></div>其妄说灾祥。诳惑闾里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1365329_comment'></div>并令州县长官等严加捉搦。仍令御史金吾防察绳纠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1365329_comment'></div>有能直言极谏。补朕之阙者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1365329_comment'></div>各封进状。朕将亲览。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1365329_comment'></div>如有可采。当加奖擢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1365329_comment'></div>其皇亲诸亲。及东宫承优任员外检试等官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1365329_comment'></div>近停令至冬处分者。有家道贫迫情愿外任者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1365329_comment'></div>亦令所司勘绩阙量才注拟。其缘坐流人处置有轻重不类者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1365329_comment'></div>令所司勘会闻奏。主者施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1365329_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_49_1365329_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1365220' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365220' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365220?labeling=true' target='_blank'>起复杜宾客右威卫将军制</a><span class='authorDate'>（714年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_1365220")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1365220_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365220'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365220'>黄门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365220_comment'></div>云麾将军前检校左监门卫将军上柱国杜宾客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365220_comment'></div>志唯倜傥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365220_comment'></div>才称果决。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365220_comment'></div>闻鞞而立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365220_comment'></div>特壮三军之气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365220_comment'></div>奋剑而前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365220_comment'></div>将雄万人之敌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365220_comment'></div>顷在艰罚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365220_comment'></div>甫怀忠勇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365220_comment'></div>金革是任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365220_comment'></div>春秋所称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365220_comment'></div>俾适权宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365220_comment'></div>用光戎事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365220_comment'></div>可起复右威卫将军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365220_comment'></div>勋如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365220_comment'></div>主者施行。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1365220_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=714&endYear=714')">714年7月</a>　在知制诰任，有文。作品：《焚珠玉锦绣敕》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《郁谱》未系年。）</span><div id='poem_1365323' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365323' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365323?labeling=true' target='_blank'>焚珠玉锦绣敕</a><span class='authorDate'>（714年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_1365323")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1365323_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365323'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365323'>敕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365323_comment'></div>朕闻珠玉者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365323_comment'></div>饥不可食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365323_comment'></div>寒不可衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365323_comment'></div>故汉文云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365323_comment'></div>雕文刻镂伤农事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365323_comment'></div>锦绣纂组害女工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365323_comment'></div>农事伤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365323_comment'></div>则饥之本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365323_comment'></div>女工害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365323_comment'></div>则寒之源。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365323_comment'></div>又贾生有言曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365323_comment'></div>夫人一日不再食则饥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365323_comment'></div>终岁不制衣则寒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365323_comment'></div>饥寒切体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365323_comment'></div>慈母不能保其子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365323_comment'></div>君焉得以有其人哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365323_comment'></div>朕以眇身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365323_comment'></div>托于王公之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365323_comment'></div>曷尝不日旰忘食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365323_comment'></div>未明求衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365323_comment'></div>思使返朴还淳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365323_comment'></div>家给人足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1365323_comment'></div>而仓廪未实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1365323_comment'></div>饥馑相仍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1365323_comment'></div>水旱或愆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1365323_comment'></div>糟糠不厌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1365323_comment'></div>静思厥故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1365323_comment'></div>皆朕之咎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1365323_comment'></div>致有浆酒藿肉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1365323_comment'></div>玉食锦衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1365323_comment'></div>互相夸尚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1365323_comment'></div>浸成风俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1365323_comment'></div>夫令之所施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1365323_comment'></div>惟行不惟反。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1365323_comment'></div>人之化上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1365323_comment'></div>从好不从言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1365323_comment'></div>是以古先哲王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1365323_comment'></div>以身率下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1365323_comment'></div>如风之靡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1365323_comment'></div>何俗不易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1365323_comment'></div>此事近有处分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1365323_comment'></div>当以施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1365323_comment'></div>朕若躬服珠玉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1365323_comment'></div>自玩锦绣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1365323_comment'></div>而欲公卿节俭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1365323_comment'></div>黎庶敦朴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1365323_comment'></div>是使扬汤止沸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1365323_comment'></div>涉海无濡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1365323_comment'></div>不可得也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1365323_comment'></div>是知文质之风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1365323_comment'></div>自上而始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1365323_comment'></div>朕欲捐金抵玉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1365323_comment'></div>正本澄源。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1365323_comment'></div>所有服御金银器物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1365323_comment'></div>今付有司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1365323_comment'></div>令铸为铤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1365323_comment'></div>仍别置掌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1365323_comment'></div>以供军国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1365323_comment'></div>珠玉之货。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1365323_comment'></div>亡益于时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1365323_comment'></div>并即焚于殿前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1365323_comment'></div>用绝浮竞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1365323_comment'></div>至诚所感。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1365323_comment'></div>期于动天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1365323_comment'></div>况于凡百。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1365323_comment'></div>有违朕命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1365323_comment'></div>其宫掖之内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1365323_comment'></div>后妃以下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1365323_comment'></div>皆服浣濯之衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1365323_comment'></div>永除珠翠之饰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1365323_comment'></div>当使金土同价。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1365323_comment'></div>风俗大行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1365323_comment'></div>日用不知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1365323_comment'></div>克臻至道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1365323_comment'></div>布告遐迩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1365323_comment'></div>知朕意焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_76_1365323_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=714&endYear=714')">714年7月3日</a>　在知制诰任，故代拟制敕。作品：《禁断锦绣珠玉敕》<div id='poem_1365294' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365294' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365294?labeling=true' target='_blank'>禁断锦绣珠玉制</a><span class='authorDate'>（714年7月3日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_1365294")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1365294_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365294'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365294'>敕。朕闻召公曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365294_comment'></div>弗作无益害有益。孔子曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365294_comment'></div>奢则不逊俭则固。斯乃圣人之至言矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365294_comment'></div>叔代迁讹。僻王骄纵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365294_comment'></div>惟崇于玉杯象箸。不胜于捐金抵璧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365294_comment'></div>好之者君也。习之者人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365294_comment'></div>即用匹帛服长缨之类欤。朕爰在幼冲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365294_comment'></div>每期质朴。手未曾持珠玉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365294_comment'></div>目未尝观锦绣。愿言其志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365294_comment'></div>造次不忘。自寅奉休图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365294_comment'></div>勉康政道。常想汉文衣绨之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365294_comment'></div>晋武焚裘之事。竟未能令行禁止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365294_comment'></div>敦本弃末。朕甚惧之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365294_comment'></div>今王侯勋戚。下洎厮养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365294_comment'></div>所得者重于远。所求者贵于异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365294_comment'></div>虽雕文刻镂。衣纨履丝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365294_comment'></div>习俗相誇。殊涂竞爽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365294_comment'></div>有妨于政。无补于时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365294_comment'></div>岂朕言之不明。教之未笃也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365294_comment'></div>且一夫一女。不耕不织。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365294_comment'></div>则天下有受其饥寒者。今四方晏如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365294_comment'></div>而百姓不足。岂不以尚于珠玉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365294_comment'></div>珍于锦绣。垦田畴而夺其务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1365294_comment'></div>出布帛而害其功欤。其珠玉锦绣等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1365294_comment'></div>自今以后。切令禁断。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1365294_comment'></div>如更循旧弊。并归罪长官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1365294_comment'></div>仍令御史金吾。严加捉搦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1365294_comment'></div>州牧县宰。劝督农桑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1365294_comment'></div>待至秋收。课其贮积。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1365294_comment'></div>使人知礼节。俗登仁寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1365294_comment'></div>有司仍为条例。称朕意焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1365294_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_31_1365294_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=714&endYear=714')">714年7月</a>　在中书侍郎知制诰任，时吐蕃猖獗，玄宗决定亲征，上表谏。作品：《谏銮驾亲征吐蕃表》<div id='poem_1365352' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365352' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365352?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谏銮驾亲征吐蕃表</a><span class='authorDate'>（714年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_1365352")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1365352_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365352'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365352'>臣某言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365352_comment'></div>伏承某日制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365352_comment'></div>以吐蕃侵轶边隅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365352_comment'></div>陛下欲观总元戎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365352_comment'></div>出征秦陇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365352_comment'></div>蠢彼羌髳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365352_comment'></div>敢为叛涣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365352_comment'></div>王赫斯怒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365352_comment'></div>整旅龚行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365352_comment'></div>实陛下雄略英威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365352_comment'></div>爱人活国之长策也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365352_comment'></div>臣闻北狄西戎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365352_comment'></div>自古而有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365352_comment'></div>虽夏殷之强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365352_comment'></div>轩农之盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365352_comment'></div>未息其患也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365352_comment'></div>书称蛮夷猾夏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365352_comment'></div>诗著猃狁孔炽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365352_comment'></div>未损东渐西被之化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365352_comment'></div>帝王驰骤之迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365352_comment'></div>则有南仲出车。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365352_comment'></div>吉甫维宪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365352_comment'></div>纵侵镐及岐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1365352_comment'></div>密迩畿甸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1365352_comment'></div>未闻亲征之义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1365352_comment'></div>及乎汉代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1365352_comment'></div>则烽火至于甘泉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1365352_comment'></div>朝那丧其都尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1365352_comment'></div>亦止屯兵细柳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1365352_comment'></div>天子但安于上京。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1365352_comment'></div>何者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1365352_comment'></div>戎狄荒服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1365352_comment'></div>忽慌之义也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1365352_comment'></div>来则拒之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1365352_comment'></div>去则勿逐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1365352_comment'></div>以禽兽处之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1365352_comment'></div>以羁縻御之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1365352_comment'></div>比诸校猎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1365352_comment'></div>羽毛不入于服用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1365352_comment'></div>体肉不登于郊庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1365352_comment'></div>则王者不射。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1365352_comment'></div>故知千钧之孥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1365352_comment'></div>不为鼷鼠发机也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1365352_comment'></div>况万乘之重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1365352_comment'></div>而与犬羊角胜哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1365352_comment'></div>诚胜之不武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1365352_comment'></div>不足以劳也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1365352_comment'></div>且陛下有高行者甚众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1365352_comment'></div>焚珠翠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1365352_comment'></div>放鹰狗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1365352_comment'></div>出宫女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1365352_comment'></div>纳直言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1365352_comment'></div>为百姓请命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1365352_comment'></div>故关中丰稔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1365352_comment'></div>则知皇天所眷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1365352_comment'></div>通夫至诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1365352_comment'></div>今□小寇难将不久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1365352_comment'></div>陛下勤脩德音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1365352_comment'></div>日慎一日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1365352_comment'></div>当自消弭也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1365352_comment'></div>且兵法有先声后实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1365352_comment'></div>陛下但发亲征之令以旨远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1365352_comment'></div>而潜遣猛将谋略之士以济其师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1365352_comment'></div>则戎人日便崩挫也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1365352_comment'></div>岐陇粗熟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1365352_comment'></div>凋弊积年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1365352_comment'></div>千乘万骑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1365352_comment'></div>往还储峙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1365352_comment'></div>恐外有寇虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1365352_comment'></div>内兴徭没。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1365352_comment'></div>人不堪命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1365352_comment'></div>一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1365352_comment'></div>又戎虏之性。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1365352_comment'></div>倏来忽往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1365352_comment'></div>败不羞走。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1365352_comment'></div>胜不成师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1365352_comment'></div>若大军临边。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1365352_comment'></div>寻已鸟散。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1365352_comment'></div>则屡出多方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1365352_comment'></div>我受其误。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1365352_comment'></div>二也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1365352_comment'></div>况太上皇万福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1365352_comment'></div>钟爱实深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1365352_comment'></div>陛下将对寇场。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1365352_comment'></div>必劳忧虑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1365352_comment'></div>非唯问安颇缺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1365352_comment'></div>亦恐御膳有违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1365352_comment'></div>则陛下烝烝之思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1365352_comment'></div>何以自得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1365352_comment'></div>三也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1365352_comment'></div>臣故曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1365352_comment'></div>择将严边。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1365352_comment'></div>旰食脩德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1365352_comment'></div>为良算也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1365352_comment'></div>臣愚不识忌讳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1365352_comment'></div>惟陛下裁择。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1365352_comment'></div>一昨欲幸蒲州及长春宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1365352_comment'></div>臣等以人劳未复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1365352_comment'></div>不足轻扰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1365352_comment'></div>辄进狂瞽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1365352_comment'></div>遂天心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1365352_comment'></div>下制贤谏臣之奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1365352_comment'></div>恤农人之业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1365352_comment'></div>因而赐停。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1365352_comment'></div>遐迩并知陛下从谏如流之美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1365352_comment'></div>今月日未久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1365352_comment'></div>劳役倍前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1365352_comment'></div>断可知矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1365352_comment'></div>陛下若哀此疲人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1365352_comment'></div>顿兹戎辂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1365352_comment'></div>则天下幸甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1365352_comment'></div>昔蒯城侯泣谏汉祖曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1365352_comment'></div>主上常自苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1365352_comment'></div>岂无人使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1365352_comment'></div>汉祖以为爱我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1365352_comment'></div>良史书为美谈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1365352_comment'></div>今朝廷将相之众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1365352_comment'></div>岂无与陛下尽力哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1365352_comment'></div>何劳圣躬之遽行也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1365352_comment'></div>臣等不胜慺慺之诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1365352_comment'></div>谨表以闻。</div><div id='poem_sentence_120_1365352_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=714&endYear=714')">714年</a>　在知制诰任，故代拟制敕。作品：《禁断女乐敕》《命姚崇等北伐制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《郁谱》未系年，《陈谱》注：“《诏令》系于二月，《英华》系于三月”）</span><div id='poem_1365327' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365327' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365327?labeling=true' target='_blank'>禁断女乐敕</a><span class='authorDate'>（714年8月7日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_1365327")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1365327_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365327'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365327'>敕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365327_comment'></div>朕闻乐者起于心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365327_comment'></div>心者动于物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365327_comment'></div>物不正则不可为乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365327_comment'></div>乐不和则不能理人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365327_comment'></div>况天生黎蒸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365327_comment'></div>区别男女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365327_comment'></div>外则导之以礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365327_comment'></div>中则由之以乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365327_comment'></div>苟或不臧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365327_comment'></div>孰云致礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365327_comment'></div>自有隋颓靡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365327_comment'></div>庶政彫弊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365327_comment'></div>徵声遍于郑卫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365327_comment'></div>衒色矜于燕赵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365327_comment'></div>广场角抵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365327_comment'></div>长袖从风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365327_comment'></div>聚而观之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365327_comment'></div>浸以为俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365327_comment'></div>此所以戎王夺志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365327_comment'></div>夫子遂行也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365327_comment'></div>朕方大变浇讹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365327_comment'></div>用清<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1365327", 1365327, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>淄蠹</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1365327_comment'></div>眷兹女乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1365327_comment'></div>事切骄淫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1365327_comment'></div>伤风害政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1365327_comment'></div>莫斯为甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1365327_comment'></div>既违令式。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1365327_comment'></div>尤宜禁断。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1365327_comment'></div>自今以后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1365327_comment'></div>不得更然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1365327_comment'></div>仍令御史金吾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1365327_comment'></div>严加<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1365327", 1365327, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>捉搦</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1365327_comment'></div>如有犯者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1365327_comment'></div>先罪长官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1365327_comment'></div>务令杜绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1365327_comment'></div>以称朕意。</div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1365327_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1365303' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365303' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365303?labeling=true' target='_blank'>命姚崇等北伐制</a><span class='authorDate'>（714年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_1365303")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1365303_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365303'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365303'>黄门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365303_comment'></div>朕闻上古圣王之政理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365303_comment'></div>则教之以战。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365303_comment'></div>陈之以兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365303_comment'></div>盖威不詟而服不顺也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365303_comment'></div>故始于禁暴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365303_comment'></div>终于偃革。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365303_comment'></div>斯不得已而用之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365303_comment'></div>朕以寡昧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365303_comment'></div>诞膺鸿业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365303_comment'></div>思欲率于动静。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365303_comment'></div>归之教化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365303_comment'></div>岂要荒之外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365303_comment'></div>弃为匪人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365303_comment'></div>而亭育之中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365303_comment'></div>视则如子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365303_comment'></div>罔不遵我文轨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365303_comment'></div>修其贡赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365303_comment'></div>岁时相望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365303_comment'></div>道路抵属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365303_comment'></div>而默啜素称桀骜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365303_comment'></div>鸣镝于狼居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365303_comment'></div>顷自怀柔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1365303_comment'></div>屡书于象魏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1365303_comment'></div>朝廷所以许其通好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1365303_comment'></div>议以和亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1365303_comment'></div>使臣累赍缯帛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1365303_comment'></div>侍子令袭冠带。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1365303_comment'></div>庶中国无事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1365303_comment'></div>长城罢守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1365303_comment'></div>戢干戈而销剑戟者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1365303_comment'></div>朕之意焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1365303_comment'></div>岂谓我盟不渝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1365303_comment'></div>尔约斯背。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1365303_comment'></div>伊庭之际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1365303_comment'></div>遂敢侵轶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1365303_comment'></div>西北偏隅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1365303_comment'></div>尚闻啸聚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1365303_comment'></div>虽摧其精锐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1365303_comment'></div>而困于围逼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1365303_comment'></div>此不虞之失也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1365303_comment'></div>朕甚怜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1365303_comment'></div>犬羊无亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1365303_comment'></div>不可恃信而轻敌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1365303_comment'></div>熊罴有勇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1365303_comment'></div>咸能宣威而制胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1365303_comment'></div>朕由是询卿士之奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1365303_comment'></div>揽英雄之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1365303_comment'></div>谋元帅而得佐军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1365303_comment'></div>恢远图而举长策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1365303_comment'></div>随时之义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1365303_comment'></div>其在豫乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1365303_comment'></div>兵部尚书兼紫微令监修国史上柱国梁国公姚崇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1365303_comment'></div>天假其才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1365303_comment'></div>日新厥德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1365303_comment'></div>礼义为本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1365303_comment'></div>居有四邻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1365303_comment'></div>谟猷是先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1365303_comment'></div>坐知千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1365303_comment'></div>以仲山甫之操。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1365303_comment'></div>管夷吾之能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1365303_comment'></div>智涌泉而不穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1365303_comment'></div>精贯日而愈励。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1365303_comment'></div>信庙堂之柱石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1365303_comment'></div>鼎鼐之盐梅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1365303_comment'></div>必能奋尔六奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1365303_comment'></div>光我三杰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1365303_comment'></div>可持节灵武道行军大总管。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1365303_comment'></div>管内诸军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1365303_comment'></div>咸受节度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1365303_comment'></div>右领军卫大将军兼检校单于大都护镇守军使张知运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1365303_comment'></div>宽厚沈毅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1365303_comment'></div>外方内直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1365303_comment'></div>威而勇决。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1365303_comment'></div>自摄单于之台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1365303_comment'></div>惠则抚循。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1365303_comment'></div>咸仰将军之树。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1365303_comment'></div>可中军副大总管。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1365303_comment'></div>权检校原州都督李钦宪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1365303_comment'></div>家承将相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1365303_comment'></div>器兼文武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1365303_comment'></div>求古人之节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1365303_comment'></div>临事不回。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1365303_comment'></div>读前史之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1365303_comment'></div>好谋而断。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1365303_comment'></div>可左军副大总管。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1365303_comment'></div>检校左威卫将军灵州都督吕休璟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1365303_comment'></div>惯知边要。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1365303_comment'></div>久探戎律。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1365303_comment'></div>诚期报国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1365303_comment'></div>去病安用家为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1365303_comment'></div>奋不顾身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1365303_comment'></div>伯昭不持贼遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1365303_comment'></div>可右军副大总管。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1365303_comment'></div>左骁卫将军论弓仁右金吾卫大将军勿部珣左领军卫郎将摄本卫将军张直楷单于副都护臧怀亮右领军卫中郎将王海宾前朔州刺史刘元楷右武卫郎将杨楚客并州定清府果毅元萧然等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1365303_comment'></div>颇牧为用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1365303_comment'></div>关张其敌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1365303_comment'></div>怀才倜傥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1365303_comment'></div>尝邀百胜之功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1365303_comment'></div>立志经营。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1365303_comment'></div>备习尤章之训。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1365303_comment'></div>弓仁及珣并可前锋总管。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1365303_comment'></div>直楷可左虞候总管。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1365303_comment'></div>怀亮可右虞候总管。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1365303_comment'></div>海宾元楷楚客萧然等并可行军总管。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1365303_comment'></div>太仆少卿田崇璧鄜州刺史韩思复等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1365303_comment'></div>强力从政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1365303_comment'></div>精心在公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1365303_comment'></div>知无不为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1365303_comment'></div>利有攸往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1365303_comment'></div>入敷<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_110_1365303", 1365303, "Clauses/110/Comments/0")'>事典</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1365303_comment'></div>省阁称其闲练。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1365303_comment'></div>出综条察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1365303_comment'></div>吏人畏其严明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1365303_comment'></div>崇璧可兼行军长史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1365303_comment'></div>思复可兼行军司马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1365303_comment'></div>兵部郎中李休光司勋郎中张敬忠兵部员外郎王上客刑部员外郎杨钦明江州别驾李邕等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1365303_comment'></div>或特达圭璋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1365303_comment'></div>所谓登坛之宝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1365303_comment'></div>或翩翩书记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1365303_comment'></div>曾闻及霤之词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1365303_comment'></div>可以光赞出车。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1365303_comment'></div>宏宣入幕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1365303_comment'></div>并可行军判官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1365303_comment'></div>灵武军兵加满十万人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1365303_comment'></div>旧马既少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1365303_comment'></div>宜于内外闲厩抽壮马添满六万匹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1365303_comment'></div>原夏等州要害处亦量加马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1365303_comment'></div>其后军兵六万人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1365303_comment'></div>马二万匹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1365303_comment'></div>先来点定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1365303_comment'></div>宜令卫尉卿李延昌左羽林将军杨敬述等至冬检阅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1365303_comment'></div>且当处团结。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1365303_comment'></div>待后进止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1365303_comment'></div>其有先锋破贼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1365303_comment'></div>斩馘摧坚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1365303_comment'></div>功效灼然者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1365303_comment'></div>并委军将便定功赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1365303_comment'></div>不须限以常格。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1365303_comment'></div>总管以下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1365303_comment'></div>有损失兵马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1365303_comment'></div>不能力战。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1365303_comment'></div>弃军逃命者便杀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1365303_comment'></div>其有弃军入贼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1365303_comment'></div>不能死节者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1365303_comment'></div>妻子依叛缘坐法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1365303_comment'></div>凡此和众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1365303_comment'></div>誓于师兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1365303_comment'></div>统燕犀冀马之雄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1365303_comment'></div>屯斩蛟挈鼋之勇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1365303_comment'></div>鼓鼙沸野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1365303_comment'></div>旌旗彗云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1365303_comment'></div>岂式遏于河塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1365303_comment'></div>方震惊于沙漠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1365303_comment'></div>于是乎箪醪以信之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1365303_comment'></div>芳饵以赏之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1365303_comment'></div>戮扬干之仆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1365303_comment'></div>必行其令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1365303_comment'></div>持穰苴之兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1365303_comment'></div>不枉其法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1365303_comment'></div>坚壁清野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1365303_comment'></div>则投石而有馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1365303_comment'></div>追奔逐北。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1365303_comment'></div>则扫尘而无类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1365303_comment'></div>俾权宜于阃外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1365303_comment'></div>仍布告于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1365303_comment'></div>暂劳永逸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1365303_comment'></div>在此行焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1365303_comment'></div>主者施行。</div><div id='poem_sentence_168_1365303_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=714&endYear=714')">714年9月11日</a>　在知制诰任，有文。作品：《幸新丰及同州敕》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《郁谱》未系年。）</span><div id='poem_1365328' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365328' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365328?labeling=true' target='_blank'>幸新丰及同州敕</a><span class='authorDate'>（714年9月11日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_1365328")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1365328_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365328'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365328'>敕。虞之四朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365328_comment'></div>且编区宇。汉之三辅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365328_comment'></div>本同京师。善于古者考于今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365328_comment'></div>发乎迩者应乎远。若顺豫之事缺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365328_comment'></div>则紊于王制。巡游之典备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365328_comment'></div>则虑于人劳。朕受命膺期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365328_comment'></div>励精设教。幸乾坤幽赞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365328_comment'></div>风雨咸若。百物既阜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365328_comment'></div>三农已登。同颖荐于宗庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365328_comment'></div>稆穗生于郡国。我无大桀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365328_comment'></div>实欣于岁取。人有小康。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365328_comment'></div>未果于时迈。但左翊之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365328_comment'></div>近入黄图。新丰之邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365328_comment'></div>甫邻青绮。山川宫馆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365328_comment'></div>咫尺相望。欲过灞亭而涉𤂴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365328_comment'></div>经沙阜而临渭。见彼耆耋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365328_comment'></div>问其疾苦。察长吏之政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365328_comment'></div>恤黎氓之冤。盖所以展义陈诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365328_comment'></div>观风问俗。始自畿甸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365328_comment'></div>化于天下。宜以今月二十五日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365328_comment'></div>幸长春宫。停五日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365328_comment'></div>缘顿所须。并令所司支备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365328_comment'></div>一事以上。不得干扰州县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1365328_comment'></div>发日唯量将飞骑万骑行。更不须别遣兵马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1365328_comment'></div>及妄有科唤。朕此行之处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1365328_comment'></div>不得进奉。在路有称冤苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1365328_comment'></div>州县不能疏决者。委御史金吾收状为进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1365328_comment'></div>各勉所职。副朕意焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1365328_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1365328_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=714&endYear=714')">714年10月</a>　在中书侍郎知制诰任，时玄宗决定亲征吐蕃，上表谏，不听；再上此表以谏。作品：《谏銮驾亲征吐蕃》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《郁谱》未系年。）</span>《谏銮驾亲征吐蕃第二表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《郁谱》未系年。）</span><div id='poem_1365353' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365353' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365353?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谏銮驾亲征吐蕃表第二表</a><span class='authorDate'>（714年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_1365353")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1365353_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365353'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365353'>臣某言。皇情悯彼边氓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365353_comment'></div>忿兹凶丑。必亲吊伐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365353_comment'></div>臣闻天子之怒。伏尸百万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365353_comment'></div>流血千里。若吐蕃者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365353_comment'></div>鼠窃豕食。犹鱼跃釜中耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365353_comment'></div>又何足以当陛下之怒哉。臣愚窃以不可何也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365353_comment'></div>频岁以来。百姓不足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365353_comment'></div>岐陇河渭。动无储廪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365353_comment'></div>今大驾遄征。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1365353", 1365353, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>供置</span>仓卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365353_comment'></div>若缓之以法。必乏我军兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365353_comment'></div>急之以刑。则人无所措。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365353_comment'></div>此时不可也。乘边将士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365353_comment'></div>或交锋刃。飞书告捷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365353_comment'></div>首尾继来。料贼之势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365353_comment'></div>不复支久。陛下若轻车电发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365353_comment'></div>则亏持重之虑。如按部徐行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365353_comment'></div>又非赴敌之义。此势不可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365353_comment'></div>盖称王者之师。有征无战。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365353_comment'></div>谓蕃贡有阙。王命征之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365353_comment'></div>于是乎理兵其郊。获辞而止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365353_comment'></div>非谓擐甲临军。敌人畏之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365353_comment'></div>莫敢战也。是以古者圣帝明王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365353_comment'></div>无亲将也。云黄帝五十三战者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1365353_comment'></div>即缔构草昧。非太平之本也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1365353_comment'></div>故自阪泉之后。修身养德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1365353_comment'></div>与七圣游于具茨。三月齐而访道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1365353_comment'></div>今陛下凤翔藩邸。龙跃御天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1365353_comment'></div>不日而再造乾坤。一呼而拨定祸乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1365353_comment'></div>是则圣过黄帝。而经纶之业备矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1365353_comment'></div>故当高居深视。制礼作乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1365353_comment'></div>禅梁甫。登崆峒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1365353_comment'></div>雅歌从容。为后王法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1365353_comment'></div>阃外之事。属诸将军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1365353_comment'></div>何至厌玉辇。甘金革。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1365353_comment'></div>邀功马上。为一人之敌也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1365353_comment'></div>今吐蕃遣偏裨小丑。干犯大国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1365353_comment'></div>我军未捷。而耻巳深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1365353_comment'></div>而陛下又将屈至尊。远为之敌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1365353_comment'></div>使攻无不胜。战无不克。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1365353_comment'></div>犹未足以誇四夷。适足以骄敌人羞天下也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1365353_comment'></div>又扈从之人。半非斗士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1365353_comment'></div>使给往来。日费千金。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1365353_comment'></div>与其倾耗资储。孰若回募骁健。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1365353_comment'></div>重赏之下。必有勇夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1365353_comment'></div>以敢死之师。当疲老之寇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1365353_comment'></div>若排山压卵。何必劳圣躬哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1365353_comment'></div>况事有不可轻。敌有不可小者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1365353_comment'></div>昔周师困于祝聃。汉祖厄于平城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1365353_comment'></div>安可谓吐蕃无祝聃耶。河右无平城耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1365353_comment'></div>千金之子。坐不垂堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1365353_comment'></div>圣人终日不离辎重。不可忽也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1365353_comment'></div>臣又闻吐蕃之入也。惟趣羊马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1365353_comment'></div>不至杀掠于人。但剥体取衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1365353_comment'></div>此穷寇耳。又数道俱进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1365353_comment'></div>按队徐行者。若有所望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1365353_comment'></div>恐连谋北狄。陛下如必亲戎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1365353_comment'></div>迈于岐陇。脱幽并警候。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1365353_comment'></div>灵夏驰烽。突厥之骑南侵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1365353_comment'></div>犹如吐蕃之势。长安百姓惊扰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1365353_comment'></div>太上皇帝岂不忧劳。陛下以三贼凭陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1365353_comment'></div>谁者先击。岂可挂西军之众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1365353_comment'></div>分御北胡。野次之閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1365353_comment'></div>遥谋庙堂不战之策。帝城空虚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1365353_comment'></div>众亦何仰。臣固曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1365353_comment'></div>居中制胜。为防萌杜渐之上略也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1365353_comment'></div>今但发近县之兵。择良能之将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1365353_comment'></div>重为之募。严为之约。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1365353_comment'></div>其败衄失律者。巳加必罚之诛矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1365353_comment'></div>其勇敢杀敌者。亦愿加信赏之劝焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1365353_comment'></div>兼购贼中有能斩酋帅以下归降者。及边军之士俘馘丑虏者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1365353_comment'></div>并厚为赏格以班之。我军必大振矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1365353_comment'></div>彼贼闻之。自解而去也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1365353_comment'></div>又承万骑官者数千。其受国恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1365353_comment'></div>亦已多矣。并习练枭雄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1365353_comment'></div>远近所惮。陛下若拔为将帅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1365353_comment'></div>或备军行。勒以从征。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1365353_comment'></div>足可威贼也。又数十年来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1365353_comment'></div>人之多幸。乃有全躯保妻子之臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1365353_comment'></div>亲戚贪佞之辈。并人厌阶勋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1365353_comment'></div>家盈封爵。乃至紫衣塞路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1365353_comment'></div>朱服满朝。皆能侵国害人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1365353_comment'></div>未见尺功寸效。自陛下欲栉风沐雨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1365353_comment'></div>亲冒边尘。不闻献一奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1365353_comment'></div>输一策。主忧臣辱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1365353_comment'></div>请代此行。而但糜府库之财。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1365353_comment'></div>殚征税之奉。呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1365353_comment'></div>此所谓六蝎五蠹者是也。臣所以痛心椎膺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1365353_comment'></div>而为陛下言之耳。何不冗食重禄之夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1365353_comment'></div>权令御寇。此但惜身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1365353_comment'></div>自当为国。而容养蠹蝎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1365353_comment'></div>轻劳圣躬。贾谊所以长叹息继之恸哭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1365353_comment'></div>为此也。昔楚汉相持。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1365353_comment'></div>楚强而汉弱。汉祖犹曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1365353_comment'></div>使刑徒击公。吾不能斗力也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1365353_comment'></div>区区之时。犹能如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1365353_comment'></div>况今四海之内。皆为臣妾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1365353_comment'></div>普天之下。莫非王土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1365353_comment'></div>而蕞尔一寇。如一蚊之附九牛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1365353_comment'></div>陛下便欲降万乘之尊。亲衔橛之变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1365353_comment'></div>轻其帝重。逸此庸臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1365353_comment'></div>臣窃为陛下不取也。夫三皇善用仁圣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1365353_comment'></div>五帝善用智勇。陛下当三五之运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1365353_comment'></div>而舍其所长。非英武之称也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1365353_comment'></div>议者或谓陛下前欲征匈奴。制行而止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1365353_comment'></div>今必须一出。示信万人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1365353_comment'></div>此大谬也。夫兵者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1365353_comment'></div>以正合。以奇胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1365353_comment'></div>故不厌诈。而尚以权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1365353_comment'></div>今以陛下英雄之资。发亲征之令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1365353_comment'></div>敌闻而惧。我势已张。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1365353_comment'></div>更练熊罴。推毂将帅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1365353_comment'></div>见可而进。骋变如神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1365353_comment'></div>适谓幽远而难知。河汉而不测。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1365353_comment'></div>人是以服。信是以孚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1365353_comment'></div>夫何疑也。今夫顿岐陇之外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1365353_comment'></div>扰疲弊之人。率徵之兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1365353_comment'></div>不过数万。阻饥积岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1365353_comment'></div>师不宿饱。州县急于供费。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1365353_comment'></div>力不足以救边。军容制于部伍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1365353_comment'></div>势不足以赴敌。脱胡骑纷扰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1365353_comment'></div>京城空虚。人情易动难安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1365353_comment'></div>不可不虑也。如太上皇暂勤旰食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1365353_comment'></div>是陛下以天下之大。不能安其亲也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1365353_comment'></div>惟陛下图之。今卜征有期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1365353_comment'></div>不可顿止。但更延发日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1365353_comment'></div>示择良辰。以候西军动静。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1365353_comment'></div>以为长策。臣愚所陈众计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1365353_comment'></div>亦愿陛下择善而从之。臣闻资父事君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1365353_comment'></div>惟忠与孝。况臣职参衮阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1365353_comment'></div>逾念谠言。苟益涓尘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1365353_comment'></div>死而无悔。昨四日已于閤门封进一表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1365353_comment'></div>恐未周览。今复尽愚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1365353_comment'></div>非敢阻于成规。实愿广于天听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1365353_comment'></div>轻言时政。伏待刑辟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1365353_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_134_1365353_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=714&endYear=714')">714年</a>　冬在知制诰任，故代拟制敕。作品：《授薛讷右羽林军大将军制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《郁谱》未系年。）</span><div id='poem_1365214' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365214_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365214'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365214'>黄门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365214_comment'></div>出师御寇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365214_comment'></div>功成于告捷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365214_comment'></div>振旅休兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365214_comment'></div>礼备于行赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365214_comment'></div>摄左羽林军将军借紫金鱼袋薛讷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365214_comment'></div>勋阀良将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365214_comment'></div>邦家老臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365214_comment'></div>读太公之立言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365214_comment'></div>受穰苴之为法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365214_comment'></div>德业中邃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365214_comment'></div>墙仞䍐窥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365214_comment'></div>智谋宏远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365214_comment'></div>泉源不竭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365214_comment'></div>须伫公孙之绩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365214_comment'></div>颇蠲孟明之罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365214_comment'></div>遂能长驱陇上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365214_comment'></div>深入湟中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365214_comment'></div>歼厥犬戎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365214_comment'></div>残其虿毒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365214_comment'></div>野无遗孽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365214_comment'></div>朝有茂勋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365214_comment'></div>宜膺设坛之宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1365214_comment'></div>俾光期门之寄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1365214_comment'></div>可右羽林大将军上柱国河东郡开国公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1365214_comment'></div>仍赐物三百段。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1365214_comment'></div>银五百两。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1365214_comment'></div>钱二百贯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1365214_comment'></div>主者施行。</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1365214_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=714&endYear=714')">714年</a>　在知制诰任，故代拟制敕。作品：《授阿史那承献特进制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《郁谱》未系年。）</span><div id='poem_1365120' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365120' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365120?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授阿史那承献特进制</a><span class='authorDate'>（714年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_1365120")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1365120_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365120'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365120'>黄门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365120_comment'></div>建官制爵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365120_comment'></div>立化之本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365120_comment'></div>树善崇功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365120_comment'></div>惟能是任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365120_comment'></div>招慰十姓兼四镇经略大使定远道行军大总管北庭大都护瀚海军使节度巴西诸蕃国左骁卫大将军摄鸿胪卿上柱国兴昔可汗阿史那承献。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365120_comment'></div>淩铁关之远塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365120_comment'></div>威扬万里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365120_comment'></div>雄金山之旧族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365120_comment'></div>诚竭累朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365120_comment'></div>每读古人之书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365120_comment'></div>且多奇士之节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365120_comment'></div>岂止秺侯忠孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365120_comment'></div>呼韩允绪而巳哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365120_comment'></div>顷服獯戎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365120_comment'></div>绥其种落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365120_comment'></div>茂勋则远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365120_comment'></div>巳宠于登坛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365120_comment'></div>厚秩未加。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365120_comment'></div>俾荣于开府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365120_comment'></div>亚台之典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365120_comment'></div>群议允集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365120_comment'></div>可特进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1365120_comment'></div>馀并如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1365120_comment'></div>主者施行。</div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1365120_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=714&endYear=714')">714年</a>　弟诜除给事中，颋任紫微侍郎，是诜的上司官，为避嫌，故请求改任他职。作品：《谢弟诜除给事中自求改职表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《郁谱》未系年。）</span><div id='poem_1365347' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365347' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365347?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢弟诜除给事中自求改职表</a><span class='authorDate'>（714年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_1365347")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1365347_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365347'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365347'>臣某言。伏奉今月二十四日敕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365347_comment'></div>以臣弟左司郎中臣诜为给事中。嘉命猥臻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365347_comment'></div>惶怖相视。荣以为戚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365347_comment'></div>茫然失图。臣某中谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365347_comment'></div>臣兄弟数人。获承累代之庇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365347_comment'></div>自幼而长。惟愚与直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365347_comment'></div>臣弟臣诜。初一尉耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365347_comment'></div>窃愿从微守分。岂思养拙邀荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365347_comment'></div>而乾道曲临。一门特幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365347_comment'></div>前恩罔谢。后忝仍及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365347_comment'></div>生臣者父母。宠臣者圣明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365347_comment'></div>非臣等陨首流肠。少酬万分之一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365347_comment'></div>臣某中谢。臣自叨清切。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365347_comment'></div>颇历星霜。乏钟会五字之敏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365347_comment'></div>多王濛四年之任。竟未能陈一策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365347_comment'></div>进一贤。雕虫粗辨其所为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365347_comment'></div>濡翼久知其非据。下惭先臣戒盈之训。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365347_comment'></div>上负圣主则哲之明。常甘屏黜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365347_comment'></div>以待髦俊。岂悟臣诜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365347_comment'></div>复私成造。比臣则行有馀力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365347_comment'></div>选众则曾无足言。遂使联事掖垣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365347_comment'></div>同趋阶陛。或紊公式。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365347_comment'></div>必招私议。臣知不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1365347_comment'></div>物谓臣何。安有兄弟妄庸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1365347_comment'></div>并居东西要近。臣怀腼愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1365347_comment'></div>非敢身谋。事或乖违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1365347_comment'></div>实尘皇揆。伏乞详臣自卜之审。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1365347_comment'></div>察臣由衷之请。臣弟诜殊荣既拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1365347_comment'></div>奉纶绂而难回。臣颋薄技何成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1365347_comment'></div>顾瓶筲而易竭。指于十手。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1365347_comment'></div>臣假遑宁。不如一腋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1365347_comment'></div>臣将焉用。所冀移臣职守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1365347_comment'></div>允臣陈乞。抑朝章之是穆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1365347_comment'></div>匪等列之攸宜。慺慺款诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1365347_comment'></div>昧死期达。无任悚荷屏营之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1365347_comment'></div>谨诣肃章门外奉表以闻。又臣先臣某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1365347_comment'></div>往忠社稷。陛下特赐茅土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1365347_comment'></div>遂臣所让。因授臣第四弟乂右补阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1365347_comment'></div>亦希别从选序。不敢同在近侍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1365347_comment'></div>臣之感恩。不识为喻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1365347_comment'></div>轻黩旒冕。惧深冰谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1365347_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_41_1365347_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=714&endYear=714')">714年</a>　在知制诰任，故代拟制敕。作品：《授张廷珪黄门侍郎制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《郁谱》未系年。）</span>《授宋璟御史大夫制》<span id='poem_content_1365124'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365124'>黄门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365124_comment'></div>东西禁掖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365124_comment'></div>出纳王言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365124_comment'></div>精选贤良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365124_comment'></div>用存駮正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365124_comment'></div>正议大夫行尚书礼部侍郎上柱国兼判尚书左丞张廷圭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365124_comment'></div>文儒秀士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365124_comment'></div>謇谔忠贞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365124_comment'></div>汪洋有大雅之风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365124_comment'></div>明敏得至公之操。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365124_comment'></div>言唯及霤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365124_comment'></div>曩岁尝闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365124_comment'></div>学则临池。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365124_comment'></div>当时莫比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365124_comment'></div>自历迁台省。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365124_comment'></div>受理纲辖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365124_comment'></div>声尘益茂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365124_comment'></div>闻实攸称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365124_comment'></div>俾登青闼之荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365124_comment'></div>式践丹墀之列。<div showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365178?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授宋璟御史大夫制</a><span class='authorDate'>（714年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a id='poem_sentence_1_1365178_comment'></div>百寮之师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365178_comment'></div>纪纲是任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365178_comment'></div>莅事惟能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365178_comment'></div>国子祭酒上柱国广平郡开国公东都留守宋璟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365178_comment'></div>含纯粹之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365178_comment'></div>秉清刚之气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365178_comment'></div>学研精以辨政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365178_comment'></div>文体要以经远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365178_comment'></div>吉人之寡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365178_comment'></div>敷言有训。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365178_comment'></div>君子之慎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365178_comment'></div>择行无违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365178_comment'></div>正色而自具阳秋。<div id='poem_sentence_16_1365178_comment'></div>献忠纳规。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365178_comment'></div>常闻沃心之任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365178_comment'></div>靡惮犯颜之情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365178_comment'></div>使其坐以镇俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365178_comment'></div>嶷然当朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365178_comment'></div>则不能者退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1365178_comment'></div>不仁者远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1365178_comment'></div>王臣蹇蹇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1365178_comment'></div>懦夫有立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1365178_comment'></div>俾光天宪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1365178_comment'></div>式副人瞻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1365178_comment'></div>可御史大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1365178_comment'></div>勋封如故。<div class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365180?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授崔沔御史中丞制</a><span class='authorDate'>（714年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_1365180")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1365180_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365180'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365180'>敕。朝请郎守尚书虞部郎中崔沔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365180_comment'></div>纯至之心。求忠出孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365180_comment'></div>精微之用。博学多文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365180_comment'></div>故能清以激贪。静而镇躁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365180_comment'></div>顷摄官持宪。履绳错墨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365180_comment'></div>临事不诎。在公则闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365180_comment'></div>宜正三独之名。以光二丞之秩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365180_comment'></div>可守御史中丞知东都留台事。散官如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365180_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1365180_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1365183' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365183' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365183?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授褚璆侍御史制</a><span class='authorDate'>（714年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365183'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365183'>敕。通直郎监察御史里行骁骑尉褚璆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365183_comment'></div>清识雅致。遒文赡学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365183_comment'></div>养能见其盘错。临事杜于脂韦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365183_comment'></div>比骛轻轺。且持严。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365183_comment'></div>逢二庭之寇。无乏于馈军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365183_comment'></div>徵万里之兵。有闻于赴敌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365183_comment'></div>念劳斯属。懋赏攸凭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365183_comment'></div>增迁御史之端。式宠侍臣之列。<div class='inline' id='poem_1365208' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365208' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365208?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授杨峤国子祭酒制</a><span /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1365208_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365208'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365208'>黄门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365208_comment'></div>行成于内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365208_comment'></div>树风有循良之课。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365208_comment'></div>试剧闻精练之能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365208_comment'></div>往在东都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365208_comment'></div>摄于西序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365208_comment'></div>逾劝于攻木。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365208_comment'></div>可国子祭酒。<div class='inline' id='poem_1365257' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365257' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365257?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授宋璟兼京兆尹制</a><span class='authorDate'>（714年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_1365257")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1365257_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365257'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365257'>敕。惟雍设都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365257_comment'></div>实难其理。尹京镇俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365257_comment'></div>不易其才。御史大夫上柱国广平郡开国公宋璟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365257_comment'></div>天假直清。时归方正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365257_comment'></div>端庄以立。奸慝迁于望风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365257_comment'></div>果断而行。纲维成于不日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365257_comment'></div>衣冠所重。人吏攸钦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365257_comment'></div>俾承弹纠之馀。仍综浩穰之剧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365257_comment'></div>可兼京兆尹。馀如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365257_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1365257_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=714&endYear=714')">714年</a>　约本年，代拟授张仁愿兵部尚书制文。作品：《授张仁愿兵部尚书制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（开元元年—开元二年，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1365148' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365148_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365148'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365148'>黄门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365148_comment'></div>名遂身退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365148_comment'></div>则闻告老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365148_comment'></div>优贤尚齿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365148_comment'></div>不忘<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1365148", 1365148, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>求旧</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365148_comment'></div>镇国大将军行右卫大将军上柱国韩国公致仕仍给全禄及品子课朔望朝参张仁愿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365148_comment'></div>有将相之才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365148_comment'></div>树忠公之绩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365148_comment'></div>入称三杰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365148_comment'></div>帷幄所以运筹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365148_comment'></div>出总六师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365148_comment'></div>塞垣由其卧鼓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365148_comment'></div>悬利器而御物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365148_comment'></div>自中于桑林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365148_comment'></div>推素心以得士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365148_comment'></div>更成于李径。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365148_comment'></div>故能居室而应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365148_comment'></div>在邦必闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365148_comment'></div>洎养疾归休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365148_comment'></div>辞荣及礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365148_comment'></div>用旌渭滨之兆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365148_comment'></div>空想颍阳之问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365148_comment'></div>乞言紧赖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1365148_comment'></div>宠德攸宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1365148_comment'></div>伫增题剑之荣。<div id='poem_sentence_26_1365148_comment'></div>馀如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1365148_comment'></div>主者施行。</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1365148_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1365228", 1365228, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>颖拔</span>。思诣精微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365228_comment'></div>早升多士之行。独擅词人之律。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365228_comment'></div>克树循良之绩。储闱<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1365228", 1365228, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>总务</span>。<div class='inline'
