id='poem_title_1365318_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365318'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365318'>敕朝集使等。朕承天丕命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365318_comment'></div>子育万方。树之师长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365318_comment'></div>俾敷景化。将以固兹邦本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365318_comment'></div>致诸升平。而大道缅然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365318_comment'></div>淳风未畅。租赋颇减。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365318_comment'></div>户口犹虚。水旱相仍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365318_comment'></div>耕桑莫赡。盖朕之不德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365318_comment'></div>而吏之无方。永言于兹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365318_comment'></div>良增叹息。往岁河南失稔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365318_comment'></div>时属荐饥。州将贪名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365318_comment'></div>不为检覆。致令贫弱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365318_comment'></div>萍流外境。责在致理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365318_comment'></div>有从贬黜。因兹以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365318_comment'></div>率多妄破。或式外奏免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365318_comment'></div>或损中加数。至如密州去秋奏涝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365318_comment'></div>管户二万八千八百。不损者两户而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365318_comment'></div>无田商贾之流。雷同入数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365318_comment'></div>自馀诸州。不损户即丁少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365318_comment'></div>得损户即丁多。天灾流行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365318_comment'></div>岂应偏并。皆是不度国用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365318_comment'></div>取媚下人。曩之刻薄也如彼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365318_comment'></div>今之踰滥也如此。不副朕意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365318_comment'></div>一至于斯。疏怠之愆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1365318_comment'></div>虽已会赦。尸旷之迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1365318_comment'></div>岂不多惭。当令所司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1365318_comment'></div>比类澄汰。卿等与朕共理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1365318_comment'></div>实惟分忧。各勉思政途。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1365318_comment'></div>以匡不逮。其百姓閒事物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1365318_comment'></div>去冬赦书已处分讫。若人有疾苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1365318_comment'></div>乡有奸豪。不劝农桑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1365318_comment'></div>不崇学校。并宜敦劝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1365318_comment'></div>以正风俗。逃亡之户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1365318_comment'></div>必藉招携。差科之閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1365318_comment'></div>务令停减。如台省处事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1365318_comment'></div>有不稳便于时者。具利害闻奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1365318_comment'></div>勿复依随。以损百姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1365318_comment'></div>卿等至州之日。宜一留意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1365318_comment'></div>用绥我庶人。并即好去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1365318_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_38_1365318_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1365322' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365322' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365322?labeling=true' target='_blank'>原减囚徒敕</a><span class='authorDate'>（715年5月16日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_1365322")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1365322_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365322'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365322'>敕。惟刑恤哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365322_comment'></div>古之道也。朕抚临四海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365322_comment'></div>茂育万邦。思致淳风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365322_comment'></div>登诸寿域。期画冠而不犯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365322_comment'></div>故开罗而在宥。念兹下愚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365322_comment'></div>自抵常法。时属盛夏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365322_comment'></div>天其养长。在物最灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365322_comment'></div>惟人为贵。朕处台榭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365322_comment'></div>犹有郁蒸之毒。彼居囹圄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365322_comment'></div>能无憯怛之忧。故遣紫微黄门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365322_comment'></div>备加按省。览其所奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365322_comment'></div>用悯于怀。爰矜可恕之罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365322_comment'></div>必务惟轻之义。将布宽惠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365322_comment'></div>俾从原减。宜依前件。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365260_comment'></div>蒲州刺史上柱国平阳郡开国公毕构。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365260_comment'></div>纯懿笃密。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365260_comment'></div>直方清劲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365260_comment'></div>积学所以体要道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365260_comment'></div>力文所以会雅正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365260_comment'></div>徇公灭私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365260_comment'></div>吏不犯法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365260_comment'></div>擒奸擿伏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365260_comment'></div>人无閒言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365260_comment'></div>在邦则闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365260_comment'></div>从政何有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365260_comment'></div>六遂分职。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365260_comment'></div>可河南尹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365260_comment'></div>勋封如故。<div class='inline' showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365304?labeling=true' target='_blank'>命薛讷等与九姓共伐默啜制</a><span class='authorDate'>（715年10月14日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365304'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365304'>黄门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365304_comment'></div>朕闻天所与者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365304_comment'></div>奉天命而不违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365304_comment'></div>人所弃者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365304_comment'></div>顺人心而必伐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365304_comment'></div>由是古先帝王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365304_comment'></div>光宅区县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365304_comment'></div>实仗威武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365304_comment'></div>用清荒戎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365304_comment'></div>时义远矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365304_comment'></div>默啜以叛亡饿隶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365304_comment'></div>凶忍遗孽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365304_comment'></div>敢迷声朔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365304_comment'></div>独匪人臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365304_comment'></div>祸皆所召。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365304_comment'></div>祅不自作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365304_comment'></div>举其巢穴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365304_comment'></div>尽是离心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365304_comment'></div>瞻我阙庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365304_comment'></div>相望内面。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365304_comment'></div>犹窜身于寒苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365304_comment'></div>且寄命于旬时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365304_comment'></div>当胡运之已穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1365304_comment'></div>在轩兵而可逐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1365304_comment'></div>九姓部落等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1365304_comment'></div>忠诚贯日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1365304_comment'></div>义烈闻风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1365304_comment'></div>数其擢发之愆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1365304_comment'></div>成于屈指之计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1365304_comment'></div>请除骄子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1365304_comment'></div>累遣使臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1365304_comment'></div>摧锋而愿先驱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1365304_comment'></div>右羽林军大将军朔方道大总管薛讷左卫大将军安北副大都护兼剡王府长史平郡公张知运右羽林军将军兼凉州都督赤水大使杨敬述右骑卫将军论弓仁左武卫将军大武军大使于仁誓右武卫将军丰安军大使杜宾客丰州都督西受降城使吕休琳胜州都督东受降城使邵宏左金吾卫大将军回纥伏帝匐右卫大将军浑元忠左卫大将军似和舒右武卫将军兼贺兰州都督契苾承祖等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1365304_comment'></div>或出将入相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1365304_comment'></div>有经济之才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365288_comment'></div>朕抚临亿兆。宪章古昔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365288_comment'></div>俾裂河山之赋。用畴汤沐之恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365288_comment'></div>可依前件。主者施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365288_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1365288_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1365375' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365375' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365375?labeling=true' target='_blank'>双白鹰赞</a><span class='authorDate'>（715年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_1365375")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>四言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_1365375_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1365375'>开元乙卯岁。东夷君长自肃慎扶馀而贡白鹰一双。其一重三斤有四两。其一重三斤有二两。皆皓如练色。斑若䌽章。积雪全映。飞花碎点。所谓金气之英。瑶光之精。高髻伟臆。长距秀颈。奋发而锐。坚刚则厉。摩天绝海。电击飙逝。观其行时令。顺秋杀。指挥应捷。顾盼馀雄。当落鹏之赏。蔑仇鹞之敌。实稀代之尤也。皇上祗膺圣图。钦若王道。方宝贤重谷。尊儒养艾。后宫撤绮绣。前殿焚珠玉。与王侯卿士朝夕论思。异无所贵。轻卫公之好鹤。奇无所珍。同汉皇之却马。畋岂务于驰骋。猎以存乎蒐狩。未尝合围掩群。截羽洒血。乃强不攫而猛不噬矣。然以万方入贡。怀其来也。三年重译。嘉其至也。故仁为之心。有仁则勇。威为之力。有威则重。况此鸟猛过于众。重倍于凡。礼于君则劝忠。祭于祖则立敬。壮其体则用武。綷其翼则成文。彼宠而服之。鹖也能果。荣而戴之。蝉也能洁。矧乎职命司寇。师维尚父。闻箴剌奸。择善为吏。盖选士之是式。匪从禽之足云。此所以备于图而儆在位也。微臣奉制。敢称赞曰。</div><div id='poem_preface_1365375_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365375'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365375'>鹰之大者，精明竦峻。<div id='poem_sentence_0_1365375_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1365375'>劲而横绝，雄则远振。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1365375_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1365375'>锦文素䌽，珠联玉润。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1365375_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1365375'>往乃奋威，将军所徇。<div id='poem_sentence_3_1365375_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1365375'>鹰之次者，勇锐光芒。<div id='poem_sentence_4_1365375_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_1365375'>截海而至，乘风载扬。<div id='poem_sentence_5_1365375_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_1365375'>络以红联，文其䌽章。<div id='poem_sentence_6_1365375_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_1365375'>下鞲必中，惟吏之良。<div id='poem_sentence_7_1365375_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_1365375'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1365375_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1365387' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365387' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365387?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唐长安西明寺塔碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（715年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_1365387")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1365387_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365387'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365387'>颋尝诵先王之训。探众圣之旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365387_comment'></div>盖本三极而宗五常也。汛以观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365387_comment'></div>则吹万。循而照。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365387_comment'></div>则归一。知夫弃理悟寂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365387_comment'></div>与能制事者。觉为之路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365387_comment'></div>以诣精微。定得其门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365387_comment'></div>而宏汲引。邱铎不言乎始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365387_comment'></div>扁轮不议乎末。其真如之蕴邪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365387_comment'></div>智有无涯。閒之以息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365387_comment'></div>物无有秘。应之以形矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365387_comment'></div>物也者。不可使形止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365387_comment'></div>有也者。不可因无息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365387_comment'></div>然后三极冥符。适时之义远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365387_comment'></div>五常昭合。济俗之功大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365387_comment'></div>其象法之韪也。赫矣帝唐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365387_comment'></div>发于天光。鸿勋铺亿载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365387_comment'></div>盛业冠三代。钦明浚哲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365387_comment'></div>以至高宗天皇。绍元命而导要道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365387_comment'></div>时孝敬皇帝储副承祧。晦明示疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365387_comment'></div>一物三善。禀人君之量。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365387_comment'></div>喜而又惧。闻王子之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365387_comment'></div>以大威力。作宏誓愿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365387_comment'></div>凭有为之基。获无妄之吉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1365387_comment'></div>粤明庆元年仲秋癸酉。诏于京兆延康里置西明寺以报之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1365387_comment'></div>先是三藏法师元奘。惟应真乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1365387_comment'></div>乃成果者。首命视延袤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1365387_comment'></div>财广轮。往以绳度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1365387_comment'></div>还而墨顺。次命少监吴兴沈谦之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1365387_comment'></div>倾水衡之藏。彻阿宗之府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1365387_comment'></div>制而缩版。参以悬矩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1365387_comment'></div>钩北阜之舄。伐南山之枚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1365387_comment'></div>初历落以星峙。忽穹崇以云曼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1365387_comment'></div>攒栱岌嶪。骞甍宛转。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1365387_comment'></div>揆阴阳之中。居<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1365387", 1365387, "Clauses/67/Comments/0")'>子午</span>之直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1365387_comment'></div>丛倚观阁。层立殿堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1365387_comment'></div>虬凤夭矫而相承。鬼神睢盱而欲起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1365387_comment'></div>罔不珠缀䆗窱。旋题照烛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1365387_comment'></div>琉璃洞澈。菡萏纷敷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1365387_comment'></div>白日为之隐蔽。丹霓为之舒卷者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1365387_comment'></div>凡十有二所。每动微风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1365387_comment'></div>滴细霤。窅然其若来和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1365387_comment'></div>鎗然其有去音。悉丰丽博敞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1365387_comment'></div>峥嵘曭朗。奕奕焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1365387_comment'></div>眈眈焉。中国之庄严未有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1365387_comment'></div>大荒之神异所绝。于是召以正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1365387_comment'></div>工以考。安瑞表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1365387_comment'></div>湛真容。绣色电烻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1365387_comment'></div>金光火合。移忉利之宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1365387_comment'></div>镇菩提之座。状微笑而莞尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1365387_comment'></div>意屡言于善哉者。不可胜计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1365387_comment'></div>遂赐田园百顷。净人百房。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1365387_comment'></div>车五十两。绢布二千疋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1365387_comment'></div>徵海内大德高僧。有毗罗静念满颢广说鹏耆辩了鹙子知会凡五十人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1365387_comment'></div>广京师行业童子。有空净闻道善思喜法须迦分施撰择不染者凡一百五十人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1365387_comment'></div>导天衢。指天寺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1365387_comment'></div>上御安福观以遣之。有则有容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1365387_comment'></div>昂昂禺禺。骈象马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1365387_comment'></div>错人龙。幡幢之阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1365387_comment'></div>周四十里。伎乐之响。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1365387_comment'></div>震三千界。使其将法印。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1365387_comment'></div>发妙梯。上至乎穆清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1365387_comment'></div>下遗乎纷浊。散而无我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1365387_comment'></div>见桃李之成蹊。聚则有朋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1365387_comment'></div>知稻麻之为众。若普闻名称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1365387_comment'></div>时立威仪。行则上首举为左臂者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1365387_comment'></div>上座道宣寺主神察都维𨙻智衍子立传学元则栖禅静定持律道成怀素等人。法师舍卫是求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1365387_comment'></div>须弥不动。以等空知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1365387_comment'></div>行如海法。如陶器必尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1365387_comment'></div>而写瓶共缚。令大律师崇业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1365387_comment'></div>约身利物。维忍辱之行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1365387_comment'></div>全信役仁。守毗尼之律。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1365387_comment'></div>明犹染垒。壑比持綖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1365387_comment'></div>摧伏魔障。弼成学徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1365387_comment'></div>上座大德神岳法师。开方便品。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1365387_comment'></div>證圆明实。贯穿百氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1365387_comment'></div>分别四谛。芸扃诸彦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1365387_comment'></div>不敢近论笔墨。蓬岳群仙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1365387_comment'></div>自应遥寄书帙。相与禁六贼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1365387_comment'></div>制六衰。红粟腐积。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1365387_comment'></div>黄金巨万。行天厨之宝舆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1365387_comment'></div>泛海岸之雕舻。日静楗槌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1365387_comment'></div>夜鸣钟柝。罔不受薰修戒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1365387_comment'></div>破烦恼结。禅以思默。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1365387_comment'></div>听以和发。商调柔之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1365387_comment'></div>书秘密之偈。业公愀而叹曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1365387_comment'></div>此身有待。诸行无常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1365387_comment'></div>钦不居之岁月。无不灭之泡影。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1365387_comment'></div>乐化成而记壁者。请因寺而言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1365387_comment'></div>是则有隋尚书令越国公杨素。泊我濮王泰宅之旧区。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1365387_comment'></div>丰不当必蔀。俭不师且夺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1365387_comment'></div>终异谋始之则。满非守成之具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1365387_comment'></div>从梁邸第。宁复宾游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1365387_comment'></div>封薛池台。果成童牧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1365387_comment'></div>孰若变为严净。归入檀𨙻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1365387_comment'></div>匪化尘之可思。匪劫烬之能毁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1365387_comment'></div>转以清渠洒道。绿树分行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1365387_comment'></div>水流旧空。花落雨新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1365387_comment'></div>殿邦而住世者。不亦大哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1365387_comment'></div>宜宣咏歌。以备刊勒矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1365387_comment'></div>我开元神武皇帝御十方之四载。格上下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1365387_comment'></div>秩神祇。万人敬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1365387_comment'></div>百蛮服。伊护法者必圣王乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1365387_comment'></div>演法者其开士乎。敢作颂曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1365387_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_103_1365387'>吴作京兮秦之理。珠柱宝刹兮从中起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1365387_comment'></div>䡾相望兮非相似。轮乎奂兮不可拟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1365387_comment'></div>惟圣皇之经始兮。惟调御之依止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1365387_comment'></div>封迦叶之上人兮。延德光之太子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1365387_comment'></div>香为土兮金为界。树低枝兮莲出水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1365387_comment'></div>水分接足以骈阗兮。尽洗心以欢喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1365387_comment'></div>永巍巍兮什梵宫。扬大法兮尊大雄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1365387_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_110_1365387_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1365128' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365128' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365128?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授王晙左散骑常侍制</a><span class='authorDate'>（715年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_1365128")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1365128_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365128'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365128'>黄门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365128_comment'></div>侍臣之任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365128_comment'></div>朝廷所重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365128_comment'></div>赏善唯速。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365128_comment'></div>兼才是先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365128_comment'></div>银青光禄大夫并州大都督府长史上柱国王晙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365128_comment'></div>志力坚刚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365128_comment'></div>风情慷慨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365128_comment'></div>传为书癖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365128_comment'></div>成诵在心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365128_comment'></div>言应笔精。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365128_comment'></div>目悬于手。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365128_comment'></div>受一方之委。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365128_comment'></div>惣三军之令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365128_comment'></div>士卒感恩以争效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365128_comment'></div>獯戎灭迹而皆远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365128_comment'></div>功其茂矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365128_comment'></div>朕实休之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365128_comment'></div>用凭龙豹之韬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365128_comment'></div>更践貂蝉之位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365128_comment'></div>可左散骑常侍兼检校并州大都督府长史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365128_comment'></div>勋如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365128_comment'></div>主者施行。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1365128_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1365133' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365133' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365133?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授吴兢谏议大夫制</a><span class='authorDate'>（715年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_1365133")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1365133_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365133'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365133'>黄门。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365193_comment'></div>戒刻木于前吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365193_comment'></div>念兹钦恤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365193_comment'></div>深可哀矜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365193_comment'></div>宜修白云之典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365193_comment'></div>俾静黄沙之职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365193_comment'></div>可大理卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365193_comment'></div>勋封如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365193_comment'></div>主者施行。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1365193_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1365154' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365154' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365154?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授源乾曜户部侍郎制</a><span class='authorDate'>（715年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365154'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365154'>黄门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365154_comment'></div>正议大夫行少府监上柱国安阳县开国男源乾曜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365154_comment'></div>思总事端。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365154_comment'></div>言思政要。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365154_comment'></div>外则经通成务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365154_comment'></div>内则周密知微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365154_comment'></div>其识也清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365154_comment'></div>以文守法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365154_comment'></div>尚方爱费。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365154_comment'></div>己称宝玉之府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365154_comment'></div>司徒帅属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365154_comment'></div>更重神仙之闱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365154_comment'></div>宜副朝奖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365154_comment'></div>莅于邦教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365154_comment'></div>可行尚书户部侍郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365154_comment'></div>散官勋封如故。<div class='inline' showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365157?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授王邱主爵郎中等制</a><span class='authorDate'>（715年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365157'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365157'>敕。宣议郎守尚书考功员外郎王邱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365157_comment'></div>学思文华。精而典丽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365157_comment'></div>朝议郎守侍御史内供奉判右司员外郎上柱国韦虚心。神清气胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365157_comment'></div>敏以甄通。或刈其楚翘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365157_comment'></div>先有司之课绩。或提其纲辖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365157_comment'></div>肃诸曹之填委。爰旌二妙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365157_comment'></div>宜叶再迁。邱可守尚书主爵郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365157_comment'></div>虚心可守右司郎中。散官勋如故。<div class='inline' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365304?labeling=true' target='_blank'>命薛讷等与九姓共伐默啜制</a><span class='authorDate'>（715年10月14日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_1365304")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1365304_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365304'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365304'>黄门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365304_comment'></div>朕闻天所与者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365304_comment'></div>奉天命而不违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365304_comment'></div>人所弃者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365304_comment'></div>顺人心而必伐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365304_comment'></div>由是古先帝王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365304_comment'></div>光宅区县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365304_comment'></div>实仗威武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365304_comment'></div>用清荒戎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365304_comment'></div>时义远矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365304_comment'></div>默啜以叛亡饿隶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365304_comment'></div>凶忍遗孽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365304_comment'></div>敢迷声朔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365304_comment'></div>独匪人臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365304_comment'></div>祸皆所召。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365304_comment'></div>祅不自作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365304_comment'></div>举其巢穴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365304_comment'></div>尽是离心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365304_comment'></div>瞻我阙庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365304_comment'></div>相望内面。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365304_comment'></div>犹窜身于寒苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365304_comment'></div>且寄命于旬时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365304_comment'></div>当胡运之已穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1365304_comment'></div>在轩兵而可逐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1365304_comment'></div>九姓部落等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1365304_comment'></div>忠诚贯日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1365304_comment'></div>义烈闻风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1365304_comment'></div>数其擢发之愆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1365304_comment'></div>成于屈指之计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1365304_comment'></div>请除骄子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1365304_comment'></div>累遣使臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1365304_comment'></div>摧锋而愿先驱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1365304_comment'></div>蓄锐而期后命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1365304_comment'></div>右羽林军大将军朔方道大总管薛讷左卫大将军安北副大都护兼剡王府长史平郡公张知运右羽林军将军兼凉州都督赤水大使杨敬述右骑卫将军论弓仁左武卫将军大武军大使于仁誓右武卫将军丰安军大使杜宾客丰州都督西受降城使吕休琳胜州都督东受降城使邵宏左金吾卫大将军回纥伏帝匐右卫大将军浑元忠左卫大将军似和舒右武卫将军兼贺兰州都督契苾承祖等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1365304_comment'></div>或出将入相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1365304_comment'></div>有经济之才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1365304_comment'></div>或敦诗阅礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1365304_comment'></div>有韬钤之算。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1365304_comment'></div>或嫖姚仕汉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1365304_comment'></div>有遮虏之勋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1365304_comment'></div>或由余入秦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1365304_comment'></div>有伐戎之策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1365304_comment'></div>谋彼元帅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1365304_comment'></div>择于佐军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1365304_comment'></div>可以授旗遂行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1365304_comment'></div>推毂而进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1365304_comment'></div>讷可中道大总管。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1365304_comment'></div>宾客宏休琳等为副。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1365304_comment'></div>知运可东道大总管。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1365304_comment'></div>弓仁仁誓为副。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365218_comment'></div>制军为旅。云麾将军检校右羽林将军上柱国杨敬述。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365218_comment'></div>心坚铁石。器蕴圭璋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365218_comment'></div>以俊颖之才。有温谦之美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365218_comment'></div>附枝中叶。则艺极于彫弓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365218_comment'></div>咀实含英。则词殚于䌽札。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365218_comment'></div>自五营高选。千庐入侍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365368_comment'></div>扈驾自新丰汤井还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365368_comment'></div>其日奉制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365368_comment'></div>持节复赛于汤。<div id='poem_title_1365394_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365394'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365394'>世称李公德为范。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365394_comment'></div>言为师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365394_comment'></div>行为则。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365394_comment'></div>事为程。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=716&endYear=716')">716年</a>　在知制诰任，故代拟制敕。作品：《洗涤官吏负犯制》《授岐王范太子少师等制》《为宰相论月应蚀状》《睿宗遗诰》《遣王志愔等各巡察本管内制》<div id='poem_1365296' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365296' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365296?labeling=true' target='_blank'>洗涤官吏负犯制</a><span class='authorDate'>（716年4月4日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_1365296")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1365296_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365296'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365296'>黄门。朕闻颜回知过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365296_comment'></div>不无过也。蘧瑗知非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365296_comment'></div>不无非也。孔子曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365296_comment'></div>过则勿惮改。过而能改。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365296_comment'></div>善莫大焉。此则古之贤人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365296_comment'></div>所未能□朕祗膺骏命。光阐鸿猷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365296_comment'></div>思革颓风。以清贪吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365296_comment'></div>作程者不要于密。贵于必行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365296_comment'></div>行令者不要于严。贵于适中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365296_comment'></div>比岁或使者廉按。或宪司绳纠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365296_comment'></div>未能发明大体。颇亦委曲小疵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365296_comment'></div>殊异恢恢之言。遂行察察之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365296_comment'></div>一从过误。永点彝伦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365296_comment'></div>铨管不许其弃瑕。簿书宁容其刷耻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365296_comment'></div>怀才则每岁见斥。登用则终身蔑闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365296_comment'></div>静言思之。诚未为得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365296_comment'></div>夫学以从政。禄以代农。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365296_comment'></div>代农不可易业。从政不可紊序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365296_comment'></div>永鉴前弊。当无废人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365296_comment'></div>改而更张。朕之志也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365296_comment'></div>官人负犯。经洗涤赦□者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365296_comment'></div>宜并除痕。选日量旧资依选例处分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365296_comment'></div>诸使通状。事或有枉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1365296_comment'></div>断岂无失。承前要须却累通状人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1365296_comment'></div>然始为雪。各惧罪及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1365296_comment'></div>致有冤人。其诉枉屈人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1365296_comment'></div>任申牒刑部。事状似枉者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1365296_comment'></div>为牒本使勘问。尽其道理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1365296_comment'></div>无本使者。追本案为其寻究。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1365296_comment'></div>应雪者。本司断后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1365296_comment'></div>委左右丞更审详覆。然后牒所由□司除痕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1365296_comment'></div>并牒紫微黄门附簿。诸处百姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1365296_comment'></div>若被勾徵。使人贪功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1365296_comment'></div>既不纳理。州县承敕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1365296_comment'></div>又不敢放。或已输已役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1365296_comment'></div>重被徵收。或先死先逃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1365296_comment'></div>勒出邻保。欲令贫弱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1365296_comment'></div>何以安存。自今以后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1365296_comment'></div>有隐欺须勾者。宜勾当年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1365296_comment'></div>若事连去年者。亦通任勾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1365296_comment'></div>隔年以去。更不在勾限。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1365296_comment'></div>其官典及前官隐赃在腹内者。不在此例。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1365296_comment'></div>布告天下。咸使闻知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1365296_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_43_1365296_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1365224' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365224' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365224?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授岐王范太子少师等制</a><span class='authorDate'>（716年6月7日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_1365224")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1365224_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365224'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365224'>黄门。赞翼皇储。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365224_comment'></div>允归师保。崇敬叔父。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365224_comment'></div>谅属亲贤。虢州刺史上柱国岐王范秘书监兼幽州刺史上柱国薛王业等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365224_comment'></div>明允笃诚。温良恭俭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365224_comment'></div>忠孝先于令典。文儒伟于成业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365224_comment'></div>自为我藩翰。拥其干旄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365224_comment'></div>雅闻召伯之诗。尤羡鲁公之政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365224_comment'></div>虽颁条是务。而导礼兼资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365224_comment'></div>因入拜于承明。伫来仪于博望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365224_comment'></div>范可太子少师虢州刺史。业可太子少保兼幽州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365224_comment'></div>勋封等各如故。主者施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365224_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1365224_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1365362' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365362' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365362?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为宰相论月应蚀状</a><span class='authorDate'>（716年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_1365362")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1365362_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365362'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365362'>臣近者特奉玉阶。亲承圣旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365362_comment'></div>伏知今月十四日夜月蚀当尽。此验非远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365362_comment'></div>即胡灭之祥。臣以为太阴之蚀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365362_comment'></div>必在于望。太史司占。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365362_comment'></div>不言迩日。圣人同契。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365362_comment'></div>果应先天。而不测为神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365362_comment'></div>前知者圣。臣昨宵将暝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365362_comment'></div>精虑仰观。初则桂魄正圆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365362_comment'></div>俄见蓂枝遂缺。乙夜之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365362_comment'></div>所蚀便既。臣载欣载跃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365362_comment'></div>闻所未闻。但恐默啜祸盈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365362_comment'></div>命危势蹙。百年之运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365362_comment'></div>晷刻当穷。三象之微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365362_comment'></div>蔽亏先肇。臣等忝阶近侍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365362_comment'></div>喜万恒情。无任欣跃之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365362_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1365362_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1365300' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365300' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365300?labeling=true' target='_blank'>遣王志愔等各巡察本管内制</a><span class='authorDate'>（716年7月6日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_1365300")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1365300_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365300'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365300'>黄门。上天降祸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365300_comment'></div>大行太上皇厌代升遐。俾予一人茕茕在疚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365300_comment'></div>攀号荼毒。触向摧陨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365300_comment'></div>百辟卿士等。上遵遗诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365300_comment'></div>下徇群心。寰区任殷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365300_comment'></div>社稷务重。资于听断。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365300_comment'></div>不可暂缺。遂力衰迷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365300_comment'></div>甫从勤请。恭惟顾托之旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365300_comment'></div>思致和平之化。虽在荒瘵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365300_comment'></div>敢忘负荷。是用泣血抚膺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365300_comment'></div>执丧视事。夫后王者代天理物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365300_comment'></div>师表者助朕理人。物之所以茂育。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365300_comment'></div>人之所以蕃庶。盖遂其性而安其业也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365300_comment'></div>朕每置旌进善。仄席翘贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365300_comment'></div>恐闾阎有愁苦之声。草泽无明扬之举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365300_comment'></div>吏或慢法。官或非才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365300_comment'></div>因之致理。且未为得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365300_comment'></div>其何以廉败政。恤冤刑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365300_comment'></div>问茕嫠。招茂异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365300_comment'></div>宽赋敛。节更徭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365300_comment'></div>使天下为无为事无事也。顷分连率。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365300_comment'></div>则曰使臣。将求人瘼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365300_comment'></div>克宣朕命。诸道按察使扬州长史王志愔广州都督宋璟益州长史韦抗博州都督程行谌汴州刺史倪若水魏州刺史杨茂谦灵州都督强循润州刺史李浚荆州长史任昭理秦州都督张嘉贞洪州都督杨虚受梁州都督张守洁等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1365300_comment'></div>并迈迹垂宪。伟才通识。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1365300_comment'></div>有其直方。无所回避。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1365300_comment'></div>宜令各巡本管内。官人有清介独立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1365300_comment'></div>可以标映士林。或文吏兼优。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1365300_comment'></div>可以润益邦政者。百姓中有文儒异等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1365300_comment'></div>道极专门。或武力超伦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1365300_comment'></div>声侔敌国者。并精加访择。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1365300_comment'></div>具以名闻。其官人有老弱及久病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1365300_comment'></div>妨于政理。并才用劣下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1365300_comment'></div>全不称职者。上佐巳下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1365300_comment'></div>委使人便停务。其官交要者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1365300_comment'></div>便清勤人权摄。其京官及畿内州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1365300_comment'></div>委御史大夫及吏部官长。准此详察录奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1365300_comment'></div>诸道僻远州及岭南道。委使人量差判官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1365300_comment'></div>分道巡按。其天下囚徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1365300_comment'></div>虑有冤滞。宜令大理寺及本巡使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1365300_comment'></div>所在按理。流罪已下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1365300_comment'></div>非犯名教及官典取受。并听减一等收赎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1365300_comment'></div>即使非理均事可疑者。并杖以下罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1365300_comment'></div>并宜放免。缘山陵所科夫匠等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1365300_comment'></div>有父母年老。家无中男巳上者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1365300_comment'></div>容其侍养。不须差遣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1365300_comment'></div>其河南河北遭蝗虫州。十分损二巳上者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1365300_comment'></div>差科杂役。量事矜放。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1365300_comment'></div>百姓闻有不稳便事。委按察使与本州长官商度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1365300_comment'></div>随事处分奏闻。布告遐迩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1365300_comment'></div>令知朕意。主者施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1365300_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_50_1365300_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=716&endYear=716')">716年</a>　秋在知制诰任，故代拟制敕。作品：《卢怀慎去官养疾敕》<br /><a href="javascript: class='inlineComment2'>（《陈谱》注：“开元元年至四年”）</span>《授李怀让兵部郎中制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《陈谱》注：“开元二年至四年”）</span>《授李怀让给事中制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《陈谱》注：“开元二年至四年”）</span>《授李怀让御史中丞制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《陈谱》注：“开元二年至四年”）</span>《授洪子舆起居舍人制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《陈谱》注：“开元二年至四年”）</span>《授慕容珣吏部郎中等制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《陈谱》注：“开元二年至四年”）</span>《授李延昌左金吾卫大将军制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《陈谱》注：“开元二年至四年”）</span>《授秦守一京兆府少尹制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《陈谱》注：“开元二年至四年”）</span>《为卢监被盗衣物谢赐御衣物状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《陈谱》注：“开元二年至四年”）</span>《授源乾曜等尚书右丞等制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《陈谱》注：“开元三年至四年”）</span>《授毕构户部尚书制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《陈谱》注：“开元三年至四年”）</span>《授艾敬直仙州长史制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《陈谱》注：“开元三年至四年”）</span>《饯郢州李使君》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《陈谱》注：“开元初”）</span>《授李元紘度支员外郎制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《陈谱》注：“开元初”）</span>《授敬昭道殿申侍御等制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《陈谱》注：“开元初”）</span><div id='poem_1365400' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365400' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365400?labeling=true' target='_blank'>睿宗大圣真皇帝哀册文</a><span class='authorDate'>（716年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_1365400")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1365400_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365400'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365400'>维开元四年太岁景辰六月乙巳朔二十日甲子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365400_comment'></div>大行睿宗大圣真皇帝崩于百福殿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365400_comment'></div>徙殡于太极殿之西阶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365400_comment'></div>粤十月朔某日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365400_comment'></div>将迁座于桥陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365400_comment'></div>礼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365400_comment'></div>素帟褰周。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365400_comment'></div>青壶警节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365400_comment'></div>俨无声以虚卫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365400_comment'></div>陈有象而成列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365400_comment'></div>哀子开元神武皇帝讳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365400_comment'></div>追攀引綍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365400_comment'></div>眇擗司常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365400_comment'></div>悽庶物其涕迸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365400_comment'></div>迸感众灵而影翔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365400_comment'></div>润兹鸿业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365400_comment'></div>钦若要道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365400_comment'></div>爰制近臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365400_comment'></div>敢扬大宝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365400_comment'></div>其词曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365400_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_1365400'>高祖兴唐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365400_comment'></div>垂其耿光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365400_comment'></div>睿宗诞庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1365400_comment'></div>绍我明命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1365400_comment'></div>明命伊何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1365400_comment'></div>重熙累盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1365400_comment'></div>耿光伊何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1365400_comment'></div>翊善传圣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1365400_comment'></div>在昔分瑞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1365400_comment'></div>爰初剖符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1365400_comment'></div>宅殷令典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1365400_comment'></div>居相宏图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1365400_comment'></div>宣哲观艺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1365400_comment'></div>祗庸服儒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1365400_comment'></div>践其成式。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1365400_comment'></div>纳以嘉谟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1365400_comment'></div>否历终泰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1365400_comment'></div>倾维更纽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1365400_comment'></div>子从代王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1365400_comment'></div>子事周母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1365400_comment'></div>退象藏密。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1365400_comment'></div>冲襟释负。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1365400_comment'></div>不为震惊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1365400_comment'></div>自得谦受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1365400_comment'></div>拥乃政复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1365400_comment'></div>亨而运开。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1365400_comment'></div>固推皇弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1365400_comment'></div>仍陟元台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1365400_comment'></div>鸣牝搆孽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1365400_comment'></div>纷虹肆灾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1365400_comment'></div>飙驰神武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1365400_comment'></div>电扫奸回。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1365400_comment'></div>三让天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1365400_comment'></div>再登宸极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1365400_comment'></div>顺夫氓心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1365400_comment'></div>忘我帝力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1365400_comment'></div>鞮译修贡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1365400_comment'></div>亲贤任职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1365400_comment'></div>乐英已敷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1365400_comment'></div>礼纬重饰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1365400_comment'></div>宗庙率祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1365400_comment'></div>郊邱肇禋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1365400_comment'></div>养而迎夏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1365400_comment'></div>芟以祈春。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1365400_comment'></div>静默沿道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1365400_comment'></div>和平返淳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1365400_comment'></div>智周翔泳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1365400_comment'></div>功济陶钧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1365400_comment'></div>知子惟明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1365400_comment'></div>从吾所尚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1365400_comment'></div>陋伊祁之莫绪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1365400_comment'></div>追齧缺而将丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1365400_comment'></div>帝允执乎厥中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1365400_comment'></div>皇遂崇于太上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1365400_comment'></div>始受图而观察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1365400_comment'></div>终脱屣以清旷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1365400_comment'></div>斋必闲馆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1365400_comment'></div>朝而别宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1365400_comment'></div>问安顺色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1365400_comment'></div>资孝宏风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1365400_comment'></div>理极兼受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1365400_comment'></div>言承至公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1365400_comment'></div>岂缀衣而凭几。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1365400_comment'></div>忽成鼎而号弓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1365400_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1365400_comment'></div>梦年䍐验。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1365400_comment'></div>顾命是属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1365400_comment'></div>付神器其得所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1365400_comment'></div>委灵心其何欲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1365400_comment'></div>增摧绝以孺慕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1365400_comment'></div>竟厌时以去俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1365400_comment'></div>万邦赴而同轨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1365400_comment'></div>六遂陈而帅属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1365400_comment'></div>外群悲于缟素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1365400_comment'></div>中不瘗于珠玉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1365400_comment'></div>蜃辂迎转。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1365400_comment'></div>龙㡛戒徂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1365400_comment'></div>寒生紫殿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1365400_comment'></div>晓发清都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1365400_comment'></div>笳挽迟迟而徙靡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1365400_comment'></div>旆旌恋恋以威纡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1365400_comment'></div>除栎阳之御路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1365400_comment'></div>指桥岳之幽途。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1365400_comment'></div>礼既献而三彻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1365400_comment'></div>神方宁而九虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1365400_comment'></div>远奉游冠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1365400_comment'></div>近严归跸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1365400_comment'></div>因高而渭川尽见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1365400_comment'></div>凭下而秦京稍出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1365400_comment'></div>积耘草以横霜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1365400_comment'></div>攒悲松以翳日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1365400_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1365400_comment'></div>粤羲轩之建子姒兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1365400_comment'></div>令问传其不巳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1365400_comment'></div>猗册之尊圣真兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1365400_comment'></div>鸿名冠而方始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1365400_comment'></div>然后景云霭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1365400_comment'></div>华露滋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1365400_comment'></div>扬至德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1365400_comment'></div>殷永思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1365400_comment'></div>此天子之孝也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1365400_comment'></div>臣何足以知之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1365400_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_122_1365400_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1365227' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365227' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365227?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授毕构太子詹事制</a><span class='authorDate'>（716年10月11日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_1365227")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1365227_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365227'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365227'>黄门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365227_comment'></div>摄生遂性。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365227_comment'></div>义存于尚德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365227_comment'></div>去剧从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365227_comment'></div>礼切于优贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365227_comment'></div>银青光禄大夫守户部尚书上柱国魏郡开国公毕构。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365227_comment'></div>当代周才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365227_comment'></div>干时良具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365227_comment'></div>台阁推其练。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365227_comment'></div>衣冠仰其全德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365227_comment'></div>而五教之重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365227_comment'></div>六官是先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365227_comment'></div>精以辨政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365227_comment'></div>劳而弱疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365227_comment'></div>方欲凭于导引。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365227_comment'></div>拯彼清羸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365227_comment'></div>暂践窦婴之职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365227_comment'></div>亟期吕蒙之愈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365227_comment'></div>可守太子詹事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365227_comment'></div>散官勋如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365227_comment'></div>主者施行。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1365227_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1365339' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365339' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365339?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为群官请虞卒哭表</a><span class='authorDate'>（706年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_1365339")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1365339_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365339'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365339'>臣某等言。臣等伏见有司撰既葬反虞之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365339_comment'></div>陛下当以今月二十七日公除卒哭。圣情感慕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365339_comment'></div>所未忍言。众虑焦惶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365339_comment'></div>罔知攸寘。中谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365339_comment'></div>臣等谨按晋书。杜预议略曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365339_comment'></div>天子之位至尊。万机之政至大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365339_comment'></div>群臣之众至广。不得同于凡人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365339_comment'></div>故大行既葬。祔祭于庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365339_comment'></div>则因而除之。不除群臣莫敢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365339_comment'></div>故屈已而除之。天下之人皆曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365339_comment'></div>我王仁也。我王孝也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365339_comment'></div>此乃圣制移风易俗之本。于是卢钦魏舒等从其奏议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365339_comment'></div>莫不厌服。臣等历选列辟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365339_comment'></div>颇徵前史。王者为天所子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365339_comment'></div>受天明命。代天育物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365339_comment'></div>先天弗违。居大宝之位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365339_comment'></div>行至公之道。故沿革而致理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365339_comment'></div>变通以成政。况先后之末顾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365339_comment'></div>圣朝之旧式。册备矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365339_comment'></div>方垂无穷。君亲临之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365339_comment'></div>宁受非礼。而陛下愈迟之痛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365339_comment'></div>孝思罔极。履曾参之小节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365339_comment'></div>遗汉文之故事<span class='inlineComment2'>（阙十七字）</span>。贯于神明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1365339_comment'></div>粤自开辟。天子之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1365339_comment'></div>未有如睿宗孝之纯深也。至使庆云涌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1365339_comment'></div>浪井出。嘉木连理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1365339_comment'></div>神芝三秀。盖其效欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1365339_comment'></div>要不可以情过哀。而所枉斯大矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1365339_comment'></div>臣又闻七月而葬。既葬缞除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1365339_comment'></div>其月而虞。既虞吉祭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1365339_comment'></div>为之降杀。用断丧服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1365339_comment'></div>示不得踰之。今合于山陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1365339_comment'></div>祔于宗庙。询之典训。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1365339_comment'></div>尝有稽矣。而终不师古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1365339_comment'></div>始不易月。考之事宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1365339_comment'></div>又无谓矣。举而书此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1365339_comment'></div>将何以法。陛下昧旦听朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1365339_comment'></div>戚容深视。庶官所以环拱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1365339_comment'></div>近臣莫之利见。戴九天之仁覆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1365339_comment'></div>渴十景之清光。禺然之情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1365339_comment'></div>盖未能谕。且追远兴感。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1365339_comment'></div>君子有终身之忧。以权制服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1365339_comment'></div>圣人思屈已之重。何必三年之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1365339_comment'></div>称为百行之端。若天无卑听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1365339_comment'></div>固违于献款。臣敢先除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1365339_comment'></div>今附于不义。岂司牧黎献。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1365339_comment'></div>作人父母之意乎。伏惟陛下可群臣之奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1365339_comment'></div>顺刚日之请。去独行以致美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1365339_comment'></div>阐大猷以光济。勿使鸿生钜儒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1365339_comment'></div>废书而郁悒。下学上达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1365339_comment'></div>草议以屏营。臣等至怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1365339_comment'></div>期必俯就。则凡在动植。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1365339_comment'></div>无任悲幸。谨昧死诣朝堂拜表以闻。<div class='inline' showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365358?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为政事请公除状</a><span class='authorDate'>（716年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365358'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365358'>臣等闻丧礼俯就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365358_comment'></div>所贵从宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365358_comment'></div>古先哲王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365358_comment'></div>莫非孝子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365358_comment'></div>则知服纪渐变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365358_comment'></div>以至于除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365358_comment'></div>既除之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365358_comment'></div>无不从吉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365358_comment'></div>祔即吉祭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365358_comment'></div>示不可踰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365358_comment'></div>顷者正自山陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365358_comment'></div>奉安宗庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365358_comment'></div>终服变礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365358_comment'></div>今则其时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365358_comment'></div>执而不行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365358_comment'></div>将何用礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365358_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下孝思罔极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365358_comment'></div>首冠礼经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365358_comment'></div>然以神器至公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365358_comment'></div>理循故实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365358_comment'></div>今尚未临正殿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365358_comment'></div>犹御惨衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365358_comment'></div>夫以安上理人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1365358_comment'></div>莫善于礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1365358_comment'></div>今若顺情废礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1365358_comment'></div>何以正人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1365358_comment'></div>群下喁然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1365358_comment'></div>不知所措。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1365358_comment'></div>臣等谬陪枢密。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1365358_comment'></div>辄敢陈祈。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1365305_comment'></div>上则听其和乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365305_comment'></div>违人之欲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365305_comment'></div>下则生于怨思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365305_comment'></div>一物安可弗遂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365305_comment'></div>万人安可固违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365305_comment'></div>且先王卜征。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365305_comment'></div>观乎风俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365305_comment'></div>大易顺动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365305_comment'></div>应乎天地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365305_comment'></div>由是巡以五载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365305_comment'></div>尚遍于人寰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365305_comment'></div>设为两京。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365305_comment'></div>况称于帝宅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365305_comment'></div>东幸西顾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365305_comment'></div>乃其常也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365305_comment'></div>然朕以行必清道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365305_comment'></div>不为无事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365305_comment'></div>至而供帐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365305_comment'></div>是则有劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365305_comment'></div>故恤人之隐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365305_comment'></div>忧人不足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1365305_comment'></div>于今四年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1365305_comment'></div>遂使东土耆老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1365305_comment'></div>倾心而徯予。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1365305_comment'></div>中朝公卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1365305_comment'></div>屡言以沃朕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1365305_comment'></div>或谓国之中洛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1365305_comment'></div>王者上地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1365305_comment'></div>均诸侯之赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1365305_comment'></div>当天下之枢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1365305_comment'></div>陆行漕引。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1365305_comment'></div>方舟击轪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1365305_comment'></div>费省万计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1365305_comment'></div>利踰十倍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1365305_comment'></div>更知夫便于物者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1365305_comment'></div>非自奉以怀安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1365305_comment'></div>嗟于人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1365305_comment'></div>岂不诚而阻怨。<div id='poem_sentence_41_1365305_comment'></div>则无夺农矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1365305_comment'></div>陈太师之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1365305_comment'></div>献史臣之颂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1365305_comment'></div>则无缺政矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1365305_comment'></div>信可以备法驾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365205_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1365205_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1365216' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365216' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365216?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授唐先择左金吾卫将军等制</a><span class='authorDate'>（716年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365216'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365216'>门下。右金吾卫将军唐先择。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365216_comment'></div>名公之允。理识公明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365216_comment'></div>左金吾卫将军吕休琳。良将之材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365216_comment'></div>智谋深远。虽东西列卫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365216_comment'></div>俱赖其人。宗族联官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365216_comment'></div>所宜回避。俾从易位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365216_comment'></div>用叶朝恩。先择可左金吾卫将军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365216_comment'></div>休琳可右金吾卫将军。馀如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365172_comment'></div>宜膺赐笔之荣。重陟含香之列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365172_comment'></div>可行尚书驾部员外郎。散官勋如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365356_comment'></div>起居不怿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365356_comment'></div>臣等闻重华之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365356_comment'></div>昌发用心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365356_comment'></div>夏禹则为人先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365356_comment'></div>成汤自以身祷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365356_comment'></div>求诸往事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365356_comment'></div>未或前闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365356_comment'></div>天与圣符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365356_comment'></div>风将雨止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365356_comment'></div>杲杲之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365356_comment'></div>吐扶桑而已霁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365356_comment'></div>芃芃之野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365356_comment'></div>合岐麦而皆秋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365356_comment'></div>仍滋北里之禾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365356_comment'></div>更润南山之豆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365356_comment'></div>京坻可望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1365356_comment'></div>不知日用之功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1365356_comment'></div>旒扆注怀。<div showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365289?labeling=true' target='_blank'>封姚崇妻郑国夫人制</a><span class='authorDate'>（716年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365162_comment'></div>望华台署。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365162_comment'></div>爽鸠作士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365162_comment'></div>虽参听棘之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365162_comment'></div>司马训兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365162_comment'></div>重践握兰之任。<div showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365130?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授李怀让给事中制</a><span class='authorDate'>（716年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365130'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365130'>黄门。朝议大夫尚书兵部郎中上柱国李怀让。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365130_comment'></div>直方自守。贞独不群。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365130_comment'></div>理可析于毫芒。文可成于藻绘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365130_comment'></div>虽手挥繁综。而心寄闲远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365130_comment'></div>丝纶所属。尝推起草之能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365130_comment'></div>駮正是司。更接游兰之宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365130_comment'></div>可守给事中。散官勋如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365130_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1365130_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1365181' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365181' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365181?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授李怀让御史中丞制</a><span class='authorDate'>（716年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365181_comment'></div>孰膺高选。朝议大夫守给事中上柱国李怀让。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365181_comment'></div>直方<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1365181", 1365181, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>孤耸</span>。清迥特立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365181_comment'></div>祗服文儒。克修典礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365181_comment'></div>持疏网而不漏。常嫉恶以辟邪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365181_comment'></div>泛虚舟于自然。不近名而过实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365156_comment'></div>朝请<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作散）</span>大夫检校尚书主爵郎中慕容珣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365156_comment'></div>在公无挠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365156_comment'></div>守道不回。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365156_comment'></div>利用特称其断割。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365156_comment'></div>清心自表其刚正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365156_comment'></div>正议大夫行商州刺史上柱国申国公高绍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365156_comment'></div>羽仪鹓鹭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365156_comment'></div>符采圭璋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365156_comment'></div>诣理愈见于昭明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365156_comment'></div>属词每闻于警拔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365156_comment'></div>九流综覈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365156_comment'></div>五等封建。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365211_comment'></div>何以光于执金。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365211_comment'></div>教战或忘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365211_comment'></div>何以励其投石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365211_comment'></div>宜践迹于中尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1365211_comment'></div>俾畴能于亚夫。<div class='inline' class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365363'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365363'>内常侍赵元亨奉宣恩旨。以臣被窃盗失物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365363_comment'></div>尚不可逃。太邱有言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365363_comment'></div>复不能学。使臣知政。<div class='inline' showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365147?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授源乾曜等尚书右丞等制</a><span class='authorDate'>（716年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365147_comment'></div>何以成务。正议大夫行尚书户部侍郎上柱国安阳县开国男兼御史中丞源乾曜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365147_comment'></div>清深密静。有弥纶之识。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365147_comment'></div>以文饰吏事。闲达旧章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365147_comment'></div>发挥大体。南台执。<div class='inline' class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365269'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365269'>敕。朝议郎守豫州司马上柱国艾敬直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365269_comment'></div>恪勤官次。精练文法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365269_comment'></div>往持宪。共惮清严。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365269_comment'></div>顷拥使车。旌别淑慝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365269_comment'></div>好龙遗迹。乘凫旧壤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365269_comment'></div>俾州闾之创建。伫邦国之成谣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365269_comment'></div>可守仙州长史。散官勋并如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365269_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1365269_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_33867' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_33867' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/33867?labeling=true' target='_blank'>饯郢州李使君</a><span class='authorDate'>（716年）</span><span id='poem_sentence_0_33867_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_33867'>复闻拥符传，及是收图籍。<div id='poem_sentence_1_33867_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_33867'>佳政在离人，能声寄侯伯。<div id='poem_sentence_2_33867_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_33867'>离怀朔风起，试望秋阴积。<div id='poem_sentence_3_33867_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_33867'>中路悽以寒，群山霭将夕。<div id='poem_sentence_4_33867_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_33867'>伤心聊把袂，怊怅<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作怅望）</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_33867", 33867, "Clauses/11/Comments/1")'>麒麟客</span>。<div class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365170' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365170?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授李元纮度支员外郎制</a><span class='authorDate'>（716年）</span><span class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1365170_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365170'><div class='articleSentence' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365170_comment'></div>顷闻出佐。方驰日下之声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365170_comment'></div>爰伫入官。犹屈黄中之美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365170_comment'></div>宜迁郎位。以宠相门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365170_comment'></div>可行尚书度支员外郎。散官如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365170_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1365170_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='7f01806453934d91bcb26122ef14b258_label'><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=718&endYear=718')">718年11月19日</a>　本年十一月十九日，随驾回长安。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=719&endYear=719')">719年3月</a>　在相位。本年修《开元后格》。参与皇太子谒先圣礼。请依礼葬王皎。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=719&endYear=719')">719年3月</a>　本年三月末，有诗赠旧友权讷。作品：《赠彭州权别驾》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《陈谱》系于开元五年三月。）</span><div id='poem_33822' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_33822' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/33822?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赠彭州权别驾</a><span class='authorDate'>（719年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span
