id='poem_title_33822_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_33822'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_33822'>双流脉脉锦城开，追饯年年往复回。<div id='poem_sentence_0_33822_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_33822'>秪道歌谣迎半刺，徒闻礼数揖中台。<div id='poem_sentence_1_33822_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_33822'>黄莺急啭春风尽，斑马长嘶落景催。<div id='poem_sentence_2_33822_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_33822'>莫怆分飞岐路别，还当<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_33822", 33822, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>奏最</span>掖垣来。<div id='poem_sentence_3_33822_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_33822'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_33822_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=719&endYear=719')">719年4月20日</a>　与宋璟上表，主张限制王仁皎坟高。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=720&endYear=720')">720年1月</a>　正月罢相为礼部尚书。冬末，知益州大都督府长史事。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=720&endYear=720')">720年1月</a>　本年正月，在礼部尚书任，右散骑常侍舒国公褚无量卒，撰此诗以悼。作品：《故右散骑常侍舒国公褚公挽词》<div id='poem_33804' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_33804' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/33804?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故右散骑常侍舒国公褚公挽词</a><span class='authorDate'>（720年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_33804")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_33804_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_33804'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_33804'>阳翟疏丰构，临平演庆源。<div id='poem_sentence_0_33804_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_33804'>学筵尊授几，儒服宠乘轩。<div id='poem_sentence_1_33804_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_33804'>审谕留中密，开陈与上言。<div id='poem_sentence_2_33804_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_33804'>徂晖一不借，空有赐东园。<div id='poem_sentence_3_33804_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_33804'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_33804_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=720&endYear=720')">720年1月</a>　本年正月，在礼部尚书任，右散骑常侍褚无量卒，为之撰碑以悼。作品：《赠礼部尚书褚公神道碑》<div id='poem_1365395' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365395' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365395?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赠礼部尚书褚公神道碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（720年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_1365395")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1365395_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365395'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365395'>昔轩辕至孔某。师止十一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365395_comment'></div>名之圣者。今天下尊皇帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365395_comment'></div>学踰三五。教之神者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365395_comment'></div>既学且师。考今犹昔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365395_comment'></div>蹈道从事。伊褚公焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365395_comment'></div>公讳无量。字宏度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365395_comment'></div>其先邑河南之阳翟。十一代祖盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365395_comment'></div>后汉海盐长。子孙因居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365395_comment'></div>遂为吴郡海盐人也。五代祖阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365395_comment'></div>齐民部尚书驸马都尉。嗣钱唐侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365395_comment'></div>高祖辽民。梁鄱阳王国常侍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365395_comment'></div>曾祖仁宏。陈始兴王法曹参军暨阳令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365395_comment'></div>祖范。隋豫章郡丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365395_comment'></div>父义宗。皇赠使持节和州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365395_comment'></div>自微子封宋。以迄于恭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365395_comment'></div>恭裔食褚。因而得姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365395_comment'></div>乃侯乃戚。或史或儒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365395_comment'></div>粤不可量已。岂岳镇天峻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365395_comment'></div>是先人之郡国。将湖清世平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365395_comment'></div>当天子之门馆。灵其效矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365395_comment'></div>公实休哉。上哲钟懿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365395_comment'></div>元和育粹。忠乎孝乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365395_comment'></div>尽至于至。宽得众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1365395_comment'></div>易有亲。晦而明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1365395_comment'></div>微而阐。其立行也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1365395_comment'></div>丝白不染。不成黼黻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1365395_comment'></div>砥磺不砺。不就纯钧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1365395_comment'></div>寝思益。居待问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1365395_comment'></div>功可倍。谕可博。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1365395_comment'></div>其立言也。始吴兴沈子山吴郡曹福授以经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1365395_comment'></div>次吴郡张嘉会授之史。演至赜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1365395_comment'></div>平牴牾。研至精。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1365395_comment'></div>起废疾。贯心则中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1365395_comment'></div>达革其馀。师乃厌服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1365395_comment'></div>尔为宗匠。逮摄齐胶序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1365395_comment'></div>扬袂河洛。罔不企独立以先赴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1365395_comment'></div>聆远音而响从。犹彫材之有楩楠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1365395_comment'></div>綷翼之有鹓凤。下制嘉辟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1365395_comment'></div>用超伦等。即拜成均直讲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1365395_comment'></div>转右鹰扬仓曹参军。直讲如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1365395_comment'></div>稍迁成均助教。累至国子博士朝散大夫国子司业崇文馆学士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1365395_comment'></div>常二仲齐祀。会一时髦彦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1365395_comment'></div>主宾难。折群疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1365395_comment'></div>应不敢夸官阀。单不能曜旗鼓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1365395_comment'></div>太夫人在东也。庭闱是思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1365395_comment'></div>钟釜不违。遂罢而就养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1365395_comment'></div>我圣皇居震也。司过惟史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1365395_comment'></div>听聪则书。复徵以侍读。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1365395_comment'></div>及回金辂。问辟雍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1365395_comment'></div>摇柄前席。有丞有祝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1365395_comment'></div>声群奔以坻颓。辩连属而河泻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1365395_comment'></div>是日中赐章绶。并时服杂缯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1365395_comment'></div>就拜银青光禄大夫。以昭其业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1365395_comment'></div>上正位。迁剡王傅国子祭酒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1365395_comment'></div>转左散骑常侍。特封舒国公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1365395_comment'></div>实食二百。公虽传天人司国子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1365395_comment'></div>然而载启载沃。百氏之言满中禁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1365395_comment'></div>日尊日事。五更之礼存上庠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1365395_comment'></div>故珥貂宠而刑马誓也。寻与中令范阳张说侍郎武功苏颋黄门郎赵郡李乂等开讲序于掖垣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1365395_comment'></div>悉上其昌言嘉谟。可体要经远者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1365395_comment'></div>京都之政。起自轩墀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1365395_comment'></div>齐鲁之风。成于宇县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1365395_comment'></div>公以遭盛明而华皓不息。乃作帝师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1365395_comment'></div>怀喜惧而斑斓未旋。孰为人子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1365395_comment'></div>洒零献恳。于再于三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1365395_comment'></div>重论思而久驻。修切至而方遣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1365395_comment'></div>临轩赠诗。盈篚将意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1365395_comment'></div>华晨省而伟昼游焉。居无何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1365395_comment'></div>太夫人即世。公礼不当毁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1365395_comment'></div>号而殆灭。遂于茔兆之侧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1365395_comment'></div>伏苫块。时松楸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1365395_comment'></div>鹿常犯之。公祝乃止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1365395_comment'></div>应物也。通神也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1365395_comment'></div>有如是乎。丧既除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1365395_comment'></div>驿徵至。仍旧左常侍兼侍读。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1365395_comment'></div>登朝则老臣布武。自屏不趋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1365395_comment'></div>侍讲则宦者平肩。必舆而进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1365395_comment'></div>皆别旨之非常也。上复以旧章散落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1365395_comment'></div>群籍湮坠。张购令据逸文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1365395_comment'></div>补其缺。删其谬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1365395_comment'></div>敕公于都乾元殿京丽正殿总而成之。上帝之璧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1365395_comment'></div>先王之府。委坟素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1365395_comment'></div>流笔墨。可涤元览而照清光耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1365395_comment'></div>日者皇太子志于学。齿于冑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1365395_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_84_1365395", 1365395, "Clauses/168/Comments/0")'>演经</span>则太师凭几。纳诲则元良降席。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1365395_comment'></div>谕夫错中刑外。一物三善者礼如前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1365395_comment'></div>粤开元庚申岁正月哉生魄。景命不造。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1365395_comment'></div>遘疾薨于长安崇仁里之赐第。春秋七十有五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1365395_comment'></div>上辍朝不视。旅次而哭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1365395_comment'></div>遣中使潺湲以恤故。盼近臣歔欷以追往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1365395_comment'></div>乃赠礼部尚书。赙物四百段。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1365395_comment'></div>米粟四百石。小宗伯陈祭仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1365395_comment'></div>亚京尹护丧事。归则本州刺史帅属厚加焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1365395_comment'></div>佥谓公进以秉德。动而率礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1365395_comment'></div>自石渠延首。金华造膝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1365395_comment'></div>时属升贤良。杜谗佞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1365395_comment'></div>虽明虑天断。匪独开陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1365395_comment'></div>亦谠辞日闻。宁虚听受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1365395_comment'></div>若藏罟者谂无艺。出裘者思有惠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1365395_comment'></div>使轻革也之说。傲婴也之讥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1365395_comment'></div>又安能是。果良图中比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1365395_comment'></div>则隐之微。章之末。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1365395_comment'></div>所撰储君翼善二十篇。帝王要览二十二卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1365395_comment'></div>帝王纪录二卷。心镜三十篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1365395_comment'></div>删正论语孝经疏各一部。每条上则留中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1365395_comment'></div>锡之孔殷。盈不可数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1365395_comment'></div>大抵以义约。以文见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1365395_comment'></div>俾兴亡有兆。消长无倾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1365395_comment'></div>规乎讽乎。类乎指乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1365395_comment'></div>行之则是。闻足自戒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1365395_comment'></div>不然。何以皇赉之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1365395_comment'></div>圣叶之。至于斯也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1365395_comment'></div>化益淳。儒益信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1365395_comment'></div>则郊庙有典。宾军有容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1365395_comment'></div>发挥牲王。斟酌牺象。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1365395_comment'></div>必咨焉度焉。此又众之难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1365395_comment'></div>公之易。薨后群学士于书殿中得讲史记至言十二卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1365395_comment'></div>即日闻之。上悼甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1365395_comment'></div>重赐其家绢五百疋。试为我著常奏新篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1365395_comment'></div>从取其书。竟赍遗草。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1365395_comment'></div>悲夫。粤某年仲冬甲子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1365395_comment'></div>归祔于钱塘临平山之旧城。容轩止涂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1365395_comment'></div>丧服会葬者数百。顾而叹曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1365395_comment'></div>公何学也。何师也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1365395_comment'></div>则我副君惟君。是登皇极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1365395_comment'></div>天子之子。是作孟侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1365395_comment'></div>皆受于公矣。董则五朝典学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1365395_comment'></div>无同道之用。桓则三世各师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1365395_comment'></div>有殊特之美。曾不可援以事举诸凡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1365395_comment'></div>卓哉。使后之人泛微波攀绝迹者我公也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1365395_comment'></div>太常易名曰文。宜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1365395_comment'></div>长子河南渑池主簿庭询。次左拾遗庭诲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1365395_comment'></div>次京兆渭南县尉庭宾。三子之戚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1365395_comment'></div>二连所善。居家嗣徽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1365395_comment'></div>继世承烈。则仲弓之有元及季。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1365395_comment'></div>伯起之传秉及赐。故远迩嘉之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1365395_comment'></div>吴江漫兮将海合。吴岫重兮与天沓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1365395_comment'></div>公是属兮公是安。仁则返兮俭乃完。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1365395_comment'></div>异树行兮生也志。他石篆兮子也刊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1365395_comment'></div>噫不慭欤。寄之铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1365395_comment'></div>昭昭府君。生代叶期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1365395_comment'></div>儒有斯文。帝王者师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1365395_comment'></div>探幽典坟。赞道雍熙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1365395_comment'></div>其德弥芬。其谟益祗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1365395_comment'></div>训由老成。荣以恩屡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1365395_comment'></div>资孝是悦。资忠是务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1365395_comment'></div>禹尝献蓍。光不言树。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1365395_comment'></div>专褚之学。启舒之赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1365395_comment'></div>六经芳兮七命章。戴频频兮服煌煌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1365395_comment'></div>无还龄兮有去光。未饰杖兮歘拥梁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1365395_comment'></div>宸极悽兮门人慕。悲风起兮辕马顾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1365395_comment'></div>背西畤兮即东路。路阻修兮日悠悠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1365395_comment'></div>旌旐思兮空山秋。吾见业可久而名不朽者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1365395_comment'></div>猗𨙻褚侯。猗𨙻褚侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1365395_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_154_1365395_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=720&endYear=720')">720年1月</a>　与宋璟建议严惩恶钱。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=720&endYear=720')">720年</a>　本年，在礼部尚书任，奉敕撰章怀太子良娣张氏神道碑。作品：《章怀太子良娣张氏神道碑》<span class='inlineComment2'>（姑系于此，《陈谱》系于开元九年至十二年。）</span><div id='poem_1365390' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365390' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365390?labeling=true' target='_blank'>章怀太子良娣张氏神道碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（720年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_1365390")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1365390_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365390'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365390'>惟兰有香。惟玉有璋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365390_comment'></div>可吉其梦。可劳其弄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365390_comment'></div>故禀离成女。祥归太子之家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365390_comment'></div>自震为男。业盛天人之邸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365390_comment'></div>因以贵者。德其全与。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365390_comment'></div>我唐章怀太子有良娣曰南阳。张氏之子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365390_comment'></div>邠王守礼之母也。初章怀封于雍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365390_comment'></div>良娣选以入。后章怀谪于巴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365390_comment'></div>良娣随而迈。邠王锡元社。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365390_comment'></div>建黄扉。良娣坐华茵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365390_comment'></div>驱香毂。虽逶迤失于偕老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365390_comment'></div>而契阔存乎与成。始十四奉吾夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365390_comment'></div>逮笄年而转茂。终六十四违吾子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365390_comment'></div>当卦数而同极。非婉娩淑慎之则。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365390_comment'></div>含章尚柔之令。孰臻于此矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365390_comment'></div>若乃画堂清兮罗幕薰。匮照曜兮结氛氲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365390_comment'></div>杲杲之日。英英之云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365390_comment'></div>盖良娣之才之美。是效是则。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365390_comment'></div>洁素罔捐于箧。炜彤益昭于管。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365390_comment'></div>嫭颜不竞。徽范自持。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365390_comment'></div>处独蔼如。顾俦芬若。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365390_comment'></div>施于积善。睹从梁驷马之藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365390_comment'></div>贻厥累仁。传相汉七貂之绪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1365390_comment'></div>隋上仪同甘泉府别将严之曾孙。侍御史睦州刺史详之孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1365390_comment'></div>朝议郎行桂州都督府始安县令明之女也。曾构郁起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1365390_comment'></div>昌澜远激。去迁南国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1365390_comment'></div>俨西鄂之丰碑。来应东朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1365390_comment'></div>署西京之戚里。不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1365390_comment'></div>何谓釐尔女士。从以孙子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1365390_comment'></div>而允为袆袂之良乎。及母仪可宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1365390_comment'></div>臣轨伊励。师以俭约。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1365390_comment'></div>戒于盈荡。洛滨无祓除之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1365390_comment'></div>泾上无粲美之物。衣锦褧裳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1365390_comment'></div>宁吾所好。击钟鼎食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1365390_comment'></div>唯尔之兢。俾吾王忠肃恭懿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1365390_comment'></div>既明且哲。志于道者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1365390_comment'></div>本于教也。粤景龙二载孟夏之月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1365390_comment'></div>遘疾<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1365390", 1365390, "Clauses/74/Comments/0")'>弃养</span>于京延康第之寝。洎景云光华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1365390_comment'></div>春雨自叶。睦于我则先受九族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1365390_comment'></div>慈于王则每深十起。永其锡类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1365390_comment'></div>众悦以人。礼物朝遣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1365390_comment'></div>使臣廷命。金紫光禄大夫行鸿胪卿赵承恩银青光禄大夫尚书左丞元暕持节册赠曰章怀皇太子良娣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1365390_comment'></div>祔于陵邑。礼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1365390_comment'></div>呜呼。山疑<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_43_1365390", 1365390, "Clauses/87/Comments/0")'>鹤驾</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1365390_comment'></div>地即乌号。太子宾帝之馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1365390_comment'></div>高宗在天之所。衣冠道德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1365390_comment'></div>密近属于陪乘。光表阙茔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1365390_comment'></div>殊远嫌于好内。又典地司空邠王守礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1365390_comment'></div>幼承法度。长被晖光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1365390_comment'></div>九仞之堂。咸曾氏而逾蹙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1365390_comment'></div>万家之域。小韩王之不纲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1365390_comment'></div>所以傍彫翠炎。伏奏丹墀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1365390_comment'></div>天子孝理之风。已周于品物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1365390_comment'></div>孝思之德。况及于兄弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1365390_comment'></div>乃敕礼部尚书苏颋采询为言。由是稽旧闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1365390_comment'></div>讨前训。位不之易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1365390_comment'></div>禄不之重。而莫顾者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1365390_comment'></div>郑媵之足称也。信不负心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1365390_comment'></div>义不虚事。而竟死者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1365390_comment'></div>越嫔之可徵也。或彰君之隐过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1365390_comment'></div>或徇已之微直。曷如有始有卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1365390_comment'></div>知柔知刚。艰虞则持操服勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1365390_comment'></div>富贵则竭诚循礼。夫诠一行者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1365390_comment'></div>尚纪图书。具三从者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1365390_comment'></div>岂遗刊刻。其铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1365390_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_65_1365390'>天祚有唐。于昭烈光兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1365390_comment'></div>土分五色。作我藩国兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1365390_comment'></div>雷震百里。维皇元子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1365390_comment'></div>元子伊何。匪淑不娣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1365390_comment'></div>厥娣伊何。终温且惠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1365390_comment'></div>桂宫甲观之声迹。竹苑平台之往昔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1365390_comment'></div>车已折兮我未亡。鼎其新兮子为王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1365390_comment'></div>子既王兮我为太。殷圣造兮沐嘉会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1365390_comment'></div>岁不与兮时迅奔。华榱坏兮托寝园。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1365390_comment'></div>闉阇崇于上京。松柏被于长原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1365390_comment'></div>子哀哀兮篆碑于是。亲永永兮殁代如存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1365390_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_76_1365390_comment'></div></div></div><br ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=720&endYear=720')">720年8月</a>　本年八月，有奉和应制诗。作品：《遣御吏大夫王晙巡按诸道制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《郁谱》不系此文。）</span><div id='poem_1365301' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365301' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365301?labeling=true' target='_blank'>遣御史大夫王晙等巡按诸道制</a><span class='authorDate'>（720年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_1365301")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1365301_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365301'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365301'>敕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365301_comment'></div>苛慝不作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365301_comment'></div>人斯无怨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365301_comment'></div>宽猛相济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365301_comment'></div>政是以和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365301_comment'></div>周礼以官刑纠邦理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365301_comment'></div>以官叙正群吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365301_comment'></div>允迪前烈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365301_comment'></div>式惟旧章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365301_comment'></div>且夫寰宇至大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365301_comment'></div>不可以周览。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365301_comment'></div>黎氓至殷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365301_comment'></div>不可以独化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365301_comment'></div>熙我庶政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365301_comment'></div>实惟具寮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365301_comment'></div>苟非其才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365301_comment'></div>罔以称理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365301_comment'></div>朕惟夙夜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365301_comment'></div>不遑晏宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365301_comment'></div>言念政道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365301_comment'></div>载深宵旰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365301_comment'></div>顷开元之初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365301_comment'></div>分遣按部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1365301_comment'></div>纠摘奸犯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1365301_comment'></div>颇闻惩息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1365301_comment'></div>以其事久则烦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1365301_comment'></div>寻亦从其停废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1365301_comment'></div>绵以岁月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1365301_comment'></div>浸成宽弛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1365301_comment'></div>今闻在外官寮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1365301_comment'></div>多违宪法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1365301_comment'></div>牧守则寄任兹重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1365301_comment'></div>令长则禄秩且优。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1365301_comment'></div>亟闻侵窃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1365301_comment'></div>屡有章奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1365301_comment'></div>虽赐金为惠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1365301_comment'></div>未愧张武之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1365301_comment'></div>而还珠表德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1365301_comment'></div>䍐见孟尝之政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1365301_comment'></div>岂敦谕之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1365301_comment'></div>未孚于就列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1365301_comment'></div>将贞高之节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1365301_comment'></div>有谢于前修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1365301_comment'></div>永怀于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1365301_comment'></div>良用沈叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1365301_comment'></div>且政宽而慢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1365301_comment'></div>法弊则通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1365301_comment'></div>弛而张之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1365301_comment'></div>庶其致理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1365301_comment'></div>御史大夫王晙等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1365301_comment'></div>并识通政要。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1365301_comment'></div>位以才达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1365301_comment'></div>茂其声实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1365301_comment'></div>宏此宪章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1365301_comment'></div>宜分命巡按。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1365301_comment'></div>以时纠察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1365301_comment'></div>巡内有长吏贪扰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1365301_comment'></div>讼狱冤滞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1365301_comment'></div>暗懦尸禄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1365301_comment'></div>苛虐在官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1365301_comment'></div>即仰随事按举所犯罪状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1365301_comment'></div>并推鞫准格断覆讫闻奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1365301_comment'></div>仍便覆囚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1365301_comment'></div>夫牧宰之任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1365301_comment'></div>教道是先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1365301_comment'></div>录曹之职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1365301_comment'></div>纲纪斯在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1365301_comment'></div>其有政绩殊尤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1365301_comment'></div>清直独立者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1365301_comment'></div>咸以名荐举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1365301_comment'></div>馀官有清白著称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1365301_comment'></div>及诸色不善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1365301_comment'></div>各别为科目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1365301_comment'></div>同状奏闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1365301_comment'></div>其寻常平状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1365301_comment'></div>无不须通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1365301_comment'></div>俾夫善取其尤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1365301_comment'></div>罚无所滥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1365301_comment'></div>疏而不漏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1365301_comment'></div>密不为苛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1365301_comment'></div>必将正其源流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1365301_comment'></div>宏彼纲目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1365301_comment'></div>不可总此烦碎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1365301_comment'></div>扰其吏人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1365301_comment'></div>应是州县常务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1365301_comment'></div>事非损益者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1365301_comment'></div>使人更不须干预。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1365301_comment'></div>其百姓麦下不支济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1365301_comment'></div>应须处置。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1365301_comment'></div>事有不便于人须釐革者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1365301_comment'></div>与州县商量。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1365301_comment'></div>处分讫奏闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1365301_comment'></div>宜副虚伫之怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1365301_comment'></div>以光澄清之举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1365301_comment'></div>其外官充使者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1365301_comment'></div>至明年冬入朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1365301_comment'></div>京官须奏任量事来去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1365301_comment'></div>判官任使择。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1365301_comment'></div>各依前件。</div><div id='poem_sentence_98_1365301_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_sentence_2_1365396_comment'></div>终于归妹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365396_comment'></div>惟长公主乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365396_comment'></div>公主讳㝹。<div id='poem_sentence_7_1365396_comment'></div>天锡宗社。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365396_comment'></div>昌运及五圣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365396_comment'></div>真享鸿名。<div id='poem_sentence_12_1365396_comment'></div>道□□□□□□焉絪缊构极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365396_comment'></div>倬彼云汉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365396_comment'></div>的沥乘春。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365396_comment'></div>华如桃李。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365396_comment'></div>顺颜承志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365396_comment'></div>约礼知节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365396_comment'></div>得茧馆从蚕之仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365396_comment'></div>采公宫习史之艺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365396_comment'></div>载瞻汤沐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365396_comment'></div>爰赋井田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1365396_comment'></div>其创也与多于仙源。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1365396_comment'></div>其徙也称长于凉国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1365396_comment'></div>故丞相虞公太原温彦博曾孙曦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1365396_comment'></div>台揆门阀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1365396_comment'></div>风流儒雅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1365396_comment'></div>佥谐是图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1365396_comment'></div>历选伊尚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1365396_comment'></div>君子至止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1365396_comment'></div>硕人其颀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1365396_comment'></div>协时之吉。<div id='poem_sentence_34_1365396_comment'></div>褧衣锦裳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1365396_comment'></div>荧荧煌煌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1365396_comment'></div>有秀有芳。<div id='poem_title_33866' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/33866?labeling=true' target='_blank'>昆明池晏坐答王兵部珣三韵见示</a><span class='authorDate'>（724年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_33866")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_33866_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_33866'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_33866'>画舸疾如飞，遥遥汎夕晖。<div id='poem_sentence_0_33866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_33866'>石黥吹浪隐，玉女步尘归。<div id='poem_sentence_1_33866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_33866'>独有衔恩处，明珠在钓矶。<div id='poem_sentence_2_33866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_33866'></div><div id='poem_sentence_3_33866_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=725&endYear=725')">725年</a>　在礼部尚书任，有诗与玄宗唱和。作品：《奉和圣制春台望应制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（姑系于此，《陈谱》系于开元八年（720）3月。）</span>《奉和圣制送张说上集贤学士赐宴得兹字》《奉和恩赐乐游园宴应制》<div id='poem_33863' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_33863' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/33863?labeling=true' target='_blank'>奉和圣制春台望应制</a><span class='authorDate'>（725年春）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_33863")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_33863_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_33863'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(627, "poem_allusion_33863")'>伯夷</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(1021, "poem_allusion_33863")'>诗书焚爇</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(8544, "poem_allusion_33863")'>万年枝</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_33863_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_33863'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_33863'>壮丽天之府，神明王者宅。<div id='poem_sentence_0_33863_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_33863'>大君乘飞龙，登彼复怀昔。<div id='poem_sentence_1_33863_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_33863'>圆阙朱光燄，横山翠微积。<div id='poem_sentence_2_33863_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_33863'>河汧流作表，县聚开成陌。<div id='poem_sentence_3_33863_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_33863'>即旧在皇家，维新具物华。<div id='poem_sentence_4_33863_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_33863'>云连所上居恒属，日更时中望不斜。<div id='poem_sentence_5_33863_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_33863'>三月沧池摇积水，万年青树缀新<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作点惊）</span>花。<div id='poem_sentence_6_33863_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_33863'>暴嬴国此尝图霸，霸业后仁先以诈。<div id='poem_sentence_7_33863_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_33863'>东破诸侯西入秦，咸阳北阪南渭津。<div id='poem_sentence_8_33863_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_33863'><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(1021, "poem_sentence_9_33863")'>诗书焚爇</span>散学士，高阁奢踰娇美人。<div id='poem_sentence_9_33863_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_33863'>事往覆辀经远喻，春还按跸凭高赋。<div id='poem_sentence_10_33863_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_33863'>戎观爱力深惟省，越厌陈方何足务。<div id='poem_sentence_11_33863_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_33863'>清吹遥遥发帝台，宸文耿耿照天回。<div id='poem_sentence_12_33863_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_33863'><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(627, "poem_sentence_13_33863")'>伯夷</span>位事愚臣忝，喜奏声成凤鸟来。<div id='poem_sentence_13_33863_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_33863'></div><div id='poem_sentence_14_33863_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_33833' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_33833' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/33833?labeling=true' target='_blank'>奉和圣制送张说上集贤学士赐宴得兹字</a><span class='authorDate'>（725年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_33833")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_33833_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_33833'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_33833'>肃肃金殿里，招贤固在兹。<div id='poem_sentence_0_33833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_33833'>锵锵石渠内，序拜亦同时。<div id='poem_sentence_1_33833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_33833'>宴锡欢<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作勤）</span>谈道，文成贵说诗。<div id='poem_sentence_2_33833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_33833'>用儒今作相，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_33833", 33833, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>敦学</span>旧为师。<div id='poem_sentence_3_33833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_33833'>下际天光近，中来帝渥滋。<div id='poem_sentence_4_33833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_33833'>国朝良史载，能事日论思。<div id='poem_sentence_5_33833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_33833'></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_33833_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_33840' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_33840' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/33840?labeling=true' target='_blank'>奉和恩赐乐游园宴应制</a><span class='authorDate'>（725年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_33840")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_33840_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_33840'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_33840'>乐游光地选，酺饮庆天从。<div id='poem_sentence_0_33840_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_33840'>座密千官盛，场开百戏容。<div id='poem_sentence_1_33840_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_33840'>绿塍际山尽，缇<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作翠）</span>幕倚云重。<div id='poem_sentence_2_33840_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_33840'>下上花齐发，周回柳遍浓。<div id='poem_sentence_3_33840_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_33840'>夺晴纷剑履，喧听杂歌钟。<div id='poem_sentence_4_33840_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_33840'>日晚衔恩散，尧人并可封。<div id='poem_sentence_5_33840_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_33840'></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_33840_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='4f495a05041749359f6912674384303e_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("4f495a05041749359f6912674384303e");'><span id='4f495a05041749359f6912674384303e_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=727&endYear=727')">727年</a>，58岁</div><div id='4f495a05041749359f6912674384303e' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=727&endYear=727')">727年2月</a>　为礼部尚书，因病留司在长安。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=727&endYear=727')">727年2月</a>　与友人代撰碑文。作品：《扬州大都督长史王公（易从）神道碑》<div id='poem_1365399' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365399' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365399?labeling=true' target='_blank'>扬州大都督长史王公神道碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（727年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_1365399")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1365399_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365399'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365399'>生甫及申。思皇多士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365399_comment'></div>必吁谟以亮采。惟肸蚃幽赞者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365399_comment'></div>不曰才乎。若蕴其才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365399_comment'></div>居其业。奉丹霄之下济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365399_comment'></div>辞白日之中辰者。不曰命乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365399_comment'></div>霸城王府君。讳易从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365399_comment'></div>字某。爰事英主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365399_comment'></div>皇皇我神武。金期宝臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365399_comment'></div>籍我公辅。及挥纶翰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365399_comment'></div>秉刀尺。宜其尹天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365399_comment'></div>登宰衡。虽克扬其休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365399_comment'></div>而不践厥位。何也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365399_comment'></div>府君之始。魏安僖王弟信陵君之绩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365399_comment'></div>秦灭魏。谓之王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365399_comment'></div>家者遂命氏焉。其后世居霸城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365399_comment'></div>族著京兆。故得魏藩公子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365399_comment'></div>锡允称宗。是犹齐国大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365399_comment'></div>因昌保姓。况神皋之表里形势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365399_comment'></div>俊城之相承绂冕。固以倜傥卓荦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365399_comment'></div>为龙为光。五代祖罴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365399_comment'></div>西魏尚书令赠太尉相州刺史扶风公。纪于周史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365399_comment'></div>高祖明远。隋雍州大中正宏化郡守司金上士银青光禄大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365399_comment'></div>书大旂。勒大鼎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1365399_comment'></div>猗𨙻成绩。繁衍重世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1365399_comment'></div>曾祖寿。隋州都七职主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1365399_comment'></div>隋氏沦胥。炀皇板荡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1365399_comment'></div>竟全孤竹之操。不败幽兰之芳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1365399_comment'></div>祖喜。皇朝晋州司仓参军同州河西县丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1365399_comment'></div>父庆。赵州房子冀州枣强二县主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1365399_comment'></div>文秀儒雅。韬光铲迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1365399_comment'></div>雄雌之叹则闻。鸾凤之栖未远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1365399_comment'></div>公八岁工词赋。十五读典坟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1365399_comment'></div>十八历涉代史。十九初游太学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1365399_comment'></div>二十升甲科。三倾五城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1365399_comment'></div>一日千里。阶选部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1365399_comment'></div>册天门。出九流之先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1365399_comment'></div>当万夫之特。授亳州城父尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1365399_comment'></div>且未光也。无何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1365399_comment'></div>枣强府君不禄。毁将形骨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1365399_comment'></div>扶杖于家者三载。哀不绝声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1365399_comment'></div>倚庐于墓者六祀。古曾子死事之终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1365399_comment'></div>今老莱生事之极。思奉檄以尽养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1365399_comment'></div>顾裾而足耻。庭闱何适。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1365399_comment'></div>有南山之隐路。黉塾不倦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1365399_comment'></div>有北海之儒门。教子弟学成志立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1365399_comment'></div>盖云十数。而府君云卧林栖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1365399_comment'></div>傲然肥遁。迫于从父之命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1365399_comment'></div>就以贤人之辟。授华州华阴县尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1365399_comment'></div>复册甲科。转京兆府美原县尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1365399_comment'></div>换华原丞。廉问之举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1365399_comment'></div>屈为之佐。殊尤之荐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1365399_comment'></div>用冠于首。擢拜左台监察御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1365399_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_1365399", 1365399, "Clauses/104/Comments/0")'>王宪</span>斯执。国刑不纷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1365399_comment'></div>一岁遭内艰。如在先考之戚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1365399_comment'></div>禫阕。制复旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1365399_comment'></div>倖臣左补阙何辉图。怙势作奸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1365399_comment'></div>颇盈罪恶。府君直言正色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1365399_comment'></div>莫避权宠。墨条奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1365399_comment'></div>当朝允之。迁殿中侍御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1365399_comment'></div>无何。拜尚书户部员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1365399_comment'></div>转祠部主爵考功三郎中。邦有教谓之安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1365399_comment'></div>国有祀谓之事。则人祇之政罔弗格。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1365399_comment'></div>邦有等谓之爵。国有功谓之课。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1365399_comment'></div>则赏罚之旨罔弗齐。自非贞乃应物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1365399_comment'></div>敏于成务。畴能振景拔萃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1365399_comment'></div>川渟岳立。主上旒冕而思一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1365399_comment'></div>以寰宇腹心。特重其掖垣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1365399_comment'></div>故近密委于侍臣。缉谐连乎小相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1365399_comment'></div>拜给事中。转中书舍人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1365399_comment'></div>剸犀兕者。其议可以断割。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1365399_comment'></div>赋鹪鹩者。其言可以远大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1365399_comment'></div>况天词往复。形于中旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1365399_comment'></div>人望虚伫。期以上台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1365399_comment'></div>姑试之剧。备观周美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1365399_comment'></div>迁兵部侍郎。回翔要津。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1365399_comment'></div>拂拭夷路。消长容其正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1365399_comment'></div>忠邪顺其直。戎昭者有毕力之师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1365399_comment'></div>彝序者无旷负之人。以东南封圻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1365399_comment'></div>淮海殷杂。虽陆摄水标。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1365399_comment'></div>填于委输。而风果气锐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1365399_comment'></div>惩以剽轻。巨镇何有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1365399_comment'></div>繄公则赖。乃出为扬州大都督府长史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1365399_comment'></div>阳秋信。风雨若。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1365399_comment'></div>不竞不絿。有伦有要。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1365399_comment'></div>化之为最。理念于兹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1365399_comment'></div>呜呼。景命不融。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1365399_comment'></div>流年孰返。以年月日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1365399_comment'></div>遘疾终于府之官舍。享年六十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1365399_comment'></div>府庭飒恋。闾巷聚哭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1365399_comment'></div>攀舟楫以咨嗷。越江关之重复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1365399_comment'></div>名流常化。雅俗追嗟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1365399_comment'></div>呜呼。以为当代所归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1365399_comment'></div>礼谢于陈在。岂谓逢时共许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1365399_comment'></div>爱深于产卒。夫灵龟明镜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1365399_comment'></div>可以决疑。驷马拱璧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1365399_comment'></div>不如进道。牵于彼则疑巳释。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1365399_comment'></div>存乎我则道巳用。府君是以寘毛发之愆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1365399_comment'></div>徵膏肓之疾。加以博闻好古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1365399_comment'></div>精义入神。有夫子之文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1365399_comment'></div>得吾家之书籍。或写或缮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1365399_comment'></div>海富山藏。尝工篆体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1365399_comment'></div>閒以琴德。不耀颖而好事者珍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1365399_comment'></div>每成声而知音者赏。身殁之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1365399_comment'></div>所纂集二十卷。自弹琴凡数张。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1365399_comment'></div>俾后代美其华。旨其实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1365399_comment'></div>垂芳尘之庵蔼。采嘉颂之洋溢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1365399_comment'></div>其高致欤。粤开元十五年龙集于卯仲春日晨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1365399_comment'></div>卜葬于京兆咸阳洪渎原。礼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1365399_comment'></div>周之堇原。汉之槐里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1365399_comment'></div>丹碑已刻。青槚成行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1365399_comment'></div>子八人。长曰有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1365399_comment'></div>次曰实。并行齐曾闵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1365399_comment'></div>声轶元季。徵昔有八子之名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1365399_comment'></div>居丧有二连之善。府君之仲著作佐郎敬从者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1365399_comment'></div>季太庙丞择从者。敬也瑚琏之器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1365399_comment'></div>择也金玉其相。称之真披文之实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1365399_comment'></div>记吾人早游学序。曾比义于青襟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1365399_comment'></div>晚哭寝门。匪致能于黄绢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1365399_comment'></div>辞所不获。强为之铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1365399_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_119_1365399'>高惟雍兮大曰京。迁王氏兮著霸城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1365399_comment'></div>或公或侯。散佩垂缨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1365399_comment'></div>子子孙孙。府君挺生<span class='inlineComment2'>（其一）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1365399_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_122_1365399'>德有必综。才无不括。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1365399_comment'></div>胜情风翔。伟量河阔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1365399_comment'></div>帝曰俾乂。求贤如渴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1365399_comment'></div>公其裒然。藏器以达<span class='inlineComment2'>（其二）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1365399_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_126_1365399'>三才清宪。清宪攸叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1365399_comment'></div>四趣明光。明光孔彰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1365399_comment'></div>并跻双掖。双掖忠益。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1365399_comment'></div>皆掌二柄。二柄方正<span class='inlineComment2'>（其三）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1365399_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_130_1365399'>爰回藻司。乃莅扬都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1365399_comment'></div>政既成矣。公尝迈乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1365399_comment'></div>辅我皇极。奋于天衢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1365399_comment'></div>柰何不臧。违世而殂<span class='inlineComment2'>（其四）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1365399_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_134_1365399'>世阅人之不息兮。人违世之遂即。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1365399_comment'></div>独四塞之山川兮。尽千年之封域。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1365399_comment'></div>噫古之不朽。诗载是力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1365399_comment'></div>撰懿图芬兮。清深广直<span class='inlineComment2'>（其五）</span>。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=727&endYear=727')">727年6月</a>　在礼部尚书任，卧病，上表陈情。作品：《陈情表》<div id='poem_1365349' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365349' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_sentence_47_1365349_comment'></div>臣希眇视跛履。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1365349_comment'></div>手之足之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1365349_comment'></div>觊凭渥以还魂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1365349_comment'></div>辄延慈而待罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1365349_comment'></div>不胜悚跃怖惧之切。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1365349_comment'></div>谨附起居使朝议郎右补阙内供奉臣李邻奉表以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1365349_comment'></div>臣无任云云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_54_1365349_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=727&endYear=727')">727年</a>　本年之前曾撰此碑。作品：《唐太子宾客庞承宗碑》<span class='inlineComment2'>（姑系于此，《陈谱》注：“是年以前”，《郁谱》不系此文。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=727&endYear=727')">727年7月</a>　七月卒，赠尚书右丞相，谥文宪。<br /></div>
-----end

湖州（乌程）

洛阳

class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365364_comment'></div>学市攸开。几筵爰设。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365364_comment'></div>故得询疑请益。还如北海之前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365364_comment'></div>嗟二物之长收。愿百身而奚赎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365364_comment'></div>方思重服。用表深衷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1365341_comment'></div>别状封进。</div><div id='poem_sentence_88_1365341_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=706&endYear=706')">706年</a>　为大唐故怀州刺史赠特进耿国公武懿宗撰写墓志铭。作品：《大唐故怀州刺史赠特进耿国公武府君墓志铭并序》<br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_title_1365339' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365339?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为群官请虞卒哭表</a><span class='authorDate'>（706年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_1365339")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1365339_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365339'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365339'>臣某等言。臣等伏见有司撰既葬反虞之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365339_comment'></div>陛下当以今月二十七日公除卒哭。圣情感慕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365339_comment'></div>所未忍言。众虑焦惶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365339_comment'></div>罔知攸寘。中谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365339_comment'></div>臣等谨按晋书。杜预议略曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365339_comment'></div>天子之位至尊。万机之政至大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365339_comment'></div>群臣之众至广。不得同于凡人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365339_comment'></div>故大行既葬。祔祭于庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365339_comment'></div>则因而除之。不除群臣莫敢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365339_comment'></div>故屈已而除之。天下之人皆曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365339_comment'></div>我王仁也。我王孝也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365339_comment'></div>此乃圣制移风易俗之本。于是卢钦魏舒等从其奏议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365339_comment'></div>莫不厌服。臣等历选列辟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365339_comment'></div>颇徵前史。王者为天所子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365339_comment'></div>受天明命。代天育物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365339_comment'></div>先天弗违。居大宝之位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365339_comment'></div>行至公之道。故沿革而致理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365339_comment'></div>变通以成政。况先后之末顾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365339_comment'></div>圣朝之旧式。册备矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365339_comment'></div>方垂无穷。君亲临之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365339_comment'></div>宁受非礼。而陛下愈迟之痛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365339_comment'></div>孝思罔极。履曾参之小节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365339_comment'></div>遗汉文之故事<span class='inlineComment2'>（阙十七字）</span>。贯于神明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1365339_comment'></div>粤自开辟。天子之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1365339_comment'></div>未有如睿宗孝之纯深也。至使庆云涌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1365339_comment'></div>浪井出。嘉木连理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1365339_comment'></div>神芝三秀。盖其效欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1365339_comment'></div>要不可以情过哀。而所枉斯大矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1365339_comment'></div>臣又闻七月而葬。既葬缞除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1365339_comment'></div>其月而虞。既虞吉祭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1365339_comment'></div>为之降杀。用断丧服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1365339_comment'></div>示不得踰之。今合于山陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1365339_comment'></div>祔于宗庙。询之典训。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1365339_comment'></div>尝有稽矣。而终不师古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1365339_comment'></div>始不易月。考之事宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1365339_comment'></div>又无谓矣。举而书此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1365339_comment'></div>将何以法。陛下昧旦听朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1365339_comment'></div>戚容深视。庶官所以环拱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1365339_comment'></div>近臣莫之利见。戴九天之仁覆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1365339_comment'></div>渴十景之清光。禺然之情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1365339_comment'></div>盖未能谕。且追远兴感。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1365339_comment'></div>君子有终身之忧。以权制服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1365339_comment'></div>圣人思屈已之重。何必三年之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1365339_comment'></div>称为百行之端。若天无卑听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1365339_comment'></div>固违于献款。臣敢先除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1365339_comment'></div>今附于不义。岂司牧黎献。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1365339_comment'></div>作人父母之意乎。伏惟陛下可群臣之奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1365339_comment'></div>顺刚日之请。去独行以致美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1365339_comment'></div>阐大猷以光济。勿使鸿生钜儒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1365339_comment'></div>废书而郁悒。下学上达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1365339_comment'></div>草议以屏营。臣等至怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1365339_comment'></div>期必俯就。则凡在动植。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1365339_comment'></div>无任悲幸。谨昧死诣朝堂拜表以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_title_1365336_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365336'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365336'>臣某等言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365336_comment'></div>臣闻以日易月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365336_comment'></div>著自不刊之典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365336_comment'></div>以臣事君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365336_comment'></div>窃惟有争之义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365336_comment'></div>群心累切。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365336_comment'></div>圣感未回。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365336_comment'></div>臣等焦惶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365336_comment'></div>不安启处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365336_comment'></div>中谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365336_comment'></div>臣又闻之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365336_comment'></div>高宗谅阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365336_comment'></div>三年不言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365336_comment'></div>百官总已以听于冢宰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365336_comment'></div>斯则求古之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365336_comment'></div>自殷宗行之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365336_comment'></div>但事有通变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365336_comment'></div>时有损益。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365336_comment'></div>或循古法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365336_comment'></div>多昧远图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365336_comment'></div>孝文由是创礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365336_comment'></div>孝景因之从令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365336_comment'></div>故汉之帝王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1365336_comment'></div>独高文景。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1365336_comment'></div>孝者先于百行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1365336_comment'></div>岂欲违而致美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1365336_comment'></div>诚以神器之重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1365336_comment'></div>天下至公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1365336_comment'></div>所直小。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1365336_comment'></div>所枉大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1365336_comment'></div>加百姓而刑四海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1365336_comment'></div>作程于后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1365336_comment'></div>罔不率由。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1365336_comment'></div>陛下纂大横之繇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1365336_comment'></div>开中兴之业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1365336_comment'></div>每旰食坐朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1365336_comment'></div>求衣视事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1365336_comment'></div>不可得不言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1365336_comment'></div>不可得总己也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1365336_comment'></div>固不可如殷之时也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1365336_comment'></div>臣请以近事为明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1365336_comment'></div>是云典故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1365336_comment'></div>岂三圣追远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1365336_comment'></div>曷不甚哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1365336_comment'></div>三年制服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1365336_comment'></div>盖未然矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1365336_comment'></div>先后所以末顾之深者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1365336_comment'></div>欲顺成先志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1365336_comment'></div>不改其道乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1365336_comment'></div>若遂乖于所奉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1365336_comment'></div>固于执见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1365336_comment'></div>宁独神祇之望缺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1365336_comment'></div>亿兆之心阻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1365336_comment'></div>必当太宗有恨于昭陵之仙寝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1365336_comment'></div>高宗不悦于梁山之元官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1365336_comment'></div>先后徒勤于凭几之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1365336_comment'></div>陛下是忘于缀衣之日矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1365336_comment'></div>今礼云衷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1365336_comment'></div>后圣不宜独善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1365336_comment'></div>今礼云非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1365336_comment'></div>前王故以垂训。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1365336_comment'></div>其可专之乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1365336_comment'></div>况敬于宗庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1365336_comment'></div>四时之感斯在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1365336_comment'></div>废于礼乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1365336_comment'></div>万邦之化安寄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1365336_comment'></div>不荐不享久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1365336_comment'></div>其如奉先何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1365336_comment'></div>礼坏乐崩久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1365336_comment'></div>其如致理何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1365336_comment'></div>惧非大孝之意也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1365336_comment'></div>顷公除有数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1365336_comment'></div>臣等祗若。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1365336_comment'></div>今攒涂又毕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1365336_comment'></div>时月已远。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1365348_comment'></div>喜极而悲。阖门感恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365348_comment'></div>垂泪相贺。中谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365348_comment'></div>臣自登两府。倏至三旬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365348_comment'></div>天地之閒。未裨尘露。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365348_comment'></div>云雨之施。已遍公私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365348_comment'></div>抚心载惊。顾影增惕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365348_comment'></div>伏以臣兄列官清宪。专于察视。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365348_comment'></div>臣又承弼皇枢。课其条职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365348_comment'></div>苟愆纲纪。责在准绳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365348_comment'></div>所以请移别官。冀循常序。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365382_comment'></div>棺不三寸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365382_comment'></div>垒石塔一丈于其上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365382_comment'></div>不雕不砻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365382_comment'></div>奁省薄也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365382_comment'></div>其铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1365397_comment'></div>转赵之平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1365397_comment'></div>换虞乡主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1365397_comment'></div>任非待贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1365397_comment'></div>居是适用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1365397_comment'></div>婴酷而罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1365397_comment'></div>居丧几灭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1365397_comment'></div>率由于至性。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1365397_comment'></div>每不胜哀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1365397_comment'></div>礼阕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1365397_comment'></div>入为鄠尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1365397_comment'></div>时吴郡顾琮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1365397_comment'></div>秉铨调餗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1365397_comment'></div>致公密启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1365397_comment'></div>授万年尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1365397_comment'></div>寻迁左肃政台监察御史里行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1365397_comment'></div>历殿中左右肃政丞侍御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1365397_comment'></div>回复双拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1365397_comment'></div>周旋五人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1365397_comment'></div>悉心果孚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1365397_comment'></div>履尾奚惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1365397_comment'></div>豮豕既制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1365397_comment'></div>拉二竖于威弧之张。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1365397_comment'></div>神羊既立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1365397_comment'></div>挫三思于止戈之武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1365397_comment'></div>固亦霜驱隼劲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1365397_comment'></div>露落鹏摧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1365397_comment'></div>岂避憸言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1365397_comment'></div>俄招毁议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1365397_comment'></div>出为幽州司马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1365397_comment'></div>都督薛讷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1365397_comment'></div>以元帅综戎仗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1365397_comment'></div>权公为在端寮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1365397_comment'></div>设文备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1365397_comment'></div>甲兵缮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1365397_comment'></div>仓廪绩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1365397_comment'></div>绝漠以奔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1365397_comment'></div>严城洞启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1365397_comment'></div>迁定州长史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1365397_comment'></div>未诣职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1365397_comment'></div>入除金部郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1365397_comment'></div>景龙六年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1365397_comment'></div>鸣牝肆孽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1365397_comment'></div>分宰京邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1365397_comment'></div>先屠戚党。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1365397_comment'></div>吏部人相狃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1365397_comment'></div>狱市皆纷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1365397_comment'></div>徵拜公长安令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1365397_comment'></div>丕弊不辜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1365397_comment'></div>大安所属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1365397_comment'></div>无何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1365397_comment'></div>除将作少匠少府少监。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1365397_comment'></div>饰⿱<span class='inlineComment2'>（廿惩）</span>蓏<span class='inlineComment2'>（疑）</span>爱费闭奢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1365397_comment'></div>曾不无益。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1365397_comment'></div>而成有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1365397_comment'></div>登加七命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1365397_comment'></div>食千户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1365397_comment'></div>俾侯于广平国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1365397_comment'></div>转刑部侍郎兼检校宋王府长史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1365397_comment'></div>司寇持平以议罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1365397_comment'></div>君王好直而请由。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1365397_comment'></div>是用刑不颇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1365397_comment'></div>为善最乐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1365397_comment'></div>明年王正月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1365397_comment'></div>我后时迈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1365397_comment'></div>翠华顺动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1365397_comment'></div>苍驾巡游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1365397_comment'></div>幸朔方而经周汉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1365397_comment'></div>陟河东而观舜禹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1365397_comment'></div>命公为蒲州刺史本道按察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1365397_comment'></div>伟储峙之饶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1365397_comment'></div>悦股肱之壮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1365397_comment'></div>期至人于道路。<div id='poem_sentence_131_1365397_comment'></div>澄清中理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1365397_comment'></div>上因听政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1365397_comment'></div>顾侍臣曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1365397_comment'></div>江淮之閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1365397_comment'></div>风气果锐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1365397_comment'></div>吏诸尤者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1365397_comment'></div>朕巳得之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1365397_comment'></div>又迁扬州大都督府长史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1365397_comment'></div>公刈作奸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1365397_comment'></div>锄挠法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1365397_comment'></div>万商利于舟楫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1365397_comment'></div>三吴贞于鼓铸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1365397_comment'></div>皇念勤矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1365397_comment'></div>徵拜鸿胪卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1365397_comment'></div>即殿中监。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1365397_comment'></div>国开宾馆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1365397_comment'></div>威怀柔服之序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1365397_comment'></div>王列御府。<div id='poem_sentence_151_1365397_comment'></div>公力主财巨细。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1365397_comment'></div>锱铢定丰省。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1365397_comment'></div>翘天地之苏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1365397_comment'></div>来自西极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1365397_comment'></div>溢水衡之贯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1365397_comment'></div>献于北宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1365397_comment'></div>擢拜御史大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1365397_comment'></div>朝之纪也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1365397_comment'></div>夫端以宪职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1365397_comment'></div>流为法家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1365397_comment'></div>含宏则弊于僶俛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1365397_comment'></div>竦踊则嫌于激讦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1365397_comment'></div>狂徒失得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1365397_comment'></div>且观兴替。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1365397_comment'></div>公之度盖不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1365397_comment'></div>森貌寡词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1365397_comment'></div>彼惮严而惴惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_168_1365397_comment'></div>察幽藏密。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_169_1365397_comment'></div>我易躁而安动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_170_1365397_comment'></div>庶物和矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_171_1365397_comment'></div>群司晏如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_172_1365397_comment'></div>加户益荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_173_1365397_comment'></div>金紫宣命。<div id='poem_sentence_176_1365397_comment'></div>呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_177_1365397_comment'></div>方恒位事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_178_1365397_comment'></div>歘谢期颐。<div id='poem_sentence_181_1365397_comment'></div>薨于洛阳之审政里第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_182_1365397_comment'></div>宸极悼焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_183_1365397_comment'></div>行必驰组。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_219_1365397_comment'></div>一子镇之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_220_1365397_comment'></div>幼为尚舍直长。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_224_1365397_comment'></div>柴毁孤立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_225_1365397_comment'></div>凡厥所嗟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_259_1365397_comment'></div>少华南映。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_260_1365397_comment'></div>望陪我京。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_261_1365397_comment'></div>还即于郑。</div><div id='poem_sentence_262_1365397_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1365402' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365402' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365402?labeling=true' target='_blank'>惠文太子哀册文</a><span class='authorDate'>（726年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_1365402")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1365402_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365402'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365402'>维开元十四年岁次景寅四月己酉朔十九日丁卯。太子太傅岐王薨于洛册。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365402_comment'></div>谥惠文太子。殡于正寝之西阶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365402_comment'></div>仲夏景申。将祔于桥陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365402_comment'></div>礼也。晓风北清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365402_comment'></div>魄月西照。列铎挽以严鼓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365402_comment'></div>出轩除而灭燎。皇帝戚深天伦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365402_comment'></div>宠异天人。追遣奠于将远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365402_comment'></div>恸哀怀其若新。震以贞位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365402_comment'></div>文以光谥。爰诏司存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365402_comment'></div>乃甄遗懿。其词曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365402_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_1365402'>重元之门。唐系居尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365402_comment'></div>五色之土。岐封效古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365402_comment'></div>瑶图正位。兄一弟二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365402_comment'></div>宝萼承庇。帝三王四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365402_comment'></div>常急难兮特询以事。竟扶翼兮能竭其志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365402_comment'></div>其志伊何。程才则多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365402_comment'></div>武之以靖。文之以和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365402_comment'></div>勇超东牟。思夺东阿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365402_comment'></div>是曰且尔。曷云其他。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365402_comment'></div>覃吁守成。忠肃钟美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365402_comment'></div>克顺克比。为臣为子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365402_comment'></div>河书聚学。沛易穷理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365402_comment'></div>毫使露濡。赋令云起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1365402_comment'></div>出咨岳政。入慎邦纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1365402_comment'></div>鲁卫则侔。武桓斯拟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1365402_comment'></div>传于元嗣。钦若端士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1365402_comment'></div>往锡朱旂。来朝紫微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1365402_comment'></div>家人辑穆。藩后增晖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1365402_comment'></div>甘旨不同而不膳。珍华不共而不衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1365402_comment'></div>楚谋或隐。梁籍宁违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1365402_comment'></div>属巡岱以封还。侍升天而庆归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1365402_comment'></div>猗𨙻兮扬名于后。懿铄兮修业可久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1365402_comment'></div>富贵兮于何不有。闇忽兮曾莫之寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1365402_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉。宵欲分漏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1365402_comment'></div>革传于奏。天初辨时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1365402_comment'></div>宪切乎思。骏马连𨁏而交使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1365402_comment'></div>近臣骈命而挟医。望君王兮何迟迟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1365402_comment'></div>俯棂槛兮犹若期。至不至兮歘长辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1365402_comment'></div>悲莫悲兮唯此悲。外皆罢惙兮内独涟洏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1365402_comment'></div>岂吾季之在哉。崇后储以谥之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1365402_comment'></div>孝依桥岳。仁本京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1365402_comment'></div>庄洎文兮。畴能忍兹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1365402_comment'></div>灵輴稍发。清道徐按。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1365402_comment'></div>整承华之卤簿。昭德阳之宫观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1365402_comment'></div>树阴阴于国门。桥耿耿于天汉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1365402_comment'></div>盈旧恋以回复。蓄新哀以聚散。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1365402_comment'></div>茕然嗣王。若不胜丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1365402_comment'></div>惨天地之何心。怨关山之巳长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1365402_comment'></div>夫俭为之德。谦固其则。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1365402_comment'></div>存没是膺。惠文是徵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1365402_comment'></div>存也高台深池之不竞。殁也备物重器之不矜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1365402_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉。典册之有凭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1365402_comment'></div>惠文之有称。故奉先皇之松柏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1365402_comment'></div>成太子之园陵。呜呼哀哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1365402_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_54_1365402_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=726&endYear=726')">726年秋</a>　在礼部尚书任，有诗。作品：《刑部尚书韦抗神道碑》<div id='poem_1365398' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365398' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a
