id='poem_content_1365398'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365398'>天下膏腴之土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365398_comment'></div>莫若雍州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365398_comment'></div>雍州绂冕之多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365398_comment'></div>莫若韦氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365398_comment'></div>粤自殷伯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365398_comment'></div>传于汉相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365398_comment'></div>昌世济美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365398_comment'></div>庆不乏贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365398_comment'></div>高矣乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365398_comment'></div>犹秦塞出华岳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365398_comment'></div>西连于嶓冢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365398_comment'></div>大矣乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365398_comment'></div>犹浊河纳清渭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365398_comment'></div>东至于溟渤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365398_comment'></div>言之者可备矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365398_comment'></div>故周隋创历。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365398_comment'></div>俊乂当朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365398_comment'></div>惟我二君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365398_comment'></div>迭为二祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365398_comment'></div>逍公其首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365398_comment'></div>郧也其仲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365398_comment'></div>处有山林之节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365398_comment'></div>糠秕俗尘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1365398_comment'></div>出为廊庙之器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1365398_comment'></div>丹青世道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1365398_comment'></div>郧之子太仆少卿陵州刺史武阳公讳津。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1365398_comment'></div>是生银青光禄大夫太子詹事赠秦州都督谥曰贞讳瑎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1365398_comment'></div>是生司农丞赠金州刺史讳畅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1365398_comment'></div>皆素风清范。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1365398_comment'></div>百代一时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1365398_comment'></div>公讳抗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1365398_comment'></div>字抗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1365398_comment'></div>金州府君第二子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1365398_comment'></div>八岁精易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1365398_comment'></div>十五读春秋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1365398_comment'></div>深入爻彖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1365398_comment'></div>试论臣主及贵<span class='inlineComment2'>（疑）</span>便成诵具解。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1365398_comment'></div>理微义中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1365398_comment'></div>初以明经射策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1365398_comment'></div>补魏州参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1365398_comment'></div>立于稠人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1365398_comment'></div>端若一鹗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1365398_comment'></div>复常调。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1365398_comment'></div>就太子典膳丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1365398_comment'></div>换岐州司仓雍州司户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1365398_comment'></div>右辅要剧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1365398_comment'></div>上京浩穰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1365398_comment'></div>九年致丰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1365398_comment'></div>两讼举直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1365398_comment'></div>升左台殿中侍御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1365398_comment'></div>转尚书主客吏部二员外吏部郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1365398_comment'></div>侍中执宪者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1365398_comment'></div>谯郡桓彦范广平宋璟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1365398_comment'></div>太选持衡者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1365398_comment'></div>京兆韦嗣立河内司马钟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1365398_comment'></div>并远识高量。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1365398_comment'></div>领贤进善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1365398_comment'></div>齐白共青缣者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1365398_comment'></div>范阳卢怀慎子从愿赵国李乂吴郡陆象先陇西李朝隐武功苏颋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1365398_comment'></div>为四公特赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1365398_comment'></div>推数子之器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1365398_comment'></div>公益文墨自持。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1365398_comment'></div>准绳不杂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1365398_comment'></div>拜洛阳令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1365398_comment'></div>役人好惠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1365398_comment'></div>务约刑清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1365398_comment'></div>刻石而传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1365398_comment'></div>鸣桴自止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1365398_comment'></div>迁御史中丞兼礼部尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1365398_comment'></div>法明象魏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1365398_comment'></div>礼达邦家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1365398_comment'></div>外守其则。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1365398_comment'></div>内修其度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1365398_comment'></div>迁兵部尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1365398_comment'></div>戎政孔殷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1365398_comment'></div>夏司多僻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1365398_comment'></div>作奸犯科者莫忌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1365398_comment'></div>接利乘便者皆是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1365398_comment'></div>公凡易四年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1365398_comment'></div>濯然一变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1365398_comment'></div>发其狙诈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1365398_comment'></div>成我鹰扬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1365398_comment'></div>别加银青光禄大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1365398_comment'></div>除太子左庶子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1365398_comment'></div>闲以珍摄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1365398_comment'></div>德以调护。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1365398_comment'></div>而巴蜀方隅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1365398_comment'></div>西南斗绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1365398_comment'></div>戎常犯轶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1365398_comment'></div>蛮或离叛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1365398_comment'></div>讨则胜不补亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1365398_comment'></div>厌造端之口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1365398_comment'></div>绥则静而作乂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1365398_comment'></div>翘致理之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1365398_comment'></div>命公为益州大都督长史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1365398_comment'></div>持节巡按。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1365398_comment'></div>公至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1365398_comment'></div>革乎弊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1365398_comment'></div>顺乎美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1365398_comment'></div>暑往寒来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1365398_comment'></div>人不知用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1365398_comment'></div>风雨时顺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1365398_comment'></div>物果遂宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1365398_comment'></div>入拜黄门侍郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1365398_comment'></div>东密黄扉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1365398_comment'></div>右严青闼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1365398_comment'></div>半股肱之委。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1365398_comment'></div>总修饰之裕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1365398_comment'></div>上閒燕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1365398_comment'></div>顾近臣言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1365398_comment'></div>韦抗朕素知之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1365398_comment'></div>何适不允。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1365398_comment'></div>大鸿胪今典宾客之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1365398_comment'></div>古称行人之职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1365398_comment'></div>俾令即序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1365398_comment'></div>期以不滥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1365398_comment'></div>抗宜兼授。<div id='poem_sentence_118_1365398_comment'></div>择副宰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1365398_comment'></div>御元帅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1365398_comment'></div>廷诤已决。<div id='poem_sentence_127_1365398_comment'></div>公确乎不拔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1365398_comment'></div>条奏其罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1365398_comment'></div>公之正也。<div id='poem_sentence_132_1365398_comment'></div>寻与之蒲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1365398_comment'></div>雷泽之庶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1365398_comment'></div>河滨之阜。<div id='poem_sentence_137_1365398_comment'></div>未几。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1365398_comment'></div>拜为大理检校刑部尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1365398_comment'></div>钦若刑柄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1365398_comment'></div>系于人命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1365398_comment'></div>士师之望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1365398_comment'></div>平寇之成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1365398_comment'></div>安以手足所措。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1365398_comment'></div>慎以毫之失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1365398_comment'></div>繄赖公勿喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1365398_comment'></div>斯得不冤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1365398_comment'></div>而待算则摧其巧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1365398_comment'></div>粉饰则杜其放。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1365398_comment'></div>上将登封岱山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1365398_comment'></div>留眷洛邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1365398_comment'></div>延企迟居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1365398_comment'></div>徘徊往俞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1365398_comment'></div>因谓公曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1365398_comment'></div>朕思久之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1365398_comment'></div>罔出卿者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1365398_comment'></div>乃仗公作镇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1365398_comment'></div>还赠武阳伯兼吏部铨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1365398_comment'></div>斥浮动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1365398_comment'></div>甄贞实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1365398_comment'></div>妍媸露求当之途。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1365398_comment'></div>势利塞容非之镜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1365398_comment'></div>复卢从愿暨颋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1365398_comment'></div>受恩联召。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1365398_comment'></div>崇朝交臂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1365398_comment'></div>至信相款。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1365398_comment'></div>他日携手。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1365398_comment'></div>微疾应问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_168_1365398_comment'></div>岂期摇落素秋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_169_1365398_comment'></div>窅冥元夜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_170_1365398_comment'></div>开元十四年八月某日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_171_1365398_comment'></div>薨于洛之永义里第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_172_1365398_comment'></div>享年六十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_173_1365398_comment'></div>呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_174_1365398_comment'></div>人之望公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_175_1365398_comment'></div>以宗伯韪公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_176_1365398_comment'></div>陟台阶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_177_1365398_comment'></div>佐王道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_178_1365398_comment'></div>始则夷路翘首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_179_1365398_comment'></div>终而亨衢铩翮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_180_1365398_comment'></div>吁嗟全德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_181_1365398_comment'></div>孤我具膳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_182_1365398_comment'></div>而胜气标准。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_183_1365398_comment'></div>色庄辞定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_184_1365398_comment'></div>举不忤物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_185_1365398_comment'></div>行不由径。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_186_1365398_comment'></div>独而不党。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_187_1365398_comment'></div>三者无惑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_188_1365398_comment'></div>闻义于卜商起子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_189_1365398_comment'></div>立诚于鲍叔知我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_190_1365398_comment'></div>抚遗恤孤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_191_1365398_comment'></div>常所空匮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_192_1365398_comment'></div>以奋藻挥毫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_193_1365398_comment'></div>转为速速。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_194_1365398_comment'></div>故大课典谟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_195_1365398_comment'></div>必咨于公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_196_1365398_comment'></div>是亦施政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_197_1365398_comment'></div>何遽薨也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_198_1365398_comment'></div>旒扆深抚床之痛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_199_1365398_comment'></div>缨緌惜和鼎之实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_200_1365398_comment'></div>盖如郑国侨虞之奇楚子文鲁公仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_201_1365398_comment'></div>不其伟矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_202_1365398_comment'></div>诏赠太子太傅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_203_1365398_comment'></div>护葬及窆备物加等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_204_1365398_comment'></div>太常考行曰贞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_205_1365398_comment'></div>粤以某年某月日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_206_1365398_comment'></div>卜葬于京城东南少陵原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_207_1365398_comment'></div>礼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_208_1365398_comment'></div>笳铎晨送。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_209_1365398_comment'></div>烟霜晓发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_210_1365398_comment'></div>葬者藏也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_211_1365398_comment'></div>俭则自完。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_212_1365398_comment'></div>素车出祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_213_1365398_comment'></div>缟衣来至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_214_1365398_comment'></div>吉先兆于蓍蔡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_215_1365398_comment'></div>哀更伤于松柏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_216_1365398_comment'></div>光昭之事克。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_217_1365398_comment'></div>恭懿之道存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_218_1365398_comment'></div>此曷为然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_219_1365398_comment'></div>其不捐者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_220_1365398_comment'></div>三子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_221_1365398_comment'></div>长京兆士曹参军曰载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_222_1365398_comment'></div>次昭文生曰翘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_223_1365398_comment'></div>幼某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_224_1365398_comment'></div>公侯必复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_225_1365398_comment'></div>美秀而文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_226_1365398_comment'></div>可以崇京兆之阡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_227_1365398_comment'></div>属扶阳之馆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_228_1365398_comment'></div>公之季左司郎中万年令泽州长史曰某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_229_1365398_comment'></div>松柏之材也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_230_1365398_comment'></div>公最友于。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_231_1365398_comment'></div>毒天伦之孔艰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_232_1365398_comment'></div>思我兄之不及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_233_1365398_comment'></div>畴云撰勒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_234_1365398_comment'></div>其寄雕刊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_235_1365398_comment'></div>以颋爰在弱龄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_236_1365398_comment'></div>获知君子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_237_1365398_comment'></div>牙琴不赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_238_1365398_comment'></div>恸哭兹晨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_239_1365398_comment'></div>乐弩仍悬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_240_1365398_comment'></div>沈羸岁晚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_241_1365398_comment'></div>悲悽固托。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_242_1365398_comment'></div>抚疾何成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_243_1365398_comment'></div>愧不得<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_244_1365398", 1365398, "Clauses/244/Comments/0")'>绝妙好辞</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_244_1365398_comment'></div>披文而相质尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_245_1365398_comment'></div>铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_246_1365398_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_247_1365398'>国大司寇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_247_1365398_comment'></div>家大彭氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_248_1365398_comment'></div>亡世畴贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_249_1365398_comment'></div>府君钟美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_250_1365398_comment'></div>衣冠礼乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_251_1365398_comment'></div>尽在是矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_252_1365398_comment'></div>讲信修睦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_253_1365398_comment'></div>自求诸已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_254_1365398_comment'></div>爵之以官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_255_1365398_comment'></div>其直如矢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_256_1365398_comment'></div>秉之以宪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_257_1365398_comment'></div>其清若水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_258_1365398_comment'></div>遽登金华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_259_1365398_comment'></div>终列瑶戺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_260_1365398_comment'></div>威震蛮貊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_261_1365398_comment'></div>信夫边鄙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_262_1365398_comment'></div>曰刑曰政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_263_1365398_comment'></div>载敞载理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_264_1365398_comment'></div>公辅未升。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_265_1365398_comment'></div>官人作纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_266_1365398_comment'></div>柰何远韵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_267_1365398_comment'></div>忽顿高轨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_268_1365398_comment'></div>迹满清畤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_269_1365398_comment'></div>事昭缇史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_270_1365398_comment'></div>微言遂绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_271_1365398_comment'></div>令问不巳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_272_1365398_comment'></div>岩绿南望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_273_1365398_comment'></div>楼丹北峙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_274_1365398_comment'></div>或向城闉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_275_1365398_comment'></div>或临松梓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_276_1365398_comment'></div>盛烈孤迈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_277_1365398_comment'></div>群悲四起。</div><div id='poem_sentence_278_1365398_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>

略阳

-----title
宁强
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='9fd94f131c3946a0a5c3f243cd811825_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("9fd94f131c3946a0a5c3f243cd811825");'><span id='9fd94f131c3946a0a5c3f243cd811825_link' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=721&endYear=721')">721年3月</a>　经三泉路，有诗。作品：《经三泉路作》<div id='poem_33801' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_33801' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/33801?labeling=true' target='_blank'>经三泉路作</a><span class='authorDate'>（721年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_content_33801'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_33801'>三月松作花，春行日渐赊。<div id='poem_sentence_0_33801_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_33801'>竹障<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作妨）</span>山鸟路，藤蔓<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作没）</span>野人家。<div id='poem_sentence_1_33801_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=721&endYear=721')">721年</a>　据诗意，言明由益州返京。作品：《夜发三泉即事》<div id='poem_33860' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_33860' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_33860'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_33860'>暗发三泉山，穷秋听骚屑。<div id='poem_sentence_0_33860_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_33860_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_33860'>沙溪忽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_33860", 33860, id='poem_sentence_4_33860_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_33860'>指程赋<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作则）</span>所恋，遇虞不遑歇。<div id='poem_sentence_5_33860_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_33860'>重纩濡莫解，悬旌冻犹揭。<div id='poem_sentence_6_33860_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_33860'>下奔泥栈榰，上觏云梯设。<div id='poem_sentence_7_33860_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_33860'>搏颊羸马顿，回眸惴人跌。<div id='poem_sentence_8_33860_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_33860'>憧憧往复还，心注思逾切。<div id='poem_sentence_9_33860_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_33860'>冉冉年将病，力困衰怠竭。<div id='poem_sentence_10_33860_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_33860'>天彭信方隅，地势诚斗绝。<div id='poem_sentence_11_33860_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_33860'>忝曳<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(3336, "poem_sentence_12_33860")'><span id='poem_sentence_13_33860'>京坻有岁饶，亭障无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_33860", 33860, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>边孽</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_13_33860_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_33860'>归奏丹墀左，骞能俟来哲。<div id='poem_sentence_14_33860_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365350'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365350'>臣某言。奉辞阙庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365350_comment'></div>驰诣州府。以某月日上讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365350_comment'></div>臣某中谢。臣禀识愚妄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365350_comment'></div>受恩忝越。十有四年中书省。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365350_comment'></div>三命承明庐。臣窃比方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365350_comment'></div>倍逾于是。特编皇揆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365350_comment'></div>不以人进。久于近密。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365350_comment'></div>众莫过臣。厚施如邱山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365350_comment'></div>微功䍐丝发。遂叨宰弼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365350_comment'></div>莫允瞻望。心虑何补。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365350_comment'></div>血诚徒勤。陛下深慈矜愚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365350_comment'></div>至德念旧。以臣颇习儒训。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365350_comment'></div>更超宗伯。臣益用惭负。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365350_comment'></div>匪遑厎宁。岂悟西南重镇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365350_comment'></div>巴蜀奥壤。爰杂县道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365350_comment'></div>且联军戎。付臣兼之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365350_comment'></div>才实不逮。审自能省。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365350_comment'></div>亟经闻彻。诚谓凭威可尽力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365350_comment'></div>谕指期致命。臣敢辞事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365350_comment'></div>谁云效忠。及当官而行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365350_comment'></div>临事益惧者。竟乏边鄙之算。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365350_comment'></div>倘贻朝廷之辱。其于静人蠲役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365350_comment'></div>惩吏抑强。惟国之政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1365350_comment'></div>庶臣能勉。流波出浦而呜咽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1365350_comment'></div>元燕辞巢而顾慕。况若臣者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1365350_comment'></div>最蒙圣渥。云山万里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1365350_comment'></div>霄汉独远。□□载惕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1365350_comment'></div>拜章失图。无任云云。<div class='inline' id='poem_allusion_33852_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_33852'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_33852'>二月韶春半，三空霁景初。<div href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=722&endYear=722')">722年</a>　在益州长史任。智阻巂州蛮酋谋反或在本年。约本年秋冬间返长安。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=722&endYear=722')">722年</a><div id='poem_1365314' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365314' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365314?labeling=true' id='poem_sentence_1_1365314_comment'></div>孚于万邦。必内立公卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365314_comment'></div>外建侯伯。后非贤罔使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365314_comment'></div>贤非后罔事。借耳以广听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365314_comment'></div>假目以遐览。则谕上旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365314_comment'></div>通下情。庶政谐而群萌乐矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365314_comment'></div>由是三考黜陟。百官会<span class='inlineComment2'>（疑）</span>昔之训然耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365314_comment'></div>朕以薄德。祚膺宝位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365314_comment'></div>受乾坤之顾。荷宗庙之灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365314_comment'></div>懔乎若涉春冰。如驭朽索。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365314_comment'></div>责在司牧。所赖分忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365314_comment'></div>曷尝不想望贤才。馨香至化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365314_comment'></div>七年于兹矣。咨尔群岳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365314_comment'></div>与人未信。何殊尤绝异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365314_comment'></div>寂寥厥声。恭惟永图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365314_comment'></div>当副虚属。孔子曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365314_comment'></div>苟有用我者。三年有成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365314_comment'></div>汉宣曰。庶人安田里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365314_comment'></div>无愁恨之声者。政平讼理也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365314_comment'></div>以为太守数易。则下不安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1365314_comment'></div>诚哉是论矣。今之牧守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1365314_comment'></div>古之诸侯。宠数特加。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1365314_comment'></div>情寄尤切。故躬飨廷内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1365314_comment'></div>命席而对。所冀仁且不远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1365314_comment'></div>言之必行。以副朕忧劳之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_33870_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_33870'>喜传上都封，因促傍吏开。<div id='poem_sentence_4_33870_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_33870_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_33870'>服义题<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作陈）</span>书箧，邀欢汎酒杯。<div id='poem_sentence_11_33870_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_33870'>白头还作尉，黄绶固非才。<div id='poem_sentence_12_33870_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_33870'>可叹<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(574, "poem_sentence_13_33870")'>悬蛇疾</span>，先贻问鵩灾。<div id='poem_sentence_13_33870_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_33870'>故乡闭穷壤，宿草生寒荄。<div id='poem_sentence_14_33870_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_33870'>零落九原去，蹉跎四序催。<div id='poem_sentence_15_33870_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_33870'>曩期冬赠橘，今哭夏成梅。<div id='poem_sentence_16_33870_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_33870'>执礼谁为赗，居常不徇财。<div id='poem_sentence_17_33870_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_33870'>北登嵔𡻱坂，东望姑苏台。<div id='poem_sentence_18_33870_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_33870'>天路本悬绝，江波复<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作空）</span>溯洄。<div id='poem_sentence_19_33870_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_33870'>念孤心易断，追往恨艰裁。<div id='poem_sentence_20_33870_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_33870'>不遂卿将伯，孰云陈与雷。<div id='poem_sentence_21_33870_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_33870'>吾衰亦如此，夫子复何哀。<div id='poem_sentence_22_33870_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_33870'></div><div id='poem_sentence_23_33870_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=723&endYear=723')">723年秋</a>　二次入蜀，有诗。作品：《边秋薄暮》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《郁谱》不系此文。）</span><div id='poem_33856' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_33856' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/33856?labeling=true' target='_blank'>边秋薄暮<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作出塞）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（723年秋）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_33856")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_33856_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_33856'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_33856'>海外秋鹰击，霜前旅雁归。<div id='poem_sentence_0_33856_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_33856'>边风思鞞鼓，落日惨旌麾。<div id='poem_sentence_1_33856_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_33856'>浦暗渔舟入，川长猎骑稀。<div id='poem_sentence_2_33856_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_33856'>客悲逢薄暮，况乃事戎机。<div id='poem_sentence_3_33856_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_33856'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_33856_comment'></div></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_33856'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(33856)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=723&endYear=723')">723年</a>　二次入蜀，有文。作品：《长乐花赋》《净信变赞》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《郁谱》不系此文。）</span><div id='poem_1365115' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365115' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365115?labeling=true' target='_blank'>长乐花赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（723年冬）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_1365115")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1365115_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1365115'>蜀太守庭际有紫华草。秋中始繁英露洗。冬早尚直本霜封。芜杂大同于众卉。盛衰小异于群物。余讶而未识。吏或告余曰。此长虞所赋蜀长乐花也。故心暗赏焉。因口授书吏。遂墨而成作。恨不见古人所为。得髣髴其旨尔。</div><div id='poem_preface_1365115_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365115'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365115'>夫长者以短长之形。度其长则至美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365115_comment'></div>夫乐者以哀乐之类。同其乐则至喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365115_comment'></div>长也乐也。吾安得而间之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365115_comment'></div>嘉纤植之并用。伟令名兮在兹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365115_comment'></div>徒见其丰族苯䔿。高标璀璨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365115_comment'></div>茎丹外而缟中。叶缥分以红贯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365115_comment'></div>缀绿颖之重叠。索紫蕤之烂漫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365115_comment'></div>迫而象之。君子其常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365115_comment'></div>或微或章。耸危冠兮缨若绶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365115_comment'></div>默退静其何望。远以意之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365115_comment'></div>佳人欲翔。炫炫煌煌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365115_comment'></div>重罗绮兮扑摇翠。蹇来思而未尝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365115_comment'></div>匪以幽兮自直。匪以直兮自藏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365115_comment'></div>匪以晚兮自耀。匪以耀兮自强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365115_comment'></div>文浊露之均洒。庇清舒之汎光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365115_comment'></div>本无嫌于散地。甘有寓于殊方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365115_comment'></div>然则太液初满。上林新霁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365115_comment'></div>䒠茸灼烁。万品千计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365115_comment'></div>摇瑞色而函芝。杂奇葩而转蕙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365115_comment'></div>孰与夫玉堂金閤之偏赏。白日青春之特丽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365115_comment'></div>岁不与兮时向阑。风萧萧兮夜漫漫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365115_comment'></div>宾远鸿于沙塞。叫离鹤于江干。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365115_comment'></div>君曾不见。三月华矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1365115_comment'></div>尽林閒之槁木。千霜陨矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1365115_comment'></div>亦庭下之枯兰。懿此常度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1365115_comment'></div>陵于早寒。假<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1365115", 1365115, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>春期</span>而不彩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1365115_comment'></div>虽秋令而不残。冲雨霰之飞薄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1365115_comment'></div>任云山之险难。芳弗珍于靃靡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1365115_comment'></div>节常慕于檀栾。吾则知树背之奚托。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1365115_comment'></div>惟倾心之可安。如后凋之是贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1365115_comment'></div>罔独立其谁观。文学掾起而为乱曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1365115_comment'></div>白露瀼瀼。何草不黄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1365115_comment'></div>紫华灼灼。生君之堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1365115_comment'></div>彼不伐兮秋自翳。时或珍兮君是惠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1365115_comment'></div>彤庭赫兮朱草骈。交屈轶兮友宾连。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1365115_comment'></div>伊榛莽而荒些。君曷为兮赋旃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1365115_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1365115_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1365374' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365374' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365374?labeling=true' target='_blank'>净信变赞</a><span class='authorDate'>（723年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_1365374")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>四言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_1365374_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365374'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365374'>道之元尊，洞照前劫。<div id='poem_sentence_0_1365374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1365374'>身也净信，终成后业。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1365374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1365374'>后业伊何，畅我元风。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1365374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1365374'>元风伊何，俾我韦公。<div id='poem_sentence_3_1365374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1365374'>顷发皇揆，镇于蜀国。<div id='poem_sentence_4_1365374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_1365374'>竭心为政，盈耳颂德。<div id='poem_sentence_5_1365374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_1365374'>哿矣夫人，缋兹群真。<div id='poem_sentence_6_1365374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_1365374'>亟迁副相，欻夭如宾。<div id='poem_sentence_7_1365374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_1365374'>府署因脩，庭除改制。<div id='poem_sentence_8_1365374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_1365374'>既丹既皓，或转或翳。<div id='poem_sentence_9_1365374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_1365374'>公则斯念，余其载觌。<div id='poem_sentence_10_1365374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_1365374'>慕齐舍堂，追鲁坏壁。<div id='poem_sentence_11_1365374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_1365374'>金海珠树，清都碧虚。<div id='poem_sentence_12_1365374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_1365374'>魂归自此，像设如初。<div id='poem_sentence_13_1365374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_1365374'>禽鸟不入，文翁是务。<div id='poem_sentence_14_1365374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_1365374'>神灵所扶，文考是赋。<div id='poem_sentence_15_1365374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_1365374'>粤幽赞者，老焉释焉。<div id='poem_sentence_16_1365374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_1365374'>其信受者，式护式传。<div id='poem_sentence_17_1365374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_1365374'>归以恋兮未以益，现即前兮过为昔。<div id='poem_sentence_18_1365374_comment'></div></div><div href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=724&endYear=724')">724年</a>　二次入蜀，撰文向玄宗荐蜀中人才。作品：《荐西蜀人才疏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《郁谱》不系此文。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_content_1365369'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365369'>礼部尚书兼益州太都督府长史使持节剑南安南节度诸军州事许国公苏颋敬造。因寓言曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365369_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1365369'>吾见夫山连岷嶓。水合江沲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365369_comment'></div>山兮水兮路穷崄。郁南望兮此情多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365369_comment'></div>吾又见像法住世于岩之阿。百千万亿兮相观我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365369_comment'></div>载琢载追兮吾匪他。伊古昔兮焦莒不惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365369_comment'></div>必忠信兮艰危若何。故吾因空而即有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365369_comment'></div>孰不回向于檀𨙻。行矣些。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365369_comment'></div>阳景颓兮翠改色。阴风起兮白增波。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365369_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1365369_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='49671fd013044bf4933f74ca785e4918_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("49671fd013044bf4933f74ca785e4918");'><span id='49671fd013044bf4933f74ca785e4918_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=724&endYear=724')">724年</a>，55岁</div><div id='49671fd013044bf4933f74ca785e4918' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=724&endYear=724')">724年</a>　二次入蜀，有诗。作品：《利州北佛龛前重于去岁题处作》<div id='poem_33825' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_33825' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/33825?labeling=true' target='_blank'>利州北佛龛前重于去岁题处作</a><span class='authorDate'>（724年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_33825")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_33825_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_33825'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(1348, "poem_allusion_33825")'>题桥</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_33825_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_33825'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_33825'>重岩载看<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作戴清）</span>美，分塔起层标。<div id='poem_sentence_0_33825_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_33825'>蜀守经涂处，巴人作礼朝。<div id='poem_sentence_1_33825_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_33825'>地疑三界出，空是六尘销。<div id='poem_sentence_2_33825_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_33825'>卧石铺苍藓，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_33825", 33825, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>行塍</span>覆绿条。<div id='poem_sentence_3_33825_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_33825'>岁年书有记，非为学<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(1348, "poem_sentence_4_33825")'>题桥</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_4_33825_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_33825'></div><div id='poem_sentence_5_33825_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
陕县
-----detail

-----title
荥阳
-----detail

-----title
泰安
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='591daca1d312497883c7339048a5e57a_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("591daca1d312497883c7339048a5e57a");'><span id='591daca1d312497883c7339048a5e57a_link' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=725&endYear=725')">725年11月6日</a>　随驾至泰山下。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=725&endYear=725')">725年11月12日</a>　在礼部尚书任，玄宗东封，撰此表以贺。作品：《贺封禅表》<div id='poem_1365334' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365334' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365334?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺封禅表</a><span class='authorDate'>（725年11月12日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_1365334")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1365334_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365334'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365334'>臣颋等言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365334_comment'></div>伏以升中礼旋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365334_comment'></div>降禅云始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365334_comment'></div>五玉既辑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365334_comment'></div>万方胥赖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365334_comment'></div>臣等中贺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365334_comment'></div>臣闻封太山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365334_comment'></div>至梁甫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365334_comment'></div>天下之壮观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365334_comment'></div>王者之丕业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365334_comment'></div>伏惟开元神武皇帝陛下以天覆之大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365334_comment'></div>地容之厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365334_comment'></div>车书不及而来王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365334_comment'></div>日月所临而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1365334", 1365334, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>奉朔</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365334_comment'></div>周年七百。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365334_comment'></div>未可语于期运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365334_comment'></div>汉里三万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365334_comment'></div>曾何校于提封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365334_comment'></div>大和浃区宇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365334_comment'></div>荣贶弥川陆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365334_comment'></div>将辞上帝之休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365334_comment'></div>靡抗鸿儒之议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365334_comment'></div>式考南至之度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1365334_comment'></div>爰备东巡之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1365334_comment'></div>列戎夷之君长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1365334_comment'></div>聚华夷之玉帛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1365334_comment'></div>惠化潜扇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1365334_comment'></div>纳人欢以锡符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1365334_comment'></div>淳风外流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1365334_comment'></div>奉天符以行事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1365334_comment'></div>遂登日观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1365334_comment'></div>拜云封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1365334_comment'></div>泥瑞芝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1365334_comment'></div>检珍玉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1365334_comment'></div>导以六穗之禾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1365334_comment'></div>牺以双觡之兽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1365334_comment'></div>茅黍毕陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1365334_comment'></div>鹣鲽咸在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1365334_comment'></div>六宗起典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1365334_comment'></div>则百神之礼具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1365334_comment'></div>群后充庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1365334_comment'></div>则肆觐之仪洽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1365334_comment'></div>乃藏秘册。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1365334_comment'></div>昭尊名山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1365334_comment'></div>称岁以效祥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1365334_comment'></div>乘温以储祉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1365334_comment'></div>而叶同之令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1365334_comment'></div>再造于黔黎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1365334_comment'></div>增广之仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1365334_comment'></div>更张于品物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1365334_comment'></div>归功当格于艺祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1365334_comment'></div>致美永延于岱宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1365334_comment'></div>斯所谓皇哉唐哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1365334_comment'></div>唐哉皇哉者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1365334_comment'></div>臣等不胜大庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1365334_comment'></div>谨奉表称贺以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1365334_comment'></div>臣颋等无任云云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_56_1365334_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=725&endYear=725')">725年11月</a>　在礼部尚书任，侍驾东封，奉诏撰此颂。作品：《封东岳朝觐颂并序》<div id='poem_33854' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_33854' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/33854?labeling=true' target='_blank'>大唐封东岳朝觐颂附诗</a><span class='authorDate'>（725年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_33854")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_33854_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_33854'>封祀之山。五在中国。泰岳首之。昊穹之命。再集巨唐。皇帝受之。临位十四年。考虞氏岁巡之义。颂周王时迈之什。十月辛酉。步自有洛。十一月戊戌。帐殿斋于岳趾。渊默以清。绎思而照。将纪功布度顺斗承天精享也。己丑。宏观轶区宇。盛仪振开辟。高临建凤。万队张皇以烛山。上御飞龙。百神翕习以扶道。国台二。藩后四。髦士密侍。信臣高位。扈封台。列升陛。不下五十。以圣言冲邈。瑶牒宝书。誓之旨曰。朕获守丕业。恐不克骏命。惟上帝储休。锡苍生无疆之庆。朕之庆也。古则秘之。何哉。属寒驰迅飙。露清终夕。若扫若锄。晏然而巳。庚寅。天官次箓。王制协时。严高祖以配之。嗣高宗以陟之。冕裘立。圭璧序。洁罍俎。调钟吕。倨勾于簨簴。戛击乎柷敔。宝骈瑞兮物焜煌。空薄霄兮音容与。则纤尘不动。和气充塞。日在于观。天为之门。扬日大光。谓小天下。昭以抱戴。见之卿霭。郁郁纷纷。喜气絪缊。当芝检。引紫薰。大紫洞而三辰接。郁苍摇而万岁闻。自下达上徯吾君。君之来兮望如云。端兮晬。圣之门。至尊辛卯有事于社首。以泰折如泰坛。于穆我睿宗。侑而作主。奠献呜咽。天子之孝也。佥以金匮归勋于祖祢。石䃭藏美于乾坤。戒咸秩则司存。癸巳。载大旂。合大乐。三陔崌以帷抗。四亚锵而辂止。朝群牧。揆千官。厎邦赋。数庭实。华虫辨等。车马来觐。周人随人。二王之宾。戎狄蛮貊。万里重译。必拱于著。执贽奉璋。雍雍昂昂。靡敢怠遑。乃建鸡竿。伐鼍鼓。帝命出。皇恩溥。扬巽风。作解雨。施舍之。荡涤之。宥法罪。除颇颣。澒涌洋溢。周流黮䨴。不崇朝而遍者。与此山俱。畴翳而不拔。胡微而不铺也。亦既称寿。申命宗伯。咨尔颂焉。效古之刻石。臣颋稽首再拜而言曰。臣闻昔在帝尧。臣惟咎繇。聪明之谓圣。迈种之谓德。天若曰。依于巨唐。易姓者李。王于中华。崇功者唐。圣之泽。德之浸也。我唐祚之兴。昌符诞膺。两仪动。六叶承。皇帝宣高祖四宗之景烈。肇开元神武之明号。广矣大矣。莫有不宁。罔有不俾。咸一德之辅。不贰心之臣。群后抗词曰。臣闻先王因天事天。因地事地。因名山升中于天。陛下得天之经。得地之义。得人之行。行也者。孝莫大焉。兼三才以为政。孝也者。仁莫大焉。含万物以为性。今三才贞。万物亨。六典平。九功成。官不滔。狱不放。至于刑清。良有以也。因斯而谈。清明在躬。志气如神之睿者君也。四国于藩。四方于宣之美者臣也。有物有则。我君臣保乂之。原所由于前。设其教于后尔。往岁邦危中否。天讨内难。陛下提三尺之剑。羾阊阖。绝勾陈。趋北军。正北辰。然后翼翼乾乾。尊尊亲亲。立我蒸人。圣考所以付天下之公器。蹈汾阳之清尘。唐虽旧邦。其命维新。古者振兵释旅。祠土祈谷。先事也。我是以幸太原。祭汾脽。耀金甲。肃边鄙。虏马詟而不敢南向。解严京师。获宝鼎。献宗庙。戍人归而尽务东作。报福京坻。于是乎爰佐五畤。郊天以奉时。爰崇九室。祫祖而敬思。昭格迟迟。神人允釐。无何。籍三脊。盛六穗。不召斯至。拥休之类。如山则委。曷月而秘。岂非享物降嘉司火也。立浑同度在璿也。陛下姑谓之薄。臣所未谕。且管氏诧齐。帝王凡八十九。湮沦郁没。孰若致美我高宗。勒岱甲子正六十。肸蚃葳蕤。故能应期我神武。惟继代奉业。增高保鸿。缺乎中何也。即先后以权。暂阻于运。二宗绍复。未遑厥功。神闇之契。不在诸子。而当圣躬。固不可辞者审矣。帝曰俞。畏德之不称。而左辅右弼。杂缙绅鸿硕之伦。抱蕝怀书。蒸云吐雾。方集贤内殿。讲议前席以论之。传不云乎。君子勤礼。敬之至也。易不云乎。先王作乐。豫以动也。慎矣哉。礼乐之为用。故执礼者具。删弊则质。宜之自我。变乐者理。去商何害。谦以为臣。二者洽而三让之。制曰可。始严卤簿。腾七萃。启禁关。回九重。以听乎鸾声之雍雍。匪疾匪徐。物有其容。动植赞。华夷观。骈阗总樽。羡漫半散。出成皋。踰荥波。凭滑台。眺洪河。遂并昆吾之墟。徜徉乎大舜之泽。濒四渎二济入于兖。经九一三齐乔于岱。推二旬有六而顿行在。莫不皤皤华皓。如藿倾阳。或牵以饩。或捧之觞。伛偻乎康庄。一以伸神武之今日。一以感乾封之旧章。乃饩归之。觞举之。慈且惠而与之驩。沸渭颉颃。矧国邹鲁。家洙泗。乘汶野而图记可知。指泮林而颂声不坠。以周公之故。将孔子之后。翘然希王者之属车。圣人之清跸。则久及信宿之意。岩岩所瞻。宗神曰天齐王。加一等于三事。户二十。供王祀。环十里。禁人樵。报也大禋。旅之数重。褎成之禄。抚遗氓。赐之复。帝曰吁。夫艰难系王业。休咎牵人事。况天监之。殊祥也。殊典也。不自满而虔巩于位。朕宝臣曰乾曜洎说。有初有终。时乃风。钦哉。汝作朕左右丞相。翳汝忠。益以嘉猷。补衮之阙。罔或怠。遂宏天封。焕天章。篆介邱而旋德阳。大飨乎群方。程后代。美其律。声其实。坟作四而籍言七也。臣颋不敏。继伯夷之直清。微太史之留滞。聆金奏同百兽之舞。振木铎采万人之诗。敢陈诗以颂曰。</div><div id='poem_preface_33854_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_33854'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_33854'>天子圣兮天孙崇，登以封兮报以功。<div id='poem_sentence_0_33854_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_33854'>受命再惟皇代，天之赉人所载。<div id='poem_sentence_1_33854_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_33854'>士马山嶪，戈矛<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_33854", 33854, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>山沓</span>，祯符山杂，灵响山答，天与人合。<div id='poem_sentence_2_33854_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_33854'>我铺衍兮长粹清，太元册兮太一精，休光光我之庆成，舜四朝而禹万国，莫之我京。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_33854_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=725&endYear=725')">725年11月12日</a>　在礼部尚书任，侍驾东封，奉诏撰东岳朝觐颂，文成，奉表以进。作品：《进东岳朝觐颂表》<div id='poem_1365351' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1365351' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1365351?labeling=true' target='_blank'>进东岳朝觐颂表</a><span class='authorDate'>（725年11月12日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(19372, "唐", "苏颋", "poem_title_1365351")'>苏颋</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1365351_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1365351'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1365351'>臣颋言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1365351_comment'></div>臣学不渊博。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1365351_comment'></div>词盖实滞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1365351_comment'></div>陛下过听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1365351_comment'></div>被恩最久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1365351_comment'></div>喜规封岱增天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1365351_comment'></div>帝王壮观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1365351_comment'></div>臣以宗伯秩礼陪清道之舆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1365351_comment'></div>臣之幸一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1365351_comment'></div>又伏睹自天垂象。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1365351_comment'></div>铭岳昭训。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1365351_comment'></div>臣以有司上载封禅之烈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1365351_comment'></div>臣之幸二也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1365351_comment'></div>臣再三之幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1365351_comment'></div>万百常情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1365351_comment'></div>臣某中谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1365351_comment'></div>臣东京奉旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1365351_comment'></div>窃闻刻石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1365351_comment'></div>三颂臣草。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1365351_comment'></div>一敷圣主之元猷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1365351_comment'></div>次纪宰臣之鸿笔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1365351_comment'></div>斯事至大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1365351_comment'></div>咎繇吉甫之难也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1365351_comment'></div>臣自料度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1365351_comment'></div>不胜惶悚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1365351_comment'></div>而议者谓臣光荣之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1365351_comment'></div>死且不朽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1365351_comment'></div>臣所羸疾翳然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1365351_comment'></div>言罕能述。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1365351_comment'></div>忠□□愚臣极思虑罄肝胆而为之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1365351_comment'></div>伏希演脩德之符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1365351_comment'></div>非敢助亲文之化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1365351_comment'></div>傥以润色鸿业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1365351_comment'></div>一蒙睿览。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1365351_comment'></div>则臣之至恳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1365351_comment'></div>万殒知归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1365351_comment'></div>轻尘冕旒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1365351_comment'></div>若寘冰谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1365351_comment'></div>无任区区战灼之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_38_1365351_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
